English: You, dear children, are from God and have overcome them, because the one who is in you is greater than the one who is in the world.
Kanjobal: Ex camc'ulnebil wuj, yet onxa Dios tinani'. Cannakxacan eb lek'ti' tu' yalan juj. Yujtol a Cham ayoc jin, ec'ban is yipal yintak jun ayoc yin eb yet yulyibank'inal ti'.

English: They are from the world and therefore speak from the viewpoint of the world, and the world listens to them.
Kanjobal: A eb tu', yetc'al yulyibank'inal ti' yayji eb. Yuj tu' xan asan tzet yetal yet yulyibank'inal ti' chi yal eb. Xiwil anima chi yacbaj txiquin yabxalwi bay eb, yujtol yettoc'al yulyibank'inal ti' yayji eb yetok eb.

English: We are from God, and whoever knows God listens to us; but whoever is not from God does not listen to us. This is how we recognize the Spirit of truth and the spirit of falsehood.
Kanjobal: Palta ayon ti xin, yet onxa Dios. Yuj tu' xan a mac yet-xa Dios jetok, chi yacbaj eb txiquin yin tzet chi jala'. Axa eb man yetok Dios xin, tok chi yacbaj eb txiquin yin tzet chi jal bay. Axca ton tu' chi yun jojtaknen elok mactxel eb ayoc Cham Espíritu yin, a ton Cham yel chi yala', c'al mactxel eb tol a lek'ti' espíritu ayoc yin.

English: Dear friends, let us love one another, for love comes from God. Everyone who loves has been born of God and knows God.
Kanjobal: Ex wuẍtak, ex wanab camc'ulnebil, co camc'ulnelejek co ba, yujtol a jun camc'ulal tu', a bay Dios chi tita. Ta ay co camc'ulal, tita' tol yuninal onxa Dios, cax jojtakxa Cham chi yal tu'.

English: Whoever does not love does not know God, because God is love.
Kanjobal: Ta c'am co camc'ulal, manto jojtakok Dios chi yal tu', yujtol ayc'alta' is camc'ulal Dios.

English: This is how God showed his love among us: He sent his one and only Son into the world that we might live through him.
Kanjobal: Ilab tol max tx'ox Cham is camc'ulal ayon, yin chekontek jun c'otan is C'ajol cam bay yulyibank'inal ti', yuj yak'oncan co k'inal tol ayc'al yin tojbalk'inal.

English: This is love: not that we loved God, but that he loved us and sent his Son as an atoning sacrifice for our sins.
Kanjobal: A is camc'ulal tu', acaw camc'ulal toni, yujtol mayonnak max babji co tx'oxon co camc'ulal bay Cham, palta tol a Cham max babji tx'oxon camc'ulal ayon. Max chektek is C'ajol, ul yak'on cam ba tojolok co yobtakil.

English: Dear friends, since God so loved us, we also ought to love one another.
Kanjobal: Ex wuẍtak, ex wanab camc'ulnebil, tix ton max con yut camc'ulnen Dios ti'. Yuj tu', yowalil chi co camc'ulnelejek co ba c'apaxok.

English: No one has ever seen God; but if we love one another, God lives in us and his love is made complete in us.
Kanjobal: Caxc'al mi c'amto junok chi ilon yin Dios junelok, palta ta chi co camc'ulnejek co ba, cajan oc Cham jin chi yal tu', cax chic'al yi yip is camc'ulal tu' jin.

English: We know that we live in him and he in us, because he has given us of his Spirit.
Kanjobal: Yuj Cham Yespíritu max cajbaj oc jin, xan jojtak tol ayon ton oc yin Cham, cax ay c'apax oc Cham jin junjun on.

English: And we have seen and testify that the Father has sent his Son to be the Savior of the world.
Kanjobal: Jilnak on Cham C'ajol Dios, yuj tu' xan chi jak' co ba testigoal yin, tol a co Mam Dios cheknejtek is C'ajol tu', yuj con ul coloncan el bay yulyibank'inal ti'.

English: If anyone acknowledges that Jesus is the Son of God, God lives in him and he in God.
Kanjobal: A mac chi alon axca ti': A Jesucristo C'ajol ton Dios, ta ẍi, ti tol ayoc yin Dios chi yal tu', cax ay c'apax oc Dios yin.

English: And so we know and rely on the love God has for us. God is love. Whoever lives in love lives in God, and God in him.
Kanjobal: Chi jaoc yin co c'ul, tol a Dios chon is camc'ulnej. Caw wal jojtak jun ti' sic'libil. A Dios ayc'alta' is camc'ulal, yuj tu' xan ta ay co camc'ulal ayon ti', tita' tol ayon oc yin Cham chi yal tu', cax ay c'apax oc Cham jin.

English: In this way, love is made complete among us so that we will have confidence on the day of judgment, because in this world we are like him.
Kanjobal: Cay ton ti' chi yun tz'aknajxac'al el co camc'ulal, yet watx' a yet ok jay jun c'ual beyc'ulal, c'am chon xiwaj satak Dios. Yujtol axca is beybal Cristo, caytu' max jut co beybal bay yulyibank'inal ti'.

English: There is no fear in love. But perfect love drives out fear, because fear has to do with punishment. The one who fears is not made perfect in love.
Kanjobal: Ta yel wali ay co camc'ulal, c'amxa chon xiwi. A mac tz'akanxa is camc'ulal yin Dios, c'amxa chi xiwi. Yujtol a yet chon xiwi, chi yal elapnok tol chon xiw bay yailal ok jay yuj yowal c'ul Dios. Yuj tu', a eb chito xiwi, c'amto chi tz'aknaj el is camc'ulal eb chi yal tu'.

English: We love because he first loved us.
Kanjobal: Ay co camc'ulal yin Dios tinani', yujtol a Cham max babji on is camc'ulneni.

English: If anyone says, “I love God,” yet hates his brother, he is a liar. For anyone who does not love his brother, whom he has seen, cannot love God, whom he has not seen.
Kanjobal: K'inalok ta chi jala', tol lanan co camc'ulnen Dios, palta chi chichon pax oc co c'ul yin junok jet animail, lek'ti' on chi yal tu'. Ta c'am chi co camc'ulnej eb jet animail tol chi jiloc yin tu', ¿tzet wal ok jut co camc'ulnen Dios tol c'am chi jiloc yin?

English: And he has given us this command: Whoever loves God must also love his brother.
Kanjobal: A Cristo ak'nejcan jun chekbanilej ti' ayon, cax chi yalon axca ti': A eb chi camc'ulnen Dios, yowalil chi camc'ulnelej pax ba eb yetok yet animail, ẍi.

English: Everyone who believes that Jesus is the Christ is born of God, and everyone who loves the father loves his child as well.
Kanjobal: A' ayon chi jaoc yin co c'ul tol a Jesús, a ton Cristo, ayon ton yuninal onxa Dios. K'inalok tinani', ta chi co camc'ulnej junok mamej, chi co camc'ulnej c'apax eb is yuninal.

English: This is how we know that we love the children of God: by loving God and carrying out his commands.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu' xan jojtak, ta lanan co camc'ulnen Dios, ta lanan jiken tzet chi yala', lanan ton co camc'ulnelen co ba ayon yuninal onxa ti xin.

English: This is love for God: to obey his commands. And his commands are not burdensome,
Kanjobal: Ta yel wali chi co camc'ulnej Dios, ok jikejlaj is chekbanil. Man yaok jiken tzet chi cheklay co beybalnej.

English: for everyone born of God overcomes the world. This is the victory that has overcome the world, even our faith.
Kanjobal: A tzet man watx'ok bay yulyibank'inal ti', cannakxa yalan juj ayon yuninal onxa Dios ti'. Yujtol chi jaoc co c'ul yin Cham, xan chi can juntzan tu' yalan juj.

English: Who is it that overcomes the world? Only he who believes that Jesus is the Son of God.
Kanjobal: Asan eb chi yaoc yin c'ul tol a Jesús C'ajol ton Dios, asan eb chi je' yak'oncan tzet man watx'ok tu' yalan.

English: This is the one who came by water and blood–Jesus Christ. He did not come by water only, but by water and blood. And it is the Spirit who testifies, because the Spirit is the truth.
Kanjobal: Ulnak ec' Jesucristo bay yulyibank'inal ti'. Ul yak'nak bautizar ba. Elnak c'apax is chiq'uil. Man asannejok tol ul yak'nak bautizar ba, palta max el c'apax is chiq'uil. Chi yak' ba Cham Espíritu testigoal tol yel ton juntzan ti'. A Cham Espíritu tu', yelc'al chi yal Cham.

English: For there are three that testify:
Kanjobal: Chi yak' ba Cham Espíritu testigoal yin. Ay c'apax cabxa tzet chi yak' ba testigoal yin, a ton is bautismo, c'al is chiq'uil max eli. A oxeb ti', jun lajanc'al chalen ba yaloni tol a Jesucristo C'ajol ton Dios.

English: the Spirit, the water and the blood; and the three are in agreement. the Spirit, the water and the blood; and the three are in agreement.
Kanjobal: Toltax chi co cha' jab tzet chi yal anima bay yulyibank'inal ti'. Akxa wal tzet chi yal Dios, yelxac'al ec'ban yelapnok. A wal caw max yak' testigoal yin is C'ajol.

English: Anyone who believes in the Son of God has this testimony in his heart. Anyone who does not believe God has made him out to be a liar, because he has not believed the testimony God has given about his Son.
Kanjobal: A ayon chi jaoc co c'ul yin Cham C'ajol Dios tu', lanan yalon Cham Espíritu yin janimail tol yel ton chi yal Dios yuj is C'ajol tu'. Palta a eb c'am chi yaoc c'ul yin is C'ajol xin, axca tol lek'ti Dios yul sat eb, yujtol c'am chi yaoc eb yin c'ul tzet max yal Cham yin is C'ajol.

English: And this is the testimony: God has given us eternal life, and this life is in his Son.
Kanjobal: Tixton jun yalnakcan Dios ti', tol chi yak' co k'inal tol ayc'al yin tojbalk'inal. A jun k'inalej tu', a yin is C'ajol tu' ay ocok.

English: He who has the Son has life; he who does not have the Son of God does not have life.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu', ta ayoc Cham C'ajol Dios jin, ay co k'inal yin tojbalk'inal. Axa eb c'amoc Cham yin xin, c'am is k'inal eb yin tojbalk'inal.

English: I write these things to you who believe in the name of the Son of God so that you may know that you have eternal life.
Kanjobal: Chin tz'ibejtok juntzan ti' ayex che yaoc e c'ul yin Cham C'ajol Dios, yet watx' che yojtaknej elok tol ay co k'inal tol ayc'al yin tojbalk'inal.

English: This is the confidence we have in approaching God: that if we ask anything according to his will, he hears us.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu', c'am chon xiw co txajli bay Dios, yujtol jojtak tol tzanc'al tzet chi co k'an bay, ok yabej, ta a yochwan chi co k'ana'.

English: And if we know that he hears us–whatever we ask–we know that we have what we asked of him.
Kanjobal: Jojtak, tol chi yab Cham co txaj; yuj tu', jojtak c'apaxok tol chic'al yak' Cham tzet chi co k'an bay.

English: If anyone sees his brother commit a sin that does not lead to death, he should pray and God will give him life. I refer to those whose sin does not lead to death. There is a sin that leads to death. I am not saying that he should pray about that.
Kanjobal: K'inalok ta che yil junok juẍtak, ma junok janab chi yun yobtakil, palta man yetok camich jun yobtakil tu', cax chex txajli yuj, okto yak' Dios is k'inal. Palta ay yobtakil tojolxac'al co cam yuj. C'am tzet chi wal ayex tol chex txajli yuj eb chi unen juntzan tu'.

English: All wrongdoing is sin, and there is sin that does not lead to death.
Kanjobal: Masanil tzet man watx'ok, yobtak yul sat Dios, palta ay yobtakil c'am chon cam yuj.

English: We know that anyone born of God does not continue to sin; the one who was born of God keeps him safe, and the evil one cannot harm him.
Kanjobal: Jojtak, ta yel wali tol yuninal onxa Dios, c'amxa chi co beybalnej yobtakil, yujtol taynebil on yuj is C'ajol. Yuj tu' c'amxa chi je' on yetnen nak diablo.

English: We know that we are children of God, and that the whole world is under the control of the evil one.
Kanjobal: Jojtak tol yet onxa Dios, axa masanil eb yet yulyibank'inal ti', ayto oc eb yul k'ab nak diablo.

English: We know also that the Son of God has come and has given us understanding, so that we may know him who is true. And we are in him who is true–even in his Son Jesus Christ. He is the true God and eternal life.
Kanjobal: Yetok c'apaxok, jojtakxa tol max ulic' Cham C'ajol Dios. A' max jakon co nabal, yet watx' chi jojtaknej el Cham acaw Dios. Yuj tu' xan ayonxa oc yin Cham acaw yel, a ton Jesucristo is C'ajol. A is C'ajol tu', caw wal Dios toni. A' chi ak'on co k'inal tol ayc'al yin tojbalk'inal.

English: Dear children, keep yourselves from idols.
Kanjobal: Ex in camc'ulnebil, manchak e yaoc e nabal yin tzet chi al-lay oc diosal.

English: Peter, an apostle of Jesus Christ, To God's elect, strangers in the world, scattered throughout Pontus, Galatia, Cappadocia, Asia and Bithynia,
Kanjobal: Ayin ton Pedro in, chekbej in Jesucristo, chin tz'ibejtok jun in carta ti' ayex, ex sakleminak e yayji yulak makbej Ponto, yulak yet Galacia, yulak yet Capadocia, yulak yet Asia, c'al yulak yet Bitinia.

English: who have been chosen according to the foreknowledge of God the Father, through the sanctifying work of the Spirit, for obedience to Jesus Christ and sprinkling by his blood: Grace and peace be yours in abundance.
Kanjobal: Ayon ti', sic'bil onxa el yuj co Mam Dios, axcata' max yut naon oc jin yettax payxa. A Cham Espíritu Santo max con aon oc yetok, yet watx' chi jikej tzet chi yala', cax chi elcan co yobtakil jiban yuj chiq'uil Jesucristo. Mimanokab watx'c'ulal, c'al junc'ulal Dios chi yak' ayex bay tu'.

English: Praise be to the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ! In his great mercy he has given us new birth into a living hope through the resurrection of Jesus Christ from the dead,
Kanjobal: Jalek watx' k'anej bay Dios, is Mam Cham Jajawil Jesucristo, yujtol max ok' c'ul Cham jin. Max con yak' aljok Cham yet cayelal, yuj yictzojbail Jesucristo xol eb camnak. Yuj tu xan chi jaoc yipok co c'ul, tol a' ok ak'on co k'inal.

English: and into an inheritance that can never perish, spoil or fade–kept in heaven for you,
Kanjobal: Ok yak' Dios jun co satak tol c'ubabilxa yuj bay satcan. A jun satakej tu', ayc'al ec' yin tojbalk'inal. Man ok etaxtok, tamwal ok tactok yili axca junok xumac c'un tac yili.

English: who through faith are shielded by God's power until the coming of the salvation that is ready to be revealed in the last time.
Kanjobal: Yujtol chi jaoc co c'ul yin Dios, xan taynebil onc'al yuj yetok is yipalil, masantac'al ok tz'aknaj co chaon co colbanil. A co colbanil tu', watx'xa yayji, yet watx' ok txeclonelay aj yet lajub tiempoal.

English: In this you greatly rejoice, though now for a little while you may have had to suffer grief in all kinds of trials.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu' xan caw chon tzaloji. Caxc'al mi yowalil chi jab yail mimek porobal janic'ok tiempoal, palta ac'ala' co tzaloji.

English: These have come so that your faith–of greater worth than gold, which perishes even though refined by fire–may be proved genuine and may result in praise, glory and honor when Jesus Christ is revealed.
Kanjobal: Ilab ch'en oro tinani', yowalil chi ak'lay porobal ch'en xol k'ak'ej, yet watx' chi txecloj elok ta watx' ch'en, ma yob ch'en. Cayon c'apax tu', yowalil chon ak'lay porobal, cax chi txecloj elok, tatol yel wali chi jaoc Dios yin co c'ul ma c'amak. Ta chi techaj juntzan porobal ti' juj, ec'ban yelapnok jaon oc co c'ul yin Dios yintak ch'en oro chi yal tu', yujtol a ch'en oro tu', txennej tiempoal ch'en. Ta chi techaj porobalil tu' juj, ok on al-lay watx'il yet ok jay Jesucristo. Mimanbil ok junej, miman ton ok yun jelapnok yet tu xin.

English: Though you have not seen him, you love him; and even though you do not see him now, you believe in him and are filled with an inexpressible and glorious joy,
Kanjobal: Caxc'al tol c'am bay max e yil yin Jesucristo ayex ti', palta che camc'ulnej pax Cham. C'am ton bay max e yil yin, palta che yaoc e c'ul yin Cham. A xan chex tzaloj wal sic'libil, manxa jantakok is watx'il jun tzalojc'ulal tu', tol c'amxa axca chi yun yal-lay elok.

English: for you are receiving the goal of your faith, the salvation of your souls.
Kanjobal: A co colbanil ok co cha tu', a ton tu' uktebil juj, xan chi jaoc Cham yin co c'ul.

English: Concerning this salvation, the prophets, who spoke of the grace that was to come to you, searched intently and with the greatest care,
Kanjobal: A eb chekbej Dios yet payxa, max yak' eb yip sayon yil tzetbil wal yayji oc co colbanil ti'. Max yak'lej eb naon el tzet lanan yaloncan el eb yin ayoktoc'al, tol ok tx'ox Dios watx'c'ulalil ayon.

English: trying to find out the time and circumstances to which the Spirit of Christ in them was pointing when he predicted the sufferings of Christ and the glories that would follow.
Kanjobal: A Yespíritu Cristo ayoc yin eb, a' max ak'on yojtaknej el eb jantak yailal t'inan yilon Cristo. Lajwi tu xin, axa Cham ok yak' Yajawilal. A eb chekbej Dios tu', max yak'lej eb naon elok, mactxel jun ok jay tu', c'al tzet tiempoal ok jayok.

English: It was revealed to them that they were not serving themselves but you, when they spoke of the things that have now been told you by those who have preached the gospel to you by the Holy Spirit sent from heaven. Even angels long to look into these things.
Kanjobal: Palta max ak'lay yojtaknej el eb yuj Dios, tol a juntzan max yalcan el eb tu' man yujok nachaj el yuj eb xan max yal eb, palta yet watx' chi nachaj el juj ayon ti'. A tinani' xin, ayon chi jalil k'anejal yet colbanilej mayal co watx' alnej el juntzan tu' ayex. A Espíritu Santo chekbiltek satcan, a' max oc jetok yet max jaloncan elok. Ilab eb ángel, chi yochej c'apax eb chi nachaj el juntzan ti' yuj.

English: Therefore, prepare your minds for action; be self-controlled; set your hope fully on the grace to be given you when Jesus Christ is revealed.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu xin, watx'nejek e nabal. Bayc'al ijan che yut e ba. Caw che yaoc yipok e c'ul tzet ok yak' Dios ayon yuj is watx'c'ulalil yet ok jay Jesucristo.

English: As obedient children, do not conform to the evil desires you had when you lived in ignorance.
Kanjobal: Ayex ti', yuninal exxa Dios wetok, cax yikem ex bay. A yet yalan, xiwil tzet max e yochej ocok, yujtol manto e yojtakok Dios. Axa tinani xin, majxa e beybalnej axca tu'.

English: But just as he who called you is holy, so be holy in all you do;
Kanjobal: A Cham mac awtenej on, caw wal watx'c'al Cham, cax c'am jabok is paltail. Axcaokab Cham tu', cayexokab tu', watx'c'al che yut e ba.

English: for it is written: “Be holy, because I am holy.”
Kanjobal: Yujtol chi yal Dios yul tx'an Un Tz'ibbilcan axca ti': Watx'c'al che yut e ba, yujtol watx' inc'al ayin ti', ẍi.

English: Since you call on a Father who judges each man's work impartially, live your lives as strangers here in reverent fear.
Kanjobal: A Dios ok beyc'ulnej junjun anima, atac'ala' is beybal junjun. Man tx'ok tx'okok ok yun beyc'ulnelay junjun yuj. Yuj tu xin, tatol chi jaloc Cham co Mamok, xiwokonek bay yet ayon ec' bay yulyibank'inal ti'.

English: For you know that it was not with perishable things such as silver or gold that you were redeemed from the empty way of life handed down to you from your forefathers,
Kanjobal: A juntzan beybal eb e yichmam beybalnebil e yuj yet yalantok, caw nabac'al max e yetnej e ba yin. Axa tinani' xin, colchajnak exxa el yul k'ab juntzan tu'. E yojtakxa tol a co colbanil ti', c'am chi manchaj yetok tzet c'un lajwi, ma axca ch'en oro ma ch'en plata.

English: but with the precious blood of Christ, a lamb without blemish or defect.
Kanjobal: Palta a chiq'uil Cristo caw wal miman yelapnok, a' max con manoncan elok. Ilab tol max mak'lay cam Cham yin xajanbalil axca junok calnel c'am jabok tacnakil, tamwal jabok tzet yob yili oc yin.

English: He was chosen before the creation of the world, but was revealed in these last times for your sake.
Kanjobal: A yet manto yesnej aj Dios yulyibank'inal ti', nabilxa yuj tol caytu' ok yun yelol yiban Cristo. Palta ato yet juntzan lajub tiempoal ti' max alaytek, yet chi txecloj el bay yulyibank'inal ti' yuj co watx'ilok.

English: Through him you believe in God, who raised him from the dead and glorified him, and so your faith and hope are in God.
Kanjobal: Yuj Cristo, xan max je' jaon oc Dios yin co c'ul tinani', yujtol a Cham max ictzonen aj Cristo xol eb camnak, cax max yion aj can. Yuj tu', caw wal chi jaoc Dios yin co c'ul, cax chi jaon c'apax oc yipok co c'ul.

English: Now that you have purified yourselves by obeying the truth so that you have sincere love for your brothers, love one another deeply, from the heart.
Kanjobal: A tinani', lanan jiken jun cuybej acaw yel. Axca tu' chi jut co jichlonen oc co beybal, yet watx' yel wali, ayokab co camc'ulal yin eb juẍtak, c'al yin eb janab. Yuj tu', yowalil chi co camc'ulnej co ba yin masanil co c'ul, c'al yin masanil jip.

English: For you have been born again, not of perishable seed, but of imperishable, through the living and enduring word of God.
Kanjobal: Yujtol aljinak onxa yet cayelal. Man yinok co mam co txutx cambejal yayji max con alji yin cayelal tu', palta yujc'al k'anej Dios xan aljinak on, yujtol a' aj k'inalej yayji. A is k'anej ti', ayc'al ec' yin tojbalk'inal.

English: For, “All men are like grass, and all their glory is like the flowers of the field; the grass withers and the flowers fall,
Kanjobal: Axca yalon yul tx'an Un axca ti': Masanil anima, lajan axca an ac'un. Ayman chi etax el is watx'ilal eb axca wal chi yun yetax el an xumac bay xolak ac'un. A an ac'un chi takcan el an, axa is xumaquil an chi pukilok.

English: but the word of the Lord stands forever.” And this is the word that was preached to you.
Kanjobal: Palta a pax k'anej Cham Jajawil xin, ayc'al ec' yin tojbalk'inal, ẍi tx'an Un tu'. A is k'anej ti', a ton jun yabixal colbanilej watx' yoqui maxax al-lay el ayex.

English: Therefore, rid yourselves of all malice and all deceit, hypocrisy, envy, and slander of every kind.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu', yowalil che bekcan masanil pojanil tzet man watx'ok. Manchakxa e yet k'anenej junok anima. Manxaokab cabsatok che yut e ba. Manchakxaokab e yak' sawenal yin junok mac ay tzet ay bay. Manchakxa ex buchwaj yin junokxa mactxel.

English: Like newborn babies, crave pure spiritual milk, so that by it you may grow up in your salvation,
Kanjobal: Ta yel wali maxax e yojtaknej el sic'libil tol watx' Cham Jajawil, axca yochen junok aq'uiẍ unin yim, axcaokab tu' e yochen jun cuybej Dios c'am somil, yet watx' che yi e yip yin e colbanil.

English: now that you have tasted that the Lord is good. now that you have tasted that the Lord is good.
Kanjobal: Co jitzek oc co ba c'atan Cham Jajawil xin, axca chi yun yajtok juntzanok ch'en yiban junok miman ch'en chi aycantok yipomalok yich na. A jun mac axca miman ch'en ti', a ton Cristo, Cham tol iquis, cax iquis on c'apax yetok ayon ti'. A ton Cham max intaknelay el yuj eb anima, palta sic'bil el yuj Dios, cax miman yelapnok yul sat Cham.

English: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu' xan aek oc e ba yul k'ab Dios, yet chex oc is templook bay ok ex oc yin sacerdotealok Dios, yuj e yak'on xajanbal bay Cham yin espíritu yuj Jesucristo. Caw wal chi tzalojbi Cham yetok juntzan xajanbal tu'.

English: For in Scripture it says: “See, I lay a stone in Zion, a chosen and precious cornerstone, and the one who trusts in him will never be put to shame.”
Kanjobal: Yuj tu xan caytu' yaloncan Dios yin Cristo yul tx'an Un Tz'ibbilcan axca ti': Ayin wal chi wacan oc jun ch'en ch'en bay Sión yet chi oc bay jolom txiquin na, tol sic'bil el wuj, c'al miman yelapnok. A mactxel chi yaoc ch'en yipok c'ul, man ok somchaj el c'ul yuj, ẍi Dios yul tx'an Un tu'.

English: Now to you who believe, this stone is precious. But to those who do not believe, “The stone the builders rejected has become the capstone, ”
Kanjobal: Caw miman yelapnok Cristo yul co sat, mac on txel chi jaoc co c'ul yin, palta ay pax eb c'am chi yaoc c'ul yin Cham. A ton yin juntzan ti' chi yal tx'an Un Tz'ibbilcan axca ti': A ch'en ch'en max yintaknej el eb watx'nem na, a ch'en max oc yin jolomok txiquin na, ẍi.

English: and, “A stone that causes men to stumble and a rock that makes them fall.” They stumble because they disobey the message–which is also what they were destined for.
Kanjobal: Chi yalon c'apax junelxa axca ti': Axca junok ch'en ch'en bay chi chipil anima yakan, cax chi telc'ojtok eb yuj, caytu' yayji Cham, ẍi tx'an Un tu'. Yujtol caytu' yayji Cristo yul sat eb c'am chi yaoc c'ul yin tu', xan toc'al chi somchaj el eb yuj, yujtol c'am chi yikej eb is k'anej. Miman txequelxa yayji yet payxa, tol t'inanc'alta' caytu' ok yut ba eb.

English: But you are a chosen people, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people belonging to God, that you may declare the praises of him who called you out of darkness into his wonderful light.
Kanjobal: Palta ayon ti', axca tol junxanej inatilej jayji, sic'bil on oc yin sacerdoteal, yuj jak'on serbil co Reyal, chi yal elapnok a ton Dios. Conobxa Dios jayji, pojbil on el yuj joccan yetok, yuj jalon el is watx'ilal Cham. Yujtol a' max on ion eltek xol k'ekk'inal, cax max on yaoncan oc bay is sakk'inalil c'ayubtak yoqui.

English: Once you were not a people, but now you are the people of God; once you had not received mercy, but now you have received mercy.
Kanjobal: Man conobok Dios e yayji yet yalan. Axa pax tinani xin, is conob exxa. A yet yalantok tu', c'am mac max ok' c'ul e yin, palta tinani xin, chi ok' c'ul Dios e yin jetok.

English: Dear friends, I urge you, as aliens and strangers in the world, to abstain from sinful desires, which war against your soul.
Kanjobal: Ex wuẍtak, ex wanab camc'ulnebil, man co conobok yulyibank'inal ti', yujtol ec'jabwomc'al jayji bay. Yuj tu' xan chin tewitok ayex, tol manchak e beybalnej juntzan tzet chi yochej oc e mimanil. Yujtol a juntzan yob ochwanilal tu', chi yak'lej owal yetok janimail.

English: Live such good lives among the pagans that, though they accuse you of doing wrong, they may see your good deeds and glorify God on the day he visits us.
Kanjobal: Watx'okab chi jut co beybal yil eb manto ojtaknenok Dios. Yuj tu xin, caxc'al chi yal eb tol yob chi jut co ba tinani', palta tatol chi yil eb co watx' beybal, ok yal eb watx' k'anej yin Dios yet ok jay c'ual beyc'ulal.

English: Submit yourselves for the Lord's sake to every authority instituted among men: whether to the king, as the supreme authority,
Kanjobal: Yuj co camc'ulal yin Cham Jajawil, xan yikemokab chi jut co ba bay masanil eb co yajawil sic'bil oc yin opiso yuj eb anima. Chi jikej tzet chi yal cham rey, cham sat yajaw.

English: or to governors, who are sent by him to punish those who do wrong and to commend those who do right.
Kanjobal: Chi jiken c'apax bay juntzanxa eb yajaw, yujtol ak'bil yopiso eb yuj cham rey, yuj yaon oc eb yailal yin eb chi oc is mul, c'al yuj yalon eb watx' k'anej yin eb watx' tzet chi el yuneni.

English: For it is God's will that by doing good you should silence the ignorant talk of foolish men.
Kanjobal: Chi yochej Dios tol caw wal watx' chi jut co beybal, yet watx' c'am bay chi can mitx'an eb c'am is nabal, yet chon al-lay yobal yuj eb.

English: Live as free men, but do not use your freedom as a cover-up for evil; live as servants of God.
Kanjobal: Ayon ti' bekanxa jayji, xan jak'ek txecloj el xin tol bekan onxa. Asan bian, manchak co naek tol yuj bekan onxa, cax bekanxac'al junen tzanc'al tzet man watx'ok. Co naektek tol ayonxa oc yak'omalok serbil Dios.

English: Show proper respect to everyone: Love the brotherhood of believers, fear God, honor the king.
Kanjobal: Ayokab yelapnok junjun jet animail yul co sat, cax chi co camc'ulnen c'apax eb jet creyenteal. Xiwokonek bay Dios. Ayokab yelapnok cham rey yul co sat.

English: Slaves, submit yourselves to your masters with all respect, not only to those who are good and considerate, but also to those who are harsh.
Kanjobal: Ex mosejal, ikejek bay chi yal e patrón. Ayokab yelapnok eb yul e sat. Man asannejok bay eb watx' is nabal c'al bay eb manso c'ul che yikej, palta ikejek c'apax bay eb yob is nabal.

English: For it is commendable if a man bears up under the pain of unjust suffering because he is conscious of God.
Kanjobal: Ta asan yuj ayoc co nabal yin Dios xan comonc'al chon etnelayi, palta ta chi jak' techajok, caw wal chi tzaloj Dios jetok.

English: But how is it to your credit if you receive a beating for doing wrong and endure it? But if you suffer for doing good and you endure it, this is commendable before God.
Kanjobal: K'inalok yuj junok tzet yob max el juneni cax chon mak'lay tinani', ¿xin ta yujc'al ok jak' techaj jun yailal tu' xan watx' on? Palta k'inalok ta comonc'al chi alay oc yailal jiban yuj junok tzet watx' chi el junen tinani', ta chi jak' techaj jun yailal tu', a ton jun tu' watx' yul sat Dios.

English: To this you were called, because Christ suffered for you, leaving you an example, that you should follow in his steps.
Kanjobal: Tutun a yuj jun ti', xan max con yawtej oc Dios yetok, yuj jak'on techaj yatakilal. Ilab tol jujc'al max yab yail Cristo. Axca tu' max yut tx'oxoncan is watx' beybal ayon, yet watx' caytu' chi yun co beybalneni.

English: “He committed no sin, and no deceit was found in his mouth.”
Kanjobal: A Cham, c'am junok yobtakil max yunej, tamwal ay junok lek'tial k'anej max yala'.

English: When they hurled their insults at him, he did not retaliate; when he suffered, he made no threats. Instead, he entrusted himself to him who judges justly.
Kanjobal: A yet max buchwaj eb yin Cham, maj buchwaj Cham yin eb. A yet max alay oc Cham yin yailal yuj eb, maj yak' Cham yowal pakon ba. Toc'al max bek oc ba Cham yul k'ab Dios, Cham watx' beyc'ulnewi.

English: He himself bore our sins in his body on the tree, so that we might die to sins and live for righteousness; by his wounds you have been healed.
Kanjobal: A Cristo max ikon can aj co yobtakil yetok is mimanil, yet max aj locan yin te curus, yet watx' c'amxa yalon yet tzet man watx'ok jin, yujtol axca tol camnakxa jayji bay yobtakil. Axca tu' max con yutej, yet watx', watx'c'al chi jut co beybal. Caw max yab yail Cham juj, yujc'al co colchajcan elok.

English: For you were like sheep going astray, but now you have returned to the Shepherd and Overseer of your souls.
Kanjobal: A yet payxa, lajan on wal axca junok calnel c'aynakcantok. A pax tinani', mayal on meltzojtek bay Cham Jilomal, Cham chi taynen janimail.

English: Wives, in the same way be submissive to your husbands so that, if any of them do not believe the word, they may be won over without words by the behavior of their wives,
Kanjobal: Ex istzilej, yikem che yut e ba bay e yichamil, yujtol ayex c'amto chi yaoc e yichamil c'ul yin k'anej Dios. Caxc'al c'am tzet ok e yal bay e yichamil tu', palta tekan ok monchaj oc eb e yuj.

English: when they see the purity and reverence of your lives.
Kanjobal: Yujtol ok yil eb tol tojol e beybal, cax tol caw wal chex xiw bay Dios.

English: Your beauty should not come from outward adornment, such as braided hair and the wearing of gold jewelry and fine clothes.
Kanjobal: Ayokab e watx'il, palta manak e watx'nen aj e yili chi wala'. Manokab ayxa mayok che yut e xil. Manchak e yaoc e nabal yin ch'en oro che k'anbalnej, tamwal yin pichilej ayxa may tojol. Yujtol manak yetok juntzan tu' ok ex watx'jok ocok.

English: Instead, it should be that of your inner self, the unfading beauty of a gentle and quiet spirit, which is of great worth in God's sight.
Kanjobal: Palta aokab e c'ulbal che yak' e yip e watx'nen ocok, yet watx', watx' e yili yul sat Dios. A watx'il e c'ulbal tu', c'am bak'in ok etaxtok. Tatol manso ex, tatol numumi ex, miman ton yelapnok yul sat Cham.

English: For this is the way the holy women of the past who put their hope in God used to make themselves beautiful. They were submissive to their own husbands,
Kanjobal: A yet payxa, ay juntzan eb xal ix tol yet-xa Dios yayji. Watx' yili c'ulbal eb xal yul sat Cham, yujtol asan Cham yanak oc eb xal yipok is c'ul, cax yikemc'al max yut ba eb xal bay yichamil.

English: like Sarah, who obeyed Abraham and called him her master. You are her daughters if you do what is right and do not give way to fear.
Kanjobal: Ilab xal Sara, yikemc'al max yut ba xal bay Abraham: Ach wetbi, ẍi xal bay. Watx'c'al che yut e nabal ayex ti' xin ex istzilej. C'amokab junok tzet bay chex xiw jabok. Ta axca tu', lajan e nabal axca xal Sara chi yal tu'.

English: Husbands, in the same way be considerate as you live with your wives, and treat them with respect as the weaker partner and as heirs with you of the gracious gift of life, so that nothing will hinder your prayers.
Kanjobal: Ac'ala' c'apax ayex ex ichamilej ex ti', watx' che yut e c'ul yin e yistzil. Ojtaknejek elok, tol lajan eb ix axca junok vaso c'un poji. Ayokab yelapnok eb ix yul e sat, yujtol aj satakwom c'apax eb ix yin k'inalej max yak' Dios ayon yuj is watx'c'ulalil. Caytu' che yut e c'ul yin eb xin, yet watx' c'am jabok tzet chi tenon oc wanaj e txaj yetok eb ix.

English: Finally, all of you, live in harmony with one another; be sympathetic, love as brothers, be compassionate and humble.
Kanjobal: Yetok c'apaxok, chi waltok junxa ti' ayex: tol jun lajanxanejokab chi jut co nabal co masanil. Tatol ay eb chi cusi, colwajokonek bay eb. Co camc'ulnelejek co ba, yujtol jet creyenteal co ba. Ok'okab co c'ul jin junjun on. Yaynakilokab chi jut co ba ayon junjun on.

English: Do not repay evil with evil or insult with insult, but with blessing, because to this you were called so that you may inherit a blessing.
Kanjobal: Ta ay eb yob chi yut ba ayon, manokab yobok chi jut co ba bay eb. Tatol ay eb chon buchoni, manchak on buchwaj yin eb. A ti jet, tol chi co k'an watx'c'ulalil Dios yiban eb. Yujtol awtebil on yuj Cham, yuj joccan yetok, yuj tx'oxon is watx'c'ulal ayon,

English: For, “Whoever would love life and see good days must keep his tongue from evil and his lips from deceitful speech.
Kanjobal: yujtol tix wal yalon yul tx'an Un ti': Ta ay mac chi yal c'ul chi najatilbi is k'inal, ta chi yochej tzalojc'ulalc'al chi ec' junjun c'u yuj, c'ayokab el aloj yobal k'anej. C'amokab chi yak' lek'tial.

English: He must turn from evil and do good; he must seek peace and pursue it.
Kanjobal: Besokab el ba bay yobtakil, axa watx'ilal chi yunej; c'amokab owal chi yunej, beybalnejokab junc'ulalil.

English: For the eyes of the Lord are on the righteous and his ears are attentive to their prayer, but the face of the Lord is against those who do evil.”
Kanjobal: Yujtol a Cham Jajawil, chi taynen eb anima watx' beybal, cax chi yacbaj txiquin yet chi yalon ba eb bay, palta ow chi yut Cham sat yin mac chi unen yobal, ẍi.

English: Who is going to harm you if you are eager to do good?
Kanjobal: Ta asan watx' beybalej chi el co beybalneni, ¿mactax junok ok ak'on yobtakil ayon?

English: But even if you should suffer for what is right, you are blessed. “Do not fear what they fear ; do not be frightened.”
Kanjobal: Palta ta chi jab yail yujc'al co watx' beybal, caw wal watx' jet. Yuj tu', manchak ex xiw yin tzet bay chi xiw eb, manchak e yak' somchaj el e nabal, ẍi tx'an Un.

English: But in your hearts set apart Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect,
Kanjobal: Jiek can Cristo Jajawilok. Co naek tol asanxanej oc Cham. Tx'ijanokabc'al chi jut co ba jalon yab mactaktxel chi k'anlej yab ayon tzet yuj xan chi jaoc Cristo yipok co c'ul. Yin mansoc'ulalil, c'al yin c'ununi k'anejal chi jut jalon bay eb.

English: keeping a clear conscience, so that those who speak maliciously against your good behavior in Christ may be ashamed of their slander.
Kanjobal: Ay eb chon buchon yuj co watx' beybal, yujtol ayoc Cristo yin co c'ul; palta watx' chi jut co beybal yet watx' c'am chon tzulay yuj yikbomal co nabal, xan a yet chon buchon eb, ok q'uixwok aj eb.

English: It is better, if it is God's will, to suffer for doing good than for doing evil.
Kanjobal: Caw wal watx' ta chi jab yail yuj co watx' beybal, tatol axca tu' chi el yin c'ul Dios. Palta ta yuj co yob beybal xin, cax chi jaben yail, nabac'al toni.

English: For Christ died for sins once for all, the righteous for the unrighteous, to bring you to God. He was put to death in the body but made alive by the Spirit,
Kanjobal: Yujtol asan junel max yab yail Cristo cam yuj co yobtakil. A Cham, caw wal watx' ton Cham. Ayon ti' xin, caxc'al man watx'ok on, palta max yab yail Cham juj, yuj con yion apnok Cham bay Dios. A is mimanil max cami, palta max ictzonelay pax aj yin yespíritu.

English: through whom also he went and preached to the spirits in prison
Kanjobal: A yespíritu tu', betnak ec' yalon el k'anej Dios bay is pixan eb presoxa yayji.

English: who disobeyed long ago when God waited patiently in the days of Noah while the ark was being built. In it only a few people, eight in all, were saved through water,
Kanjobal: A eb tu', man yikemok yutnak ba eb bay Dios yet yalantok yul tiempoal Noé. A yet jun tiempoal tu', mimanc'al max yut Dios is c'ul yin eb, yet max yechbanen watx'ji jun miman barco. A yul jun barco tu' max colchajcan el jaywan anima bay a' aej. Waxakwan eb max colchajcanok.

English: and this water symbolizes baptism that now saves you also–not the removal of dirt from the body but the pledge of a good conscience toward God. It saves you by the resurrection of Jesus Christ,
Kanjobal: A jun tzet ujnak tu', tx'oxbanilej yayji ocok, yujtol a yuj a' aej yet bautismo chon colchaj tinani' yujtol max ictzoj aj Jesucristo. A jun bautismo ti', man yopisook yion el tz'ilal co mimanil, palta a yuj tx'oxon el jochwan tol c'am chon tzulay yuj yikbomal co nabal satak Dios.

English: who has gone into heaven and is at God's right hand–with angels, authorities and powers in submission to him.
Kanjobal: Max paxaj Cham bay satcan. A tu' ayic' Cham bay watx' k'ab Dios tinani'. A' chi ikban eb ángel, yetok juntzanxa eb ay yikbej, c'al eb ay yipalil.

English: Therefore, since Christ suffered in his body, arm yourselves also with the same attitude, because he who has suffered in his body is done with sin.
Kanjobal: Tutun caw yabnak Cristo yail yin is mimanil, cax max cami. Yuj tu', co naek tol camnak onxa c'apax yetok ayon ti'. A eb camnak, c'amxa chi beybalnej eb tzet man watx'ok.

English: As a result, he does not live the rest of his earthly life for evil human desires, but rather for the will of God.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu xin, axcaokab tu' chi jut co ba, yet watx' aokab tzet chi cha' c'ul Dios chi junej, yak'ban tol ayon ec' bay yulyibank'inal ti'. Manchakxa junej axca chi yochej oc co mimanil ti'.

English: For you have spent enough time in the past doing what pagans choose to do–living in debauchery, lust, drunkenness, orgies, carousing and detestable idolatry.
Kanjobal: A yet yalan, miman tiempo max e yun juntzan tzet bay ayoc nabal eb man ojtaknenok Dios. Palta canokab juntzan tu' tinani'. Yujtol a yet tu', asanc'al yobtakil max el e yuneni, asanc'al tzet man watx'ok max e yochej ocok. Caw wal uq'uem ex an, caw pek' ex yin an. Max quex wekeki yin e k'in. Yetok c'apaxok, max e yak' serbil juntzan tzet chi al-lay oc diosal, tol manxa yobalok.

English: They think it strange that you do not plunge with them into the same flood of dissipation, and they heap abuse on you.
Kanjobal: A eb man ojtaknenok Dios, chi c'ayaj c'ul eb tinani', yujtol c'amxa chi co waj watx'nej juntzan tzet caw man watx'ok tu' yetok eb. Yuj tu', chi buchwaj eb jin.

English: But they will have to give account to him who is ready to judge the living and the dead.
Kanjobal: Palta yowalil ok yak' eb is cuenta bay Dios, Cham tol watx'xa yayji beyc'ulnen masanil anima, eb iquis c'al eb camnak.

English: For this is the reason the gospel was preached even to those who are now dead, so that they might be judged according to men in regard to the body, but live according to God in regard to the spirit.
Kanjobal: Yuj ton tu' xan max al-lay k'anejal yet colbanilej bay eb camnakxa. Yuj tu', caxc'al mi max cam is mimanil eb yuj is beyc'ulal Dios, axcac'alta' chi yun masanil anima, palta is yanimail eb, chi je' chaon is k'inal, axca is k'inal Dios.

English: The end of all things is near. Therefore be clear minded and self-controlled so that you can pray.
Kanjobal: A tinani', janic'xanej chi jay is tiempoal is lajubal masanil tzet yetal. Yuj tu', watx'okab chi jut co ba tinani'. Tec'anc'al chi jut co nabal co txajli.

English: Above all, love each other deeply, because love covers over a multitude of sins.
Kanjobal: Axa junxa tol ec'ban yelapnok, chi co camc'ulnelejek co ba yin masanil co c'ul. Caxc'al caw wal miman is mul junok mactxel ayon, palta tatol ay co camc'ulal, ok jak' mimanc'ulal yin.

English: Offer hospitality to one another without grumbling.
Kanjobal: Jak'ek posada eb juẍtak eb janab, palta man ok on alwokcan k'umal yintak eb.

English: Each one should use whatever gift he has received to serve others, faithfully administering God's grace in its various forms.
Kanjobal: Jak'lejek serbil co ba junjun on, atac'ala' tzet opisoal max ak'lay ayon yuj Dios. Watx' chi jut co k'anbalnen jopiso max yak' Cham. Yujtol tx'ok tx'okc'al jopiso max yak' Cham ayon junjun on yuj is watx'c'ulal.

English: If anyone speaks, he should do it as one speaking the very words of God. If anyone serves, he should do it with the strength God provides, so that in all things God may be praised through Jesus Christ. To him be the glory and the power for ever and ever. Amen.
Kanjobal: Tatol ayon chi je' co k'anjab elok, aokab is k'anej Dios chi jalilok. Tatol ayon chi je' jak'wi serbil, ak'wok on serbil yetok jip chi yak' Dios. Watx'c'al chi jut co watx'nen masanil tzet yetal, yet watx' chi al-lay watx' k'anej bay Dios yuj Jesucristo. Al-layokabi tol miman yelapnok Cham, caw ay is mayk'ak'al Cham yin tojbalk'inal. Yunokabi.

English: Dear friends, do not be surprised at the painful trial you are suffering, as though something strange were happening to you.
Kanjobal: Ex in camc'ulnebil, a yet chon ak'lay porobal yuj juntzan yailal caw wal ya' yoqui, c'am chi je' c'ayaj co c'ul yuj. Manchak co na' tol c'amc'alta' bay chi jayoc juntzan tu'.

English: But rejoice that you participate in the sufferings of Christ, so that you may be overjoyed when his glory is revealed.
Kanjobal: Palta caw wal tzalojokonek, yujtol jun lajanxa jaben yail yetok Cristo, xan axa yet ok jilon jay Cham xol is tzekekial, tol ok aj wal can co tzalojc'ulal.

English: If you are insulted because of the name of Christ, you are blessed, for the Spirit of glory and of God rests on you.
Kanjobal: Tatol ay eb chon buchoni yujtol ayoc co nabal yin Cristo, caw wal tzalojc'ulejal jet, yujtol a Cham Espíritu miman yelapnok, a ton Cham Yespíritu Dios cajan ec' jin.

English: If you suffer, it should not be as a murderer or thief or any other kind of criminal, or even as a meddler.
Kanjobal: Ta ay junok on chi jil yailal, manokab yujok mak'oj cam anima, manokab yujok elk'an, manokab yujok junen juntzan tzet ay yowalil yuj eb yajaw, manokab yujok comonc'al chi jaoc co ba yin junok tzet yetal bay c'am jalon jet.

English: However, if you suffer as a Christian, do not be ashamed, but praise God that you bear that name.
Kanjobal: Palta ta ayon, yujc'al yet on Cristo xin, cax chi jilon yailal, manchak on q'uixwi. Jalek watx' k'anej bay Dios, yujtol yet onxa Cristo.

English: For it is time for judgment to begin with the family of God; and if it begins with us, what will the outcome be for those who do not obey the gospel of God?
Kanjobal: Toxa ok jay tiempoal beyc'ulnelay masanil anima. A ayon yuninal onxa Dios ti', ok on beyc'ulnelay yin babelal. Tatol ok babjok co beyc'ulnelay ayon ti', ¿akxam wal eb maj cha yab k'anejal yet colbanilej yet Dios?

English: And, “If it is hard for the righteous to be saved, what will become of the ungodly and the sinner?”
Kanjobal: A ayon tojol co nabal ti', puralxac'al ok on colchajok. Ta caytu' ok yun co colchaj el ayon ti', ¿akxam wal eb c'am yelapnok Dios yul sat, c'al eb ajmul?

English: So then, those who suffer according to God's will should commit themselves to their faithful Creator and continue to do good.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu', a yet chi jayoc junok yatakil jiban axca chi yochej c'ul Dios, yowalil ac'ala' watx'okabc'al chi jut co beybal. Chi co bekoc co ba yul k'ab Cham max con watx'neni, yujtol chic'al yun bay chi yal Cham.

English: To the elders among you, I appeal as a fellow elder, a witness of Christ's sufferings and one who also will share in the glory to be revealed:
Kanjobal: A tinani xin, ti chi waltok juntzan chekbanil ti' ayex ex anciano, yujtol ayin ti', anciano in c'apax e yetok. Caw wal max wil yaben Cristo yail. Ay walon wet in chaon is watx'il e yetok, jun tolto ok txecloj elok.

English: Be shepherds of God's flock that is under your care, serving as overseers–not because you must, but because you are willing, as God wants you to be; not greedy for money, but eager to serve;
Kanjobal: Axca junok ilom calnel, cayokab tu' che yut e yiloni, ma e taynen eb max ak'lay e taynej, yujtol axca tol is calnel Dios yayji eb yul e k'ab. Manokab yujok chex ak'lay pural, ma manokab yujok e yochen oc tumin xan chex mulnaj yin e yopiso tu'. Palta yujokab tol e yochwan chex mulnaji, yujtol axca tu' chi yochej Dios. Mulnajanek yin tzalojc'ulal.

English: not lording it over those entrusted to you, but being examples to the flock.
Kanjobal: Maj je' tol yajaw ok e yut e ba yiban eb chi ak'lay e yak' cuenta tu', palta tol che tx'ox junok watx' beybal yil eb, yet watx' chi beybalnej c'apax eb.

English: And when the Chief Shepherd appears, you will receive the crown of glory that will never fade away.
Kanjobal: Ta caytu' chi el e yunen axca chi wal ti', axa yet ok jay Cham Sat Ilom Calnel, ok e cha paktzil, tol xiwil watx'il. A is paktzil tu', c'am bak'in ok lajwok.

English: Young men, in the same way be submissive to those who are older. All of you, clothe yourselves with humility toward one another, because, “God opposes the proud but gives grace to the humble.”
Kanjobal: Axa ayex ex ach'ej, c'al ex k'opoj, yikemokabc'al che yut e ba bay eb anciano. Co masanil xin, ayilokab chi jut co ba ayon junjun on, yujtol chi yal yul tx'an Un axca ti': A Dios chi tenic' is nabal eb mimek winak chi yut ba, axa pax eb yaynakil chi yut ba xin, a is watx'c'ulal Cham chi yak' bay eb, ẍi.

English: Humble yourselves, therefore, under God's mighty hand, that he may lift you up in due time.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu', yaynakilokab chi jut co ba yul k'ab Dios, yujtol caw wal miman yipalil Cham, yet watx' ok on mimanbinelay yuj, yet ok jay tiempoal.

English: Cast all your anxiety on him because he cares for you.
Kanjobal: Jaektok masanil co bilc'ulal yul k'ab Cham, yujtol a Cham ayoc il con yiloni.

English: Be self-controlled and alert. Your enemy the devil prowls around like a roaring lion looking for someone to devour.
Kanjobal: Caw tx'ijanokab chi jut co nabal, cax makwajokonek, yujtol axca wal junok coj chi el yaw, cax chi sayon is chibej, axca tu' yec' nak ajc'ul jin, a ton nak diablo.

English: Resist him, standing firm in the faith, because you know that your brothers throughout the world are undergoing the same kind of sufferings.
Kanjobal: Caw tec'anokab chi jut co ba bay. Tec'anokab chi jut jaon oc co c'ul yin Dios, yujtol jojtakxa, tol a eb juẍtak c'al eb janab sat tx'otx' ti', lanan yaben c'apax eb yail axca on.

English: And the God of all grace, who called you to his eternal glory in Christ, after you have suffered a little while, will himself restore you and make you strong, firm and steadfast.
Kanjobal: A yet ok lajwok jaben yail janic' tiempoal ti', axa wal on tz'aktzen oc Dios yin masanil, ok yak' co tec'anil, c'al jip. Ok on is wajbaj oc yet tu', yujtol xiwil is watx'c'ulal chi tx'ox ayon. Ilab tol a' max on awten oc yetok, yet watx' a is acaw watx'il ok yak' ayon yin junelnej, yujtol junxanej jayji yetok Jesucristo.

English: To him be the power for ever and ever. Amen.
Kanjobal: A Cham, puch miman yelapnok, miman is yikbej yin tojbalk'inal. Yunokabi.

English: With the help of Silas, whom I regard as a faithful brother, I have written to you briefly, encouraging you and testifying that this is the true grace of God. Stand fast in it.
Kanjobal: A juẍtak Silvano ti', wojtakxa is nabal, caw wal puch yikem. A' ok iontok jun in carta ti' ayex. A jay belan k'anej max waltok ti', a ok iptzen e nabal. A caw wal is watx'c'ulalil Dios jun chi wal yabixal ti'. Tec'anc'al che yut e ba yin is watx'c'ulalil ti'.

English: She who is in Babylon, chosen together with you, sends you her greetings, and so does my son Mark.
Kanjobal: A eb juẍtak, c'al eb janab aj conob chi yik Babilonia ti', sic'bil c'apax el eb. Ti' chi yatok eb cawil e c'ul. Chi ya c'apaxtok nak Marcos cawil e c'ul. A ton nak axca in c'ajol yayji ocok.

English: Greet one another with a kiss of love. Peace to all of you who are in Christ.
Kanjobal: A yet che yil-len e ba, che yak'lej cawil e c'ul yuj e tx'oxk'abnen elok tol che camc'ulnej e ba. Yak'okab Dios is junc'ulal ayex e masanil, ex tol yet exxa Jesucristo.

English: Paul, Silas and Timothy, To the church of the Thessalonians in God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ: Grace and peace to you.
Kanjobal: Ayin Pablo in ti', yetok Silvano, c'al Timoteo, chi jatok jun carta ti' ayex, ex creyente bay conob Tesalónica. Yet exxa co Mam Dios. Yet exxa c'apax Cham Jajawil Jesucristo. Yak'okabc'al Dios is watx'c'ulal, c'al is junc'ulal ayex.

English: We always thank God for all of you, mentioning you in our prayers.
Kanjobal: A yet chon txajli junjuntak el, chex co natek, cax chi jalonc'al yuj diosalil bay Dios e yuj e masanil.

English: We continually remember before our God and Father your work produced by faith, your labor prompted by love, and your endurance inspired by hope in our Lord Jesus Christ.
Kanjobal: Chex co natek satak co Mam Dios, tol caw wal chex mulnaj yin yet Cham, yujtol caw wal che ya ton oc Cham yin e c'ul. Chi co natek, tol caw wal che yak' serbil Cham, yujtol xiwil e camc'ulal yin. Yetok c'apaxok, caw wal tec'an che yut e ba, yujtol asan Cham Jajawil Jesucristo che yaoc yipok e c'ul.

English: For we know, brothers loved by God, that he has chosen you,
Kanjobal: Ex wuẍtak, ex wanab, camc'ulnebil ex yuj Dios, jojtak tol a Cham sic'nej excan elok.

English: because our gospel came to you not simply with words, but also with power, with the Holy Spirit and with deep conviction. You know how we lived among you for your sake.
Kanjobal: A yet max on ec' jalon el k'anejal yet colbanilej ayex, man naba k'anejok max ec' jalil ayex, yujtol a Yespíritu Dios ayoc jetok. Jojtak sic'libil, tol caw wal yel jun abix tu'. E yojtak tzet beybalejal max ec' co beybalnej e xol, yet watx', watx' chex elocok.

English: You became imitators of us and of the Lord; in spite of severe suffering, you welcomed the message with the joy given by the Holy Spirit.
Kanjobal: Ayex ti', max e chail yich e beybalnen co beybal. Max e beybalnej c'apax beybal Cham Jajawil. Caxc'al caw wal max e yab yail yet max e chaon k'anej Dios, palta max e cha' yin tzalojc'ulalil, yujtol a Yespíritu Dios ak'nej e tzalojc'ulal tu'.

English: And so you became a model to all the believers in Macedonia and Achaia.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu' xan a tinani', max e tx'ox jun watx' beybalej bay masanil eb jet creyenteal yul yet Macedonia tu', c'al bay eb yul yet Acaya.

English: The Lord's message rang out from you not only in Macedonia and Achaia–your faith in God has become known everywhere. Therefore we do not need to say anything about it,
Kanjobal: Yuj tu', ayex max e yak' ojtaknelay el yabixal Cham Jajawil bay junjun lugar. Tz'akan max yab eb aj Macedonia tu', yetok eb aj Acaya, tol che yaoc Dios yin e c'ul. Man asannejok eb max abeni, palta max ablay bay juntzanxa lugar. Yuj tu' xan manxa yowalilok, tol ayonto wal ok jalil e yabixal.

English: for they themselves report what kind of reception you gave us. They tell how you turned to God from idols to serve the living and true God,
Kanjobal: A masanil eb max abeni, lanan yalon eb e yabixal, tol watx' max on e yut e chaon apnok, yet max on betic' e xol. Lanan c'apax yalon eb tzet max e yut e bekoncan juntzan tzet yetal max e yal-lej oc e diosalok, cax max e chaon el yich e yak'on serbil Cham Dios iquis, a ton Cham acaw Dios.

English: and to wait for his Son from heaven, whom he raised from the dead–Jesus, who rescues us from the coming wrath.
Kanjobal: Chi yal c'apax eb tol lanan e yechbanen yayol Cham C'ajol Dios bay satcan, a ton Cham Jesús, tol max ictzonelay aj xol eb camnak yuj Dios. A Cham chon coloncan el yul k'ab jun miman yailal ok jay yuj yowal c'ul Dios.

English: You know, brothers, that our visit to you was not a failure.
Kanjobal: Ex wuẍtak, ex wanab, e yojtak tol man nabaok ec'nak ex jila'.

English: We had previously suffered and been insulted in Philippi, as you know, but with the help of our God we dared to tell you his gospel in spite of strong opposition.
Kanjobal: Babel ec'nak on bay conob Filipos, cax e yojtak tol ec' jilnak yailal bay tu'. Max on yetnej eb sic'libil. Ac'ala' yet max on apni bay e conob tu' max jil c'apax yailal, palta max oc Cham co Diosal jetok. Yuj tu' xan c'am jabok max on xiw jalon el k'anejal yet colbanilej e xol.

English: For the appeal we make does not spring from error or impure motives, nor are we trying to trick you.
Kanjobal: Man ibilok aytek co sat xan max jal ayex. Man yujok junok tzet yetal yob chi jochej oc e yin, xan max on ec' ayex. Man yinok etnewalil xan max jal ayex.

English: On the contrary, we speak as men approved by God to be entrusted with the gospel. We are not trying to please men but God, who tests our hearts.
Kanjobal: A ti jet, axca wal chi yochej c'ul Dios, axca tu' max jut ec' jalon elok, max yil Dios tol co moj yaon oc jopiso yin aloj el k'anejal yet colbanilej. Man yujok jak'on tzalojbok c'ul anima, xan chi ec' jalcan elok, palta yuj jak'on tzaloj c'ul Dios, yujtol a' chi ilon yin co nabal junjun on, ta watx' ma tatol yob.

English: You know we never used flattery, nor did we put on a mask to cover up greed–God is our witness.
Kanjobal: E yojtak, tol man toc'alok max ex ec' jal watx'il. Man yujok jion tumin, xan max ec' jalcan el ayex. Chi yil Dios, tol caw wal yel chi jala'.

English: We were not looking for praise from men, not from you or anyone else. As apostles of Christ we could have been a burden to you,
Kanjobal: Maj co say co mimanbilal e xol ayex ti', tamwal xol juntzanxa eb anima.

English: but we were gentle among you, like a mother caring for her little children.
Kanjobal: Max je' jalon oc co ba yajawil ayex, yujtol chekbej on Cristo. Palta yaynakil anima max jut co ba e xol. Axca junok ix ix chi ya'ilnej ch'ib yune', caytu' jutnak co ba ayex.

English: We loved you so much that we were delighted to share with you not only the gospel of God but our lives as well, because you had become so dear to us.
Kanjobal: Caw wal ay co camc'ulal e yin. Yuj tu' xan man asannejok tol max jal k'anej yet colbanilej yet Dios e yabej, palta max co na' tol watx' c'apax chi co bek oc co ba yul e k'ab, yuj co camc'ulal e yin.

English: Surely you remember, brothers, our toil and hardship; we worked night and day in order not to be a burden to anyone while we preached the gospel of God to you.
Kanjobal: Ex wuẍtak, ex wanab, tekan che natek tzet max jut mulnaj co ba e xol. Caw wal max jak' jip co mulnaji. A yet max ec' jal k'anejal yet colbanilej tu' ayex, c'ualil c'al ak'balil max on mulnaj yuj co gasto. Yujtol max yochej co c'ul tol c'am mac chi yetnej c'ul yak'on co gasto tu'.

English: You are witnesses, and so is God, of how holy, righteous and blameless we were among you who believed.
Kanjobal: A yet ayon ec' e yetok tu', watx'c'al co beybal. Tojolc'al max jut co nabal e xol. C'am jabok tzet yetal yob max ec' co saya'. E yojtak tol caytu' max ec' jut co ba. Yojtak c'apax Dios tol cay ton tu'.

English: For you know that we dealt with each of you as a father deals with his own children,
Kanjobal: E yojtak c'apaxok, tol axca chi yut yiptzen junok mamej is yuninal, c'al mimanc'ulneni, caytu' max ex jut jiptzencanok, c'al ex co mimanc'ulnen canok.

English: encouraging, comforting and urging you to live lives worthy of God, who calls you into his kingdom and glory.
Kanjobal: Cax max jaloncan ayex, tol caw wal watx'c'al che yut e beybal, axca wal is mojalil e yawtebal yuj Dios. A Cham awtenej ex oc yul k'ab yet watx' ay e yalon e yet yin is watx'ilal.

English: And we also thank God continually because, when you received the word of God, which you heard from us, you accepted it not as the word of men, but as it actually is, the word of God, which is at work in you who believe.
Kanjobal: A yet max jalon el k'anej Dios e xol, ayman max e yaoc yin e c'ul, yujtol yel toni is k'anej Cham, man yetok anima. Yuj tu' xan caw wal chi jal yuj diosalil bay Dios e yuj. Caw wal yel yet Dios jun k'anej tu'. Chi watx'ji oc co nabal ayon creyente on ti' yuj.

English: For you, brothers, became imitators of God's churches in Judea, which are in Christ Jesus: You suffered from your own countrymen the same things those churches suffered from the Jews,
Kanjobal: Ex wuẍtak, ex wanab, lajan wal max ex utlay axca max utlay eb creyente bay junjun yiglesia Dios yul yet Judea, eb tol yet c'apax Cristo Jesús. Caw wal max etnelay eb yuj eb jet israelal on. Cay ex c'apax tu', max ex etnelay yuj c'apax eb e yet conob.

English: who killed the Lord Jesus and the prophets and also drove us out. They displease God and are hostile to all men
Kanjobal: A eb jet israelal on tu' ak'nej cam Cham Jajawil Jesús, yak'nak c'apax cam eb eb chekbej Dios yet payxa. Max on yuktej c'apax ec' eb ayon ti'. Caw wal yob eb yul sat Dios. Ajc'ul oc eb yin masanil anima.

English: in their effort to keep us from speaking to the Gentiles so that they may be saved. In this way they always heap up their sins to the limit. The wrath of God has come upon them at last.
Kanjobal: A yet chi jochej chi jal yabix eb man israelok, yet watx' chi colchaj eb, c'am chi cha' eb jet conob on tu' jalon elok, xan yelxac'al chi mimanbi mul eb yul sat Dios. Yuj tu xin, xan a tinani', mayal yaoc Dios jun miman yailal yiban eb yin tz'akanil, yuj yowal is c'ul.

English: But, brothers, when we were torn away from you for a short time (in person, not in thought), out of our intense longing we made every effort to see you.
Kanjobal: Ex wuẍtak, ex wanab, ayxa tiempo e can e tx'oklil juj. Caxc'al c'am chi jil-lejek oc jin, palta caw wal chex co nac'altek. Caw wal chi jochej chex toj jila'.

English: For we wanted to come to you–certainly I, Paul, did, again and again–but Satan stopped us.
Kanjobal: Max jak'lej co toji. Ilab ayin Pablo in ti', tx'ial el max wak'lej in toji, palta a Satanás maj on cha on tok.

English: For what is our hope, our joy, or the crown in which we will glory in the presence of our Lord Jesus when he comes? Is it not you?
Kanjobal: A yet ok jay Cham Jajawil Jesucristo cax ok on ayjok ec' satak, chi jaoc yipok co c'ul tol e yuj xan ok co cha' co paktzebal. E yuj xan ok on tzalojbok aj sic'libil. Ok co cha' paktzil co mulnajil max jun e xol.

English: Indeed, you are our glory and joy.
Kanjobal: E yujc'al xan caw wal watx' jet, cax caw wal chon tzaloj e yuj.

English: So when we could stand it no longer, we thought it best to be left by ourselves in Athens.
Kanjobal: Palta maj ex techaj co naoni, xan max co nabalnej el co can co tx'oklil bay conob Atenas ti',

English: We sent Timothy, who is our brother and God's fellow worker in spreading the gospel of Christ, to strengthen and encourage you in your faith,
Kanjobal: cax max co chekontok Timoteo ti' ayex, yujtol yak'omal serbil Dios jetok yin yalon el k'anejal yet colbanilej aycan yuj Cristo. A' max toj yuj yak'on e tec'anil. Max toj yuj yaon oc e nabal, yet watx' che ya wal oc Cristo yin e c'ul,

English: so that no one would be unsettled by these trials. You know quite well that we were destined for them.
Kanjobal: c'al yuj yalon e yabej, yet watx' c'am ex chi somchaj el e nabal yuj tzet bay lanan e yaben yail. E yojtakxa tol yowalil chi jay juntzan yailal ti' jiban.

English: In fact, when we were with you, we kept telling you that we would be persecuted. And it turned out that way, as you well know.
Kanjobal: A yet max on ec' ayex tu', max jaloncan ayex, tol yowalil chi jab yail, xan e yojtakxa. Mayal wal yun axca max jut jaloncan tu'.

English: For this reason, when I could stand it no longer, I sent to find out about your faith. I was afraid that in some way the tempter might have tempted you and our efforts might have been useless.
Kanjobal: Yujc'al wal tu', maj ex techaj in naoni, xan max in chektok Timoteo toj yabentek, ta ayc'al oc Cristo yin e c'ul. A talaj c'uxan chi ak'lay somchaj el e c'ul yuj nak diablo, cax nabac'al mi max jetnej co ba co mulnaj e nan e xol.

English: But Timothy has just now come to us from you and has brought good news about your faith and love. He has told us that you always have pleasant memories of us and that you long to see us, just as we also long to see you.
Kanjobal: Axa tinani xin, ti' mayal betic' Timoteo ayex. Max yala' tol ac'ala' ayc'al oc Cristo yin e c'ul, cax ayc'al e camc'ulal yin. Max yalon c'apaxok tol naan onc'al e yuj masanil tiempo, cax chon e camc'ulnenc'al, cax tolab che yochej che yil jin. Ilab on c'apaxok, caw wal xiwil chi jochej chi jil e yin.

English: Therefore, brothers, in all our distress and persecution we were encouraged about you because of your faith.
Kanjobal: Ayon ti' ex wuẍtak, ex wanab, xiwil tzet yetal chi jayoc jiban, lanan wal jilon yailal cayti', palta a yet max jabeni tol ayc'al oc Cristo yin e c'ul, max jay wal co tzalojc'ulal e yuj.

English: For now we really live, since you are standing firm in the Lord.
Kanjobal: A yet max jabeni tol tec'anc'al waay e nabal yin Cham Jajawil, axca wal tol max ji' jun xikokxa co k'inal e yuj.

English: How can we thank God enough for you in return for all the joy we have in the presence of our God because of you?
Kanjobal: Yuj tu' xan caw wal chi jal yuj diosalil bay Dios e yuj, yujtol caw wal chon tzaloj e yuj satak Cham.

English: Night and day we pray most earnestly that we may see you again and supply what is lacking in your faith.
Kanjobal: C'ualil c'al ak'balil chi jak' jip co txajli, yuj co k'anontok co ba ex toj jiloni, cax chi cam wal co tz'aktzencan e tec'anil tu'.

English: Now may our God and Father himself and our Lord Jesus clear the way for us to come to you.
Kanjobal: Chi jochej chi oc co Mam Dios, c'al Cham Jajawil Jesucristo jetok, yet watx' chi je' co toj ayex tu'.

English: May the Lord make your love increase and overflow for each other and for everyone else, just as ours does for you.
Kanjobal: Chi jochej chi yak' mimanbok Cham Jajawil e camc'ulal, yet watx' che camc'ulnelej e ba wal sic'libil, cax ok je' e camc'ulnen masanil anima axca chex jut co camc'ulneni.

English: May he strengthen your hearts so that you will be blameless and holy in the presence of our God and Father when our Lord Jesus comes with all his holy ones.
Kanjobal: Chi jochej tol a Cham chi ak'on tec'anbok e nabal, yet watx' ac'ala'c'al watx'il e beybal, cax c'am jabok e yobtakil yul sat co Mam Dios yet ok jay Cham Jajawil Jesucristo yetok eb yet-xa yayji.

English: Finally, brothers, we instructed you how to live in order to please God, as in fact you are living. Now we ask you and urge you in the Lord Jesus to do this more and more.
Kanjobal: Ex wuẍtak, ex wanab, ilab ec' albil juj ayex, tol watx' che yutc'al e beybal, yet watx' chi tzaloj Dios e yetok. A tinani xin, yuj chekbej on Cham Jajawil Jesucristo, xan chi cam wal jalontok ayex, tol chex ajc'alcan e yiken jun chekbanil ti'.

English: For you know what instructions we gave you by the authority of the Lord Jesus.
Kanjobal: E yojtakxa juntzan chekbanil Cham Jajawil Jesús max ec' jalcan ayex.

English: It is God's will that you should be sanctified: that you should avoid sexual immorality;
Kanjobal: A tzet ok waltok ayex, a ton chi yochej Dios tol chi jikej. Yowalil tol asan yin chi jaoc co nabal, cax c'am chi je' co toj yin ajmulal.

English: that each of you should learn to control his own body in a way that is holy and honorable,
Kanjobal: Junjun ex, ex wuẍtak, yowalil che yojtaknej elok, tol asan yin e yistzil che yaoc e nabal. Mimanokab yelapnok e yistzil yul e sat junjun ex.

English: not in passionate lust like the heathen, who do not know God;
Kanjobal: C'am chi je' chi jochej oc yobtakil yet co mimanil, axca eb man ojtaknenok Dios.

English: and that in this matter no one should wrong his brother or take advantage of him. The Lord will punish men for all such sins, as we have already told you and warned you.
Kanjobal: Caw wal manchak jetnejek junok jet creyenteal yuj juntzan ti'. Toxa max cam wal jalon ayex, ta ay mac chi unen juntzan yobtakil ti', ok oc tz'umal eb yuj Dios.

English: For God did not call us to be impure, but to live a holy life.
Kanjobal: A Cham awtenej on el yet chon oc yetok, yet watx', watx' chi jut co beybal. Man yujok junen yobtakil xan max on yawtej.

English: Therefore, he who rejects this instruction does not reject man but God, who gives you his Holy Spirit.
Kanjobal: Ta ay mac c'am yelapnok juntzan chekbanil ti' yul sat, a Dios chi yintaknej elok, cax manak anima chi yintaknej elok. Palta a Dios anej oc Cham Espíritu Santo jin.

English: Now about brotherly love we do not need to write to you, for you yourselves have been taught by God to love each other.
Kanjobal: Man yowalilok tol ayinto wal chi waltok ayex, cax che camc'ulnen eb jet creyenteal, yujtol a wal caw Dios chi ak'on nachaj el e yuj tzetbil che yut e camc'ulnelen e ba.

English: And in fact, you do love all the brothers throughout Macedonia. Yet we urge you, brothers, to do so more and more.
Kanjobal: Ilab lanan e camc'ulnen eb jet creyenteal yul yet Macedonia tu'. Palta ex wuẍtak, ex wanab, chon tewitok ayex, tol chi ajc'al can e camc'ulal tu'.

English: Make it your ambition to lead a quiet life, to mind your own business and to work with your hands, just as we told you,
Kanjobal: Ak'ek e yip e beybalnen junc'ulal. Man e bekay e yilon e mulnajil junjun ex. Mulnajanek yetok e k'ab axca max jut jaloncan ayex,

English: so that your daily life may win the respect of outsiders and so that you will not be dependent on anybody.
Kanjobal: yet watx' ayokab e yelapnok yul sat eb comon anima. Yetok c'apaxok, yet watx' c'am chex oc is bilc'ulalok junokxa mactxel.

English: Brothers, we do not want you to be ignorant about those who fall asleep, or to grieve like the rest of men, who have no hope.
Kanjobal: Ex wuẍtak, ex wanab, chi jochej tol caw wal che yojtaknej elok tzetbil yayji eb creyente chi wayi, a ton eb camnakxa, yet watx' man mimanok chex cus yuj eb, axca wal chi yun cus eb c'am jabok tzet chi yaoc yipok c'ul.

English: We believe that Jesus died and rose again and so we believe that God will bring with Jesus those who have fallen asleep in him.
Kanjobal: Ayon ti', chi jaoc yin co c'ul, tol a ton Jesús max cami, palta max ictzonelay pax ajok. Caytu' ok yun c'apax eb creyente camnakxa tu'. A Dios ok aontek eb yetok Jesús yet ok jayok.

English: According to the Lord's own word, we tell you that we who are still alive, who are left till the coming of the Lord, will certainly not precede those who have fallen asleep.
Kanjobal: A juntzan lanan jalontok ayex ti', cuybej Cham Jajawil yayji. A yet ok jay Cham, a ayon iquis onto ti', man babelok ok on tok satak eb creyente camnakxa tu'.

English: For the Lord himself will come down from heaven, with a loud command, with the voice of the archangel and with the trumpet call of God, and the dead in Christ will rise first.
Kanjobal: Ok oc jun aw yet ok ak'lay jun chekbanil, a sat ángel ok aj yaw tu', cax ok xuon is trompeta Dios. Axa yayol Cham Jajawil tu' bay satcan, cax ok ictzonelay aj mimanil eb creyente camnakxa tu', yujtol a eb babel ok ictzonelay ajok.

English: After that, we who are still alive and are left will be caught up together with them in the clouds to meet the Lord in the air. And so we will be with the Lord forever.
Kanjobal: Axa on mac iquis onto ti', junej ok yun jilay ajtok yetok eb, cax ok on tok xol asun yet ok co chalen co ba yetok Cham Jajawil bay nan satcan. Axa jayji ec' yetok yin junelnej.

English: Therefore encourage each other with these words.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu' xan mimanc'ulnelejek e ba yuj juntzan cuybanilej ti'.

English: Now, brothers, about times and dates we do not need to write to you,
Kanjobal: Palta man yowalilok chi waltok tiempoal jayubal Cham Jajawil tu' e yab ex wuẍtak, ex wanab.

English: for you know very well that the day of the Lord will come like a thief in the night.
Kanjobal: Yujtol e yojtakxa sic'libil, tol axca wal junok elk'om chi oc elk'an yet ak'balil, c'am mac ojtakneni jantak hora chi jayi, cay wal tu' ok yun jay c'ual jay Cham Jajawil tu'.

English: While people are saying, “Peace and safety,” destruction will come on them suddenly, as labor pains on a pregnant woman, and they will not escape.
Kanjobal: A yet jun tiempoal tu', ok tz'ak yal anima axca ti': Ayon ti', caw watx' ayon, c'am tzet chi co na', ẍi mi eb. Palta a ton yet tu' yin ayman ok ak'lay c'ayil eb. Axca chi yun jay tiempoal yail unin yin ix ix, caytu' ok yun jay tiempoal yailal eb tu'. Tutun wal c'am junok eb ok colchajcan el bay jun yailal tu'.

English: But you, brothers, are not in darkness so that this day should surprise you like a thief.
Kanjobal: Palta ex wuẍtak, ex wanab, man xolok k'ekk'inal ayon ec'ok, yujtol chi nachaj el juntzan ti' juj. Yuj tu', caxc'al axca elk'om ok yun jay jun c'ual tu'; palta moj ton tol makbil jay juj.

English: You are all sons of the light and sons of the day. We do not belong to the night or to the darkness.
Kanjobal: Ayon ti', sakk'inalxa yayji co nabal, yet onxa c'ualil. Wal yel, man k'ekk'inalok jayji, may on yetok ak'balil.

English: So then, let us not be like others, who are asleep, but let us be alert and self-controlled.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu' xan maj je' tol lajan ok jut co ba axca juntzanokxa anima. Axca tol waynak el eb, yujtol man makbilok jay jun c'ual tu' yuj eb. Yowalil chon makwajekc'al xin, tec'an chi jut co nabal.

English: For those who sleep, sleep at night, and those who get drunk, get drunk at night.
Kanjobal: Yujtol a eb tol chi wayi, yet ak'balil chi way eb; axa eb tol uq'uem an, yet ak'balil chi uc'wi an eb.

English: But since we belong to the day, let us be self-controlled, putting on faith and love as a breastplate, and the hope of salvation as a helmet.
Kanjobal: Palta ayon ti', yet onxa c'ualil. Yuj tu', tec'anokab chi jut co nabal. Yowalil chi ja wal oc Cristo yin co c'ul. Yetok c'apaxok, ayokab co camc'ulal. Ta chi jut axca tu', lajan on axca eb soldado chi col ba yetok is ch'en pichilej chi jenbaj oc txam c'ul. Yowalil chi jaoc yipok co c'ul, tol colchajnak onxa. Ta chi jaoc jun tu' yipok co c'ul, lajan on axca eb soldado k'oxbil ch'en toctor yuj. Cayokab tu' chi jut co colon co ba.

English: For God did not appoint us to suffer wrath but to receive salvation through our Lord Jesus Christ.
Kanjobal: A Dios, man yujok yaon oc yowal c'ul jiban, xan max on is siq'uilok. Max on is siq'uilok yuj co chaon co colbanil bay Cham Jajawil Jesucristo.

English: He died for us so that, whether we are awake or asleep, we may live together with him.
Kanjobal: A Cham max cam co q'uexelok. Yuj tu', caxc'al iquis onto, ma camnak onxa, cax chi jayi, junxanej ok juncan yetok co masanil.

English: Therefore encourage one another and build each other up, just as in fact you are doing.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu xin, iptzelejek e ba junjun ex, c'al e yalen oc e tec'anil, axcac'alta' lananxa e beybalnen tu'.

English: Now we ask you, brothers, to respect those who work hard among you, who are over you in the Lord and who admonish you.
Kanjobal: Ex wuẍtak, ex wanab, ay eb chi mulnaj e nan e xol yuj Cham Jajawil, lanan ex yak'on cuenta eb, lananc'al yaon oc eb e nabal. Chon tewi ayex, tol nachajokab el e yuj, tol ak'bil yopiso eb yuj Dios.

English: Hold them in the highest regard in love because of their work. Live in peace with each other.
Kanjobal: Xan yowalil tol miman yelapnok eb yul e sat, che camc'ulnej eb, yujtol yin yet Cham Jajawil chi mulnaj eb. C'amokab owal e nan e xol junjun ex.

English: And we urge you, brothers, warn those who are idle, encourage the timid, help the weak, be patient with everyone.
Kanjobal: Ex wuẍtak, ex wanab, chi cam wal jalontok ayex, tol che tenchanej eb c'am chi yal c'ul chi mulnaji. Che yak' tec'anil nabal eb cabtak c'ul. Chex colwaj bay eb c'am is tec'anil yin yet Dios. Miman che yut e c'ul yin eb masanil.

English: Make sure that nobody pays back wrong for wrong, but always try to be kind to each other and to everyone else.
Kanjobal: Che yilc'al, manchak e pak e ba bay mac chi ak'on yobc'ulal ayex. Watx'c'al che yut e ba ayex junjun ex, yetokc'al bay masanil eb jet animail.

English: Be joyful always;
Kanjobal: Tzalojanekc'al.

English: pray continually;
Kanjobal: Txajlanekc'al tojbalk'inal.

English: give thanks in all circumstances, for this is God's will for you in Christ Jesus.
Kanjobal: Alek yuj diosalil bay Dios yuj tzanc'al tzet chex oni. A ton axca tu' chi yochej Dios tol chi jal yuj diosalil bay, yujtol yet onxa Cristo Jesús.

English: Do not put out the Spirit's fire;
Kanjobal: Man e tenoc wanaj Yespíritu Dios ayoc e yin junjun ex.

English: do not treat prophecies with contempt.
Kanjobal: A eb chi cheklaytok yalil k'anej Dios ayex, manchak e yintaknej el tzet chi yal eb tu'.

English: Test everything. Hold on to the good.
Kanjobal: Jantakc'al juntzan cuybanilej chi ak'lay ayex, chi cam e yabeni, cax chi cam e naoni, ta yel, ma man yelok. Asan wal juntzan tzet yetal yel che yaoc yin e c'ul.

English: Avoid every kind of evil.
Kanjobal: Pojek el e ba xol masanil pojanil yobtakil.

English: May God himself, the God of peace, sanctify you through and through. May your whole spirit, soul and body be kept blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.
Kanjobal: Chi jochej tol aokab Dios, Cham ak'om junc'ulalil chex yi wal oc yetok sic'libil. Chi jochej c'apaxok, tol a' chi ak'on cuenta e yanimail, c'al e nabal, yetokc'al e mimanil, yet watx' c'am jabok e yobtakil yet ok jay Cham Jajawil Jesucristo.

English: The one who calls you is faithful and he will do it.
Kanjobal: A Cham awtenej on elok, chic'al yun bay chi yala'. Ok yun masanil juntzan ti' yuj Cham.

English: Brothers, pray for us.
Kanjobal: Ex wuẍtak, ex wanab, caw wal chex txajli juj bay tu'.

English: Greet all the brothers with a holy kiss.
Kanjobal: A yet che yil-len e ba, che yak'lej cawil e c'ul yin camc'ulalil, yujtol yet exxa Dios.

English: I charge you before the Lord to have this letter read to all the brothers.
Kanjobal: Yujtol chekbej in Cham Jajawil, xan chi waltok ayex, tol che yawtej jun in carta ti' xol eb creyente masanil bay tu'.

English: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you.
Kanjobal: Yak'okabc'al Cham Jajawil Jesucristo is watx'c'ulal ayex bay tu'.

English: Paul, an apostle of Christ Jesus by the command of God our Savior and of Christ Jesus our hope,
Kanjobal: Ayin ton Pablo in, chekbej in Jesucristo, yujtol axca tu' yaloncan Dios co Colomal, c'al Cham Jajawil Jesucristo, Cham chi jaoc yipok co c'ul.

English: To Timothy my true son in the faith: Grace, mercy and peace from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord.
Kanjobal: Ach Timoteo, ti chi watok jun in carta ti' ayach. Axca tol in c'ajol ach, yujtol wuj xan max aoc a c'ul yin Cristo. Yak'okabc'al co Mam Dios c'al Cham Jajawil Jesucristo is watx'c'ulal ayach. Ok'okab c'ul en, cax yak'okab c'apax is junc'ulal ayach bay tu'.

English: As I urged you when I went into Macedonia, stay there in Ephesus so that you may command certain men not to teach false doctrines any longer
Kanjobal: Caw chi wochej chach can bay conob Efeso tu', axcata' max wut tewok in ba ayach, yet max in toj bay Macedonia, yujtol chi wochej chi cam wal alon bay juntzan cuywajwom, tol c'amokabxa chi cuywaj eb yin tx'ok cuybanilejal.

English: nor to devote themselves to myths and endless genealogies. These promote controversies rather than God's work–which is by faith.
Kanjobal: Chal bay eb tol manchakxa yaoc eb c'ul yin comon abix, c'al yin txolilal yabixal yichmam eb, tol c'am lajubal. Comonc'al chi teyelej aj ba eb yuj yin nabac'al. A juntzan abix tu', c'am yopiso con is cuyon yin tzet chi yochej Dios chi junej, ma yin jaon oc co c'ul yin.

English: The goal of this command is love, which comes from a pure heart and a good conscience and a sincere faith.
Kanjobal: Chi waltok jun chekbanil ti abej, yet watx' ok ajwal can camc'ulal eb creyente bay tu'. Ta chi tojlonej oc ba eb, ta c'am chi tzulay eb yuj yikbomal is nabal, ta caw yel chi yaoc eb c'ul yin Dios, ok ajwal can is camc'ulal eb tu'.

English: Some have wandered away from these and turned to meaningless talk.
Kanjobal: Palta ay eb chi bekoncan juntzan watx' beybalej chi waltek ti'. Yuj tu' xan comonxac'al chi yaoc eb nabal yin comon k'anej c'am yelapnok.

English: They want to be teachers of the law, but they do not know what they are talking about or what they so confidently affirm.
Kanjobal: Chi yochej eb chi oc meẍtolal yin ley Moisés. Caxc'al chi tz'ak tec'baj ba eb yaloni, palta c'am chi nachaj el yuj eb tzet chi yala'.

English: We know that the law is good if one uses it properly.
Kanjobal: Jojtak tol ay yopiso ley Moisés tu' ta chi jikej tzet chi yala'.

English: We also know that law is made not for the righteous but for lawbreakers and rebels, the ungodly and sinful, the unholy and irreligious; for those who kill their fathers or mothers, for murderers,
Kanjobal: Ojtaknej elok tol man yujok eb watx' beybal xan max ak'laycan jun ley tu', palta yuj eb ok waltek ti' xan max ak'laycanok: Yuj eb tenomtak chi yut ba bay Dios, eb man yikemok chi yut ba bay tzet chi yala', eb c'am chi beybalnen axca chi yochej Dios, eb yob is beybal, eb c'am yelapnok Cham yul sat, eb comonc'al chi buchwaj yin junok tzet yetal watx', eb chi mak' cam is mam c'al is txutx, c'al eb chi mak' cam juntzanxa yet animail,

English: for adulterers and perverts, for slave traders and liars and perjurers–and for whatever else is contrary to the sound doctrine
Kanjobal: eb ajmul, eb chi yun mul yetok yet winakil, eb elk'om anima, eb lek'ti, eb chi naaj k'anej yin yet animail, chi yal elapnok eb chi beybalnen tzet yetal c'am chi cha ba yetok cuybej caw yel. Yuj eb, xan max ak'laycan jun ley tu'.

English: that conforms to the glorious gospel of the blessed God, which he entrusted to me.
Kanjobal: A jun cuybanilej caw yel ti', a ton k'anejal yet colbanilej ti' max yak'can Dios ayin yuj walon elok. A jun ti', miman yelapnok. A chi alontek yabixal Dios, Cham cac'al ti' chi tzaloji.

English: I thank Christ Jesus our Lord, who has given me strength, that he considered me faithful, appointing me to his service.
Kanjobal: Ayoc Cham Jajawil Jesucristo wetok yin wopiso ti'. Chi wal yuj diosalil bay Cham, yujtol yikem in yul sat Cham yala'. Yuj tu' xan max yak' wopiso wak'on serbil.

English: Even though I was once a blasphemer and a persecutor and a violent man, I was shown mercy because I acted in ignorance and unbelief.
Kanjobal: A yet yalan xin, buchwajwom in yin Cristo. Caw max wak' yobc'ulal yin, toltax bajwajnak in yin, palta max ok' c'ul Dios win, yujtol maj nachaj el wuj tzet chi el wuneni, yujtol c'amto chi waoc Cham yin in c'ul yet tu'.

English: The grace of our Lord was poured out on me abundantly, along with the faith and love that are in Christ Jesus.
Kanjobal: Caw miman watx'c'ulal Cham Jajawil max tx'ox ayin. Max yak' waoc in c'ul yin, cax max yak'on c'apax in camc'ulal, axcac'al chi yut yak'on ayon junjun on, yujtol junxanej jayji yetok Cristo Jesús.

English: Here is a trustworthy saying that deserves full acceptance: Christ Jesus came into the world to save sinners–of whom I am the worst.
Kanjobal: Ay jun tzet caw yel ok wala', cax moj wal chi co cha' jabej. Ulnak ec' Jesucristo yulyibank'inal ti', yuj ul colon el eb yobtakwom. Ec'ban yobtakwom in xol eb yobtakwom tu'.

English: But for that very reason I was shown mercy so that in me, the worst of sinners, Christ Jesus might display his unlimited patience as an example for those who would believe on him and receive eternal life.
Kanjobal: Yuj ton tu' xan max ok' c'ul Dios win, yet watx' axc'a oc win chi txecloj elok tol ay is mimanc'ulal Jesucristo. Xan tx'oxbanil wayji bay jantak eb tolto ok yaoc c'ul yin, yet watx' chi cha' c'apax eb is k'inal tol ayc'al yin tojbalk'inal.

English: Now to the King eternal, immortal, invisible, the only God, be honor and glory for ever and ever. Amen.
