Kanjobal: A Dios, Yajaw yayji yin tojbalk'inal. C'am bak'in ok cam Cham. C'am junok mac chi je' yilon oc yin. Asan jun Dios ti', cax c'am junokxa. Mimanokab yelapnok Cham yul co sat. Jalek watx' k'anej bay yin tojbalk'inal. Yunokabi.

English: Timothy, my son, I give you this instruction in keeping with the prophecies once made about you, so that by following them you may fight the good fight,
Kanjobal: Ach Timoteo, camc'ulnebil ach wuj axca tol in c'ajol ach. Chi waltok juntzan chekbanil ti' ayach, yet watx' ok ot mulnaj a ba axca max yun chekon Dios yal-lay en. Yuj tu', axca wal junok soldado caw watx' chi yut ba yin is yopiso, caytu' chot ak'on ep a mulnaj yin yet Dios. Tec'anc'al chot aon oc yin a c'ul tzet max a cha abej. Chac'al ab tzet chi yal yikbomal a nabal.

English: holding on to faith and a good conscience. Some have rejected these and so have shipwrecked their faith.
Kanjobal: Ay eb c'amxa chi cha yab tzet chi yal yikbomal is nabal, xan mayal etax el eb yin tzet chi yaoc eb yin c'ul.

English: Among them are Hymenaeus and Alexander, whom I have handed over to Satan to be taught not to blaspheme.
Kanjobal: A Himeneo yetok Alejandro, caytu' max yut ba eb. Yuj tu' max waoc eb yul k'ab Satanás, yet watx' chi yojtaknej el eb tol c'am chi je' chi jal buchwal k'anej yin Dios.

English: I urge, then, first of all, that requests, prayers, intercession and thanksgiving be made for everyone–
Kanjobal: A tinani', tix tzet chi babji walontok ayach ti'. Yowalil chon tewi bay Dios, chon txajli yuj masanil anima. Yowalil chi co k'an bay Cham, cax chi jak'on c'apax yuj diosalil yuj eb anima tu'.

English: for kings and all those in authority, that we may live peaceful and quiet lives in all godliness and holiness.
Kanjobal: Yowalil chon txajli yuj eb mimek yajaw, c'al yuj eb yajaw masanil, yet watx' chon beytok yin numanil, c'al yin masanc'ulalil. Yuj tu' ok je' jaon wal oc co ba yul k'ab Dios, cax ok je' co beybalnen bayc'al ijanil.

English: This is good, and pleases God our Savior,
Kanjobal: Ta axca tu' yayji, watx' yul sat Dios co Colomal, cax caw chi tzaloj Cham yuj.

English: who wants all men to be saved and to come to a knowledge of the truth.
Kanjobal: Yujtol chi yochej Cham chi colchaj masanil anima, c'al yojtaknen el eb jun cuybej acaw yel.

English: For there is one God and one mediator between God and men, the man Christ Jesus,
Kanjobal: Asan jun Dios ay, cax asan c'apax jun yaomal oc co ti' bay, a ton Jesucristo, a ton Cham max oc animail,

English: who gave himself as a ransom for all men–the testimony given in its proper time.
Kanjobal: ul yak'nak ba camok, yet watx' chi je' colchaj masanil anima yuj. A yet max jay tiempoal jun ti', max al-lay el yabixal.

English: And for this purpose I was appointed a herald and an apostle–I am telling the truth, I am not lying–and a teacher of the true faith to the Gentiles.
Kanjobal: Wal yel chi wala', c'am chin naajok tol max ak'lay wopiso walon el jun abix ti'. Max quin alay oc chekbejok Jesucristo, yuj in cuyon eb man israelok yin cuybej acaw yel, yet watx' chi yaoc eb c'ul yin Cham.

English: I want men everywhere to lift up holy hands in prayer, without anger or disputing.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu', chi wochej chi txajli eb winak bay junjun lugar. A eb chi yiaj k'ab can cax chi txajli, yowalilokab watx' is beybal eb yul sat Dios. C'amokab chichonc'ulal eb. Manokab ak'om owalok eb.

English: I also want women to dress modestly, with decency and propriety, not with braided hair or gold or pearls or expensive clothes,
Kanjobal: A eb ix ix, bayc'al ijanokab chi yut pichon ba eb ix, tojolokab chi yut yaon oc eb ix is pichil. Manokab ayxa mayok chi yut eb is xil. Manchak luesnej ba eb yaon oc ch'en oro chi tzekeki yili, c'al ch'en ch'en yelxac'al can is tojol. Manchak luesnej ba eb yetok pichilej yelxac'al can is tojol.

English: but with good deeds, appropriate for women who profess to worship God.
Kanjobal: A ti yet eb, aokab watx' beybalej chi tx'oxil eb, a ton beybalej moj chi beybalnej eb ix ix chi oc ayilal bay Dios.

English: A woman should learn in quietness and full submission.
Kanjobal: Yabokab eb ix ix cuybanil yin ayilal, cax tz'inc'alokab ẍi eb ix.

English: I do not permit a woman to teach or to have authority over a man; she must be silent.
Kanjobal: Ayin chi wala' tol c'am chi je' cuywaj eb ix xol winak. Maj je' tol a eb ix ok ak'on mandar winak. Abxalwokokab eb ix yin tol c'am chi yaltok eb ix yet.

English: For Adam was formed first, then Eve.
Kanjobal: Yujtol babel watx'nebil Adán yuj Dios. Tzunanilxa watx'nebil Eva.

English: And Adam was not the one deceived; it was the woman who was deceived and became a sinner.
Kanjobal: Manak Adán max ilay aytek sat yuj nak diablo, palta a Eva, xan a ix max ayc'ay yin tenomtakil bay Dios.

English: But women will be saved through childbearing–if they continue in faith, love and holiness with propriety.
Kanjobal: Caxc'al chi yab eb ix yailal yalji unin yuj, palta ok colchaj yanimail eb ix, ta chi yaoc eb ix Dios yin c'ul, ta ay is camc'ulal eb ix, ta watx' beybal eb ix yul sat Dios, ta chi yak' cuenta ba eb ix.

English: Here is a trustworthy saying: If anyone sets his heart on being an overseer, he desires a noble task.
Kanjobal: A junxa k'anej ok waltok ayach ti', caw wal yel. Ta ay mac chi yochej chi oc yilomalok yet creyenteal, watx' jun mulnajil chi yochej eb chi yun tu'.

English: Now the overseer must be above reproach, the husband of but one wife, temperate, self-controlled, respectable, hospitable, able to teach,
Kanjobal: Ok waltek tzet yowalil chi el beybalnen eb chi oc yin jun opiso tu'. C'amokab bay chi el yunen eb junok tzet yetal man watx'ok, yet watx' c'am tzet yin chi je' yak'lay queja eb. Yowalil tol junnejokab yistzil eb. Tec'anokabc'al chi yut eb is nabal, yak'okabc'al cuenta ba eb. Yowalilokab watx'c'al chi yut eb is beybal satak yet animail, ak'om posadaokab eb. Watx'okab chi yut cuyon eb eb yet creyenteal.

English: not given to drunkenness, not violent but gentle, not quarrelsome, not a lover of money.
Kanjobal: Manokab uq'uemanok eb. Manokab mak'wajwomok eb. Watx'okab c'ul eb. Manokab ak'om owalok eb. Manokab asannejok yin ak'oj ganar tumin ayoc nabal eb.

English: He must manage his own family well and see that his children obey him with proper respect.
Kanjobal: Watx'okab yak'on cuenta ba eb yul yatut, yet watx' yikemokabc'al yuninal eb bay, yet watx' ayokab yelapnok eb yul sat yuninal tu'.

English: (If anyone does not know how to manage his own family, how can he take care of God's church?)
Kanjobal: A mac man yojtakok tzet chi yut yak'on cuenta ba yul yatut, ¿tom ato wal yak'on cuenta yiglesia Dios ok je' yuj?

English: He must not be a recent convert, or he may become conceited and fall under the same judgment as the devil.
Kanjobal: A eb unin creyente, c'amto chi je' yalay oc yopiso eb, yujtol ay is may chi yi' can ba eb. Ta chi yi' can ba eb, ay is may chi alay oc is yailal eb, axca max utlay nak diablo.

English: He must also have a good reputation with outsiders, so that he will not fall into disgrace and into the devil's trap.
Kanjobal: A eb ayoc yopiso, yowalilokab watx' chi yut eb beybal satak eb man creyenteok, yet watx' c'am chi buchlay eb, c'al yet watx' c'am chi ayc'ay eb yul is trampa nak diablo.

English: Deacons, likewise, are to be men worthy of respect, sincere, not indulging in much wine, and not pursuing dishonest gain.
Kanjobal: Ti chi wal c'apaxtok ayach tzet yowalil chi el beybalnen eb diácono. Yowalil tol watx'okab chi yut eb beybal satak yet animail. Manokab cabok is ti' eb. Manokab uq'uemanok eb. C'amokab chi yi' eb tumin yin tzet man watx'ok.

English: They must keep hold of the deep truths of the faith with a clear conscience.
Kanjobal: Yowalil caw chi yaoc eb nabal yin juntzan cuybej ak'bil ayon yuj Dios, juntzan bay chi jaoc co c'ul. Yuj tu' yowalilokab chi cha yab eb tzet chi yal yikbomal is nabal.

English: They must first be tested; and then if there is nothing against them, let them serve as deacons.
Kanjobal: Beyc'ulnelayokab eb chi oc diáconoal tu' babelal. Ta c'am is paltail eb chi ilchaji, chi je' yalay oc yopiso eb.

English: In the same way, their wives are to be women worthy of respect, not malicious talkers but temperate and trustworthy in everything.
Kanjobal: Ac'ala' c'apax eb ix ix chi oc yopiso, yowalil watx'okab chi yut eb ix is beybal satak yet animail. Manokab alom k'umalok eb. Yowalil tec'anokab chi yut eb is nabal. Yetok c'apaxok, yikemokabc'al chi yut ba eb ix watx'nen masanil tzet chi cheklay watx'nej.

English: A deacon must be the husband of but one wife and must manage his children and his household well.
Kanjobal: Junnejokab yistzil junjun diácono. Watx'okab yak'on cuenta ba eb yul yatut.

English: Those who have served well gain an excellent standing and great assurance in their faith in Christ Jesus.
Kanjobal: Ta watx' yilon eb diácono tu' yopiso, miman yelapnok eb yul sat yet creyenteal, cax c'am chi xiw eb yaloni tol ayoc Cristo Jesús yin is c'ul.

English: Although I hope to come to you soon, I am writing you these instructions so that,
Kanjobal: Chin toj ayach tu' yet jayeb c'u.

English: if I am delayed, you will know how people ought to conduct themselves in God's household, which is the church of the living God, the pillar and foundation of the truth.
Kanjobal: Palta ta c'uxan chi mayji wapni, yuj tu' chin tz'ibejtok jun in carta ti' ayach, yet watx' chojtaknej elok tzet chi el oten a beybal yul yatut Dios, a ton yiglesia Cham Dios iquis. A yiglesia tu' ay yopiso yoc yipomalok cuybanilej caw yel.

English: Beyond all question, the mystery of godliness is great: He appeared in a body, was vindicated by the Spirit, was seen by angels, was preached among the nations, was believed on in the world, was taken up in glory.
Kanjobal: Wal yel, caw miman yelapnok co cuybanil ak'bil jojtaknej el yuj Dios. Chi yal axca ti': Max tx'oxaj ba Dios yin mimanilejal yet anima. Axa Cham Espíritu tx'oxnak elok, tol caw tojol is nabal. Ilbil Cham yuj eb ángel, albil el yabixal bay xolak nación. Ay eb yet yulyibank'inal ti' max yaoc c'ul yin. Yetok c'apaxok max ilay paxaj Cham satcan.

English: The Spirit clearly says that in later times some will abandon the faith and follow deceiving spirits and things taught by demons.
Kanjobal: Yin jichanil chi yut yalon Cham Yespíritu Dios, tol a yet lananxa jay lajub tiempoal, ay eb ok yican el ba yin creyenteal, cax axa yin cuybej man yelok ok yaoc eb nabal. A juntzan cuybej tu', cuybej demonio.

English: Such teachings come through hypocritical liars, whose consciences have been seared as with a hot iron.
Kanjobal: Ok yacbaj eb txiquin yaben tzet chi yal anima lek'ti'. Cabsat juntzan eb anima tu'. Junelnej wal tol etaxnak el nabal eb sic'libil.

English: They forbid people to marry and order them to abstain from certain foods, which God created to be received with thanksgiving by those who believe and who know the truth.
Kanjobal: Ok tz'ak yal eb axca ti': Ay yowalil chi oc jetbi. Ay juntzan tzet ay yowalil co looni, ẍi eb, ok tz'ak yalon eb lek'ti' tu'. Palta a Dios watx'nenej juntzan tzetak yetal tu', yuj co loon ayon creyente on ti'. Yuj tu' xan a yet chi co looni, chi jal yuj diosalil bay Dios yuj, yujtol jojtakxa jun cuybej acaw yel.

English: For everything God created is good, and nothing is to be rejected if it is received with thanksgiving,
Kanjobal: Masanil tzet watx'nebil yuj Dios, watx'c'al elok. Yuj tu', c'am chi je' jaloni tol ay tzet man watx'ok yul sat. Chi je' co loon masanil tzetak yetal, asan tol chi jal yuj diosalil bay Dios yuj.

English: because it is consecrated by the word of God and prayer.
Kanjobal: Ta chon txajli, cax chi jalon yuj diosalil yuj tzet chi co lo' tu', c'am yowalil, yujtol caytu' yalon k'anej Dios.

English: If you point these things out to the brothers, you will be a good minister of Christ Jesus, brought up in the truths of the faith and of the good teaching that you have followed.
Kanjobal: Ta ok ak' juntzan cuybej ti' cuy eb creyente bay tu', cax chak'on ep yin a cuyon a ba alon juntzan k'anej chi jaoc yin co c'ul, a ton juntzan cuybej caw watx' bay ayoc co nabal, watx' chekbej Jesucristo ach chi yal tu'.

English: Have nothing to do with godless myths and old wives' tales; rather, train yourself to be godly.
Kanjobal: Palta manchak a cha' ab juntzan comon abix c'am yelapnok. Ac'al oc a nabal yin Dios.

English: For physical training is of some value, but godliness has value for all things, holding promise for both the present life and the life to come.
Kanjobal: Ta chi co k'aytzej co mimanil yet watx' ay jip, watx' toni; palta yelxac'al ec'ban watx'il ta chi jaoc co nabal yin Dios. Ta caytu' chi jut co ba, ay is watx'il ok co cha' bay yulyibank'inal ti', c'al bay satcan.

English: This is a trustworthy saying that deserves full acceptance
Kanjobal: A jun cuybej ti', caw wal yel. Moj chi co cha' jab yin masanil co c'ul.

English: (and for this we labor and strive), that we have put our hope in the living God, who is the Savior of all men, and especially of those who believe.
Kanjobal: Yujc'al ton jun ti', xan chi jiajtek co c'ulok jak'on jip co mulnaj yin yet Dios, yujtol a Cham Dios iquis chi jaoc yipok co c'ul. A Dios, is Colomal masanil anima yayji. A eb chi yaoc c'ul yin, ok colchaj eb yuj.

English: Command and teach these things.
Kanjobal: A juntzan tzet chi waltok ayach ti', caw chi cam alon bay eb creyente bay tu', cax cha cuyon eb yin.

English: Don't let anyone look down on you because you are young, but set an example for the believers in speech, in life, in love, in faith and in purity.
Kanjobal: Watx'c'al chot a ba satak eb creyente masanil, yet watx' c'am mac chach alon uninal. Watx' chot k'anjab a ba bay eb. Watx' chot a ba satak eb. Watx' chot a camc'ulnen eb. Asannejokab Cham Jajawil chaoc yin a c'ul. Tojolc'al chot a nabal yil eb, yet watx' caytu' chot a tx'oxon watx' beybalej yil eb bay tu'.

English: Until I come, devote yourself to the public reading of Scripture, to preaching and to teaching.
Kanjobal: Yak'ban chin apni, ak' ep awten tx'an k'anej Dios yab eb. Chak' ep a jekon oc nabal eb, c'al a cuyon eb.

English: Do not neglect your gift, which was given you through a prophetic message when the body of elders laid their hands on you.
Kanjobal: Manchak a bek ilnej opiso ak'bil yuj Dios yet max batxban ajtok eb anciano k'ab yiban a jolom. A Dios ak'nej nachaj el yuj eb tol ok ach k'anbalnej, xan max ak'lay c'apax ojtaknej elok tzet ok ot ak'on serbil.

English: Be diligent in these matters; give yourself wholly to them, so that everyone may see your progress.
Kanjobal: Caw chaoc juntzan chi waltok ayach ti' yin a c'ul, yet watx' ok yil eb masanil bay tu', tol cac'al ti' eon ep junjun c'u.

English: Watch your life and doctrine closely. Persevere in them, because if you do, you will save both yourself and your hearers.
Kanjobal: Taynej a ba, cax chi cam eloni tzet cuybanilejal chak' cuy eb. Tec'anc'al chot a ba yet watx' ok a col a ba, cax ok colchaj c'apax eb chi aben tzet chala'.

English: Do not rebuke an older man harshly, but exhort him as if he were your father. Treat younger men as brothers,
Kanjobal: Manchak a tzu eb cham ichamtak winak. Jek oc nabal eb yin watx'c'ulalil axca chot alon junok tzet yetal bay a mam. C'al bay eb nak ach'ejtak winak, watx'c'al chot alon yab eb nak, axca chot alon yab junok caw oẍtak.

English: older women as mothers, and younger women as sisters, with absolute purity.
Kanjobal: Ac'ala' c'apax bay eb xal ixnamil ix, watx' chot alon yab eb axca chot alon yab a txutx. C'al bay eb ix k'opoj ix, watx'c'al chot alon yab eb, axca bay junok acaw anab. Manokab cab satok chot k'anjab a ba bay eb.

English: Give proper recognition to those widows who are really in need.
Kanjobal: Chi wal c'apaxtok juntzan chekbanil ti' ayach yuj eb ix ix camnakxa yichamil. A ton eb junelnej wal tol tx'oklil, yowalil chon colwaj bay eb ix.

English: But if a widow has children or grandchildren, these should learn first of all to put their religion into practice by caring for their own family and so repaying their parents and grandparents, for this is pleasing to God.
Kanjobal: Ta ay eb ix ay yune', ma yitxiquin, yowalil cha cuy eb uneej tu' c'al eb itxiquinej tu', tol a eb cuenta yak'on colwal bay is mam, c'al bay is txutx, yuj yak'on eb pak tzet max ak'lay bay eb. Ta chi beybalnej eb axca ti', caw watx' yul sat Dios.

English: The widow who is really in need and left all alone puts her hope in God and continues night and day to pray and to ask God for help.
Kanjobal: Ay eb xal chi cam yichamil, cax caw yel tol tx'oklilxac'al, asanxanej Dios chi yaoc eb yipok c'ul. C'ualil c'al ak'balil txajc'al chi yun eb bay Dios, yuj k'anon eb tzet chi k'anabax oc yuj.

English: But the widow who lives for pleasure is dead even while she lives.
Kanjobal: Palta ay eb xal camnakxa yichamil chi yak' is nabal yin tzet chi yochej c'ul. Caxc'al iquis eb tu' yul sat anima, palta yul sat Dios camnak el eb.

English: Give the people these instructions, too, so that no one may be open to blame.
Kanjobal: Chi cam alon juntzan cuybej ti' bay eb xal bay tu', yet watx' c'amokab mac yob tzet chi alon yin eb.

English: If anyone does not provide for his relatives, and especially for his immediate family, he has denied the faith and is worse than an unbeliever.
Kanjobal: Ta ay eb creyente c'am chi colwaj bay is mam, c'al bay is txutx, ma bay is mam yican, c'al bay eb ayic' yetok yul yatut, titol c'am jabok yelapnok cuybej Cristo bay eb chi yal tu', cax ec'ban yobal eb yintak eb man creyenteok.

English: No widow may be put on the list of widows unless she is over sixty, has been faithful to her husband,
Kanjobal: A eb xal camnakxa yichamil ok waltek ti', chi je' yoc eb cargook iglesia: Eb xal ayxa 60 abil is k'inal, eb xal tol c'amc'al bay max say is mul yul k'ab yichamil.

English: and is well known for her good deeds, such as bringing up children, showing hospitality, washing the feet of the saints, helping those in trouble and devoting herself to all kinds of good deeds.
Kanjobal: Eb xal miman txequel tol watx' is beybal satak yet creyenteal. Eb watx' max yut yilon ch'ib yune', eb xal max beybalnej ak'oj posada. Eb max yak' serbil yet creyenteal yin ayilal, eb max colwaj bay eb ayoc yin yailal, eb watx'c'al tzet chi el yuneni. Asan ton eb xal ti' chi je' yoc cargook iglesia.

English: As for younger widows, do not put them on such a list. For when their sensual desires overcome their dedication to Christ, they want to marry.
Kanjobal: A pax eb ix k'opoj ixto xin, cax chi cam yichamil, man a chaoc eb cargook iglesia. Yujtol ay eb, a wal tzet chi yochej c'ul chi beybalnej, cax chi bekoncan eb Cristo. Asan junokxa yichamil eb chi na'.

English: Thus they bring judgment on themselves, because they have broken their first pledge.
Kanjobal: Ok beyc'ulnelay eb, yujtol c'am chi yikej eb bay max yak' is ti'.

English: Besides, they get into the habit of being idle and going about from house to house. And not only do they become idlers, but also gossips and busybodies, saying things they ought not to.
Kanjobal: Yetok c'apaxok, chi yilil eb ix isajil. Asanxanej k'anej chi yil yun eb ix xolak na. Man asannejok tol chi yilil eb ix isajil, palta chi yil c'apax el eb ix wajoj k'anej, cax comon chi yaltok eb ix yet xol junok tzet yetal bay c'am yalon yet, cax chi yalon c'apax eb ix tzet man watx'ok.

English: So I counsel younger widows to marry, to have children, to manage their homes and to give the enemy no opportunity for slander.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu' xan chi wochej tol a eb ix k'opoj ixto camnakxa yichamil, watx' chi yi' eb ix junokxa yichamil. Unewokokab eb ix. Yak'okab cuenta eb ix yul yatut. Ta chi yikej eb axca walon ti', c'am tzet chi je' yalon eb ajc'ul jin yuj eb ix.

English: Some have in fact already turned away to follow Satan.
Kanjobal: Chi waltok juntzan ti' ayach, yujtol ay eb ix camnakxa yichamil meltzojnakxa yintak. Axa Satanás chi yak' serbil eb ix tinani'.

English: If any woman who is a believer has widows in her family, she should help them and not let the church be burdened with them, so that the church can help those widows who are really in need.
Kanjobal: A jantak creyente aj lugar bay tu', caxc'al winak, ma ix, ta ay junok xal ix camnakxa yichamil ayic' yintak, yowalil chi colwaj eb bay xal. Yujtol man mojok ta a iglesia chi cargonen eb. Asan eb xal caw is tx'oklil, a eb moj chi col-lay yuj iglesia, yujtol maj tzakay iglesia cuentanen eb xal masanil.

English: The elders who direct the affairs of the church well are worthy of double honor, especially those whose work is preaching and teaching.
Kanjobal: A eb anciano watx' yak'on cuenta yet creyenteal, yowalil ayokab ay yelapnok eb yul sat yet creyenteal masanil. Mawal eb chi yak' yip cuywaji, c'al yalon el k'anej Dios, yelxac'al ec'ban yelapnok eb.

English: For the Scripture says, “Do not muzzle the ox while it is treading out the grain,” and “The worker deserves his wages.”
Kanjobal: Yujtol ẍi tx'an Un axca ti': Manchak e yaoc pa yin ti no no' yet chi tec'wi trigo, ẍi. Cax chi yalon c'apax tx'an axca ti': A mac chi mulnaji, moj chaon is tojol, ẍi.

English: Do not entertain an accusation against an elder unless it is brought by two or three witnesses.
Kanjobal: Ta ay mac chi ak'on queja junok anciano, yowalil ayokab cawanok, ma oxwanok testigo. Ta c'am cawan oxwan testigo tu', man a cha' ab tzet chi al-lay aj yin tu'.

English: Those who sin are to be rebuked publicly, so that the others may take warning.
Kanjobal: Ta ay mac c'am chi bekcan yunen yobtakil, cha tenchanej satak eb creyente masanil, yet watx' chi xiw eb masanil yoc is yobtakil.

English: I charge you, in the sight of God and Christ Jesus and the elect angels, to keep these instructions without partiality, and to do nothing out of favoritism.
Kanjobal: Satak Dios, yetok satak Jesucristo, c'al satak eb is yángel sic'bilcan el yuj, chi cam walontok ayach, tol chekej juntzan chekbanilej ti', yin tol c'am a q'uexanc'ulal yin junjun.

English: Do not be hasty in the laying on of hands, and do not share in the sins of others. Keep yourself pure.
Kanjobal: Man comonok chaoc yopiso junok mactxel yin ayman, yet c'amto chi cam elon is beybal, yujtol axa talaj chi yunajok, chach locaytok xol is yobtakil. I el a ba yin tzanc'al tzet man watx'ok.

English: Stop drinking only water, and use a little wine because of your stomach and your frequent illnesses.
Kanjobal: Chi waltok ayach yuj a c'ul, ilab tol ya'c'al. Manokab asannejok aej choq'uej. Chi je' oq'uen jabok vino, yet watx' chi watx'ji a c'ul tu'.

English: The sins of some men are obvious, reaching the place of judgment ahead of them; the sins of others trail behind them.
Kanjobal: Ay mac miman txequelxa is yobtakil yet manto beyc'ulnelayok. Ay mac xin, masantac'al chi beyc'ulnelayi, catatu' chi txecloj aj is yobtakil.

English: In the same way, good deeds are obvious, and even those that are not cannot be hidden.
Kanjobal: Cay c'apax tu' eb watx' is beybal, miman txequelxa eb tol watx' is beybal eb. Ta ay eb watx' is beybal c'amto chi txecloj elok, yowalil ok txeclojc'alta' el eb.

English: All who are under the yoke of slavery should consider their masters worthy of full respect, so that God's name and our teaching may not be slandered.
Kanjobal: Chi wal c'apaxtok ayach yuj eb creyente ayoc yin mosejal. Mimanokab yelapnok patrón eb yul sat, yet watx' c'am chi buchlay Dios, c'al co cuybej bay ayoc co nabal yuj beybal eb.

English: Those who have believing masters are not to show less respect for them because they are brothers. Instead, they are to serve them even better, because those who benefit from their service are believers, and dear to them. These are the things you are to teach and urge on them.
Kanjobal: Ta ay eb ayoc yin mosejal yintak yet creyenteal, mimanokabc'alta' yelapnok yul sat eb. Watx'okab chi yut mulnaj ba eb bay, yujtol yet creyenteal ba eb yetok mac ay tzet chi yi' yin is mulnajil eb, xan camc'ulnelayokab eb yuj eb. Chi cam alon juntzan chekbanil ti' bay eb, cax cha cuyon eb yin.

English: If anyone teaches false doctrines and does not agree to the sound instruction of our Lord Jesus Christ and to godly teaching,
Kanjobal: A cuybej Cham Jajawil Jesucristo caw yel, palta ay mac c'am chi yaoc c'ul yin juntzan cuybej tu'. Tx'ok cuybej chi el yalon eb. C'am chi yochej eb juntzan cuybej chi alon tzet chi jut jaon oc co nabal yin Dios.

English: he is conceited and understands nothing. He has an unhealthy interest in controversies and quarrels about words that result in envy, strife, malicious talk, evil suspicions
Kanjobal: A mac axca tu' chi yut ba, c'am jabok tzet yojtak eb, toc'al chi maynej ba eb. Chi yochej eb comon chi yak'lej owal yetok junokxa mactxel. Chi yochej c'apax eb chi teyelej ba yin juntzan k'anej. Asan juntzan ti' chi yilc'al yun eb. Palta yuj ton juntzan tzet chi el yunen eb tu', xan chi pitzc'oj aj chichonc'ulal, owal, buchwal, yob nabalejal, c'al teyelejbail.

English: and constant friction between men of corrupt mind, who have been robbed of the truth and who think that godliness is a means to financial gain.
Kanjobal: Axca ton ti' chi yut ba eb etaxnak el is nabal, eb c'amxa chi yaoc nabal yin cuybej acaw yel. Chi yochej eb chi yi' eb tumin yin co cuybanil.

English: But godliness with contentment is great gain.
Kanjobal: Yel, miman ton watx'il chi ji' yin co cuybanil, ta chi jak' tzalojbok co c'ul yetok tzet ayon.

English: For we brought nothing into the world, and we can take nothing out of it.
Kanjobal: A yet chon alji, c'am jabok tzet ibil oc juj chon jayi. Ac'ala' c'apax yet ok on paxok, c'am jabok tzet ok je' jiontok bay yulyibank'inal ti'.

English: But if we have food and clothing, we will be content with that.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu', ta ay tzet chi co lo' cax ta ay co pichil, tzalojokonek.

English: People who want to get rich fall into temptation and a trap and into many foolish and harmful desires that plunge men into ruin and destruction.
Kanjobal: Akxa tinani', ay creyente asannejok beyomal chi yochej. Yuj ton tu' xan c'un yak'lay etax el eb yuj tzet man watx'ok. Axca tol chi ayc'ay eb yul junok trampa, yujtol xiwil juntzan tzet c'am yopiso chi yochej oc eb. Caw ay is may chi etax el eb yuj. Yuj juntzan tzet chi yochej oc eb tu', xan chi etax el nabal eb junelnej. Yuj tu' caytu' ok yun c'aycan el eb.

English: For the love of money is a root of all kinds of evil. Some people, eager for money, have wandered from the faith and pierced themselves with many griefs.
Kanjobal: Ta pek' on yin ch'en tumin, chi je' chon toj yin tzanc'al tzet makanil yobtakil yuj ch'en. Ay eb asan tumin chi yochej ocok. Yuj tu' xan max bekcan eb juntzan cuybej bay max tz'ak yalej oc c'ul. Mimek cusc'ulal wal max yitek eb yiban.

English: But you, man of God, flee from all this, and pursue righteousness, godliness, faith, love, endurance and gentleness.
Kanjobal: Ach Timoteo, tol yet achxa Dios, ontawal juntzan tzet c'am watx'il max waltek ti'. Tojolc'al chot a beybal. Asanokab yin Dios chaoc a c'ul, c'al a nabal. Ayokab a camc'ulal. Tec'baj a ba aben yail. Yaynakil chot a ba.

English: Fight the good fight of the faith. Take hold of the eternal life to which you were called when you made your good confession in the presence of many witnesses.
Kanjobal: Axca junok soldado caw tec'an chi yut ba, cayokab tu' chot aon oc a c'ul yin Cham Jajawil. Axca ti' chot a chaon a k'inal tol ayc'al yin tojbalk'inal. Yuj a chaon a k'inal tu', xan max ach yawtej oc Dios yetok. Caw watx' max ot alon satak masanil eb max aben aloni, tol Jajawil ton Jesucristo.

English: In the sight of God, who gives life to everything, and of Christ Jesus, who while testifying before Pontius Pilate made the good confession, I charge you
Kanjobal: Satak Dios, Cham ak'om k'inalej, c'al satak Jesucristo, tol watx' max yut yak'on ba testigoal satak Poncio Pilato, chi cam walontok ayach,

English: to keep this command without spot or blame until the appearing of our Lord Jesus Christ,
Kanjobal: tol caw chekej juntzan chekbanil ti' sic'libil. Watx'c'al chot a beybal, masantac'al chi jay Cham Jajawil Jesucristo.

English: which God will bring about in his own time–God, the blessed and only Ruler, the King of kings and Lord of lords,
Kanjobal: Ato yet ok jay jun tiempoal tol nabil yuj Dios, catatu' ok tx'oxon aj Jesucristo. Yujtol asan Dios ay is yikbej, cax tzalojc'ulalc'al ay. A ton Dios Reyal eb rey, c'al Yajawil eb yajaw c'apaxok.

English: who alone is immortal and who lives in unapproachable light, whom no one has seen or can see. To him be honor and might forever. Amen.
Kanjobal: Asan Dios man cambejalok yayji. Xol sakk'inal ay Cham. C'am junok mac chi je' yapni is c'atan. C'amto junok mac maxax ilon yin Dios, yujtol c'am junok mac chi je' yoc t'anan yin. Mimanokab yelapnok Cham yul co sat. Ayokab yikbej Cham yul co sat yin tojbalk'inal. Yunokabi.

English: Command those who are rich in this present world not to be arrogant nor to put their hope in wealth, which is so uncertain, but to put their hope in God, who richly provides us with everything for our enjoyment.
Kanjobal: Al juntzan chekbanil ok waltek ti' bay eb creyente beyom yin tzetak yetal bay yulyibank'inal ti'. Chi cam alon yab eb, tol manchak maynej ba eb. Manchak yaoc eb beyomal tu' yipok c'ul, yujtol man tojbalk'inalok ay. Cax chalon bay eb tol asanokab Dios chi yaoc eb yipok c'ul. Yujtol a Cham chi ak'on masanil tzet ayon, yuj jak'on tzalojbok co c'ul yin tzet chi yak' ayon tu'.

English: Command them to do good, to be rich in good deeds, and to be generous and willing to share.
Kanjobal: Chal bay eb, tol watx' chi yut eb is beybal, xiwil tzet watx' chi je' el yunen eb. Colwajokab eb bay eb meba', bekanokab chi yut eb c'ul sawaj bay eb.

English: In this way they will lay up treasure for themselves as a firm foundation for the coming age, so that they may take hold of the life that is truly life.
Kanjobal: Ta chi beybalnej eb axca chi wal ti', ok wajbaj eb tzet ok yi' eb yet yajtok tu', ok yi' c'apax eb jun acaw k'inalej.

English: Timothy, guard what has been entrusted to your care. Turn away from godless chatter and the opposing ideas of what is falsely called knowledge,
Kanjobal: Ach Timoteo, taynejc'al tzet max abenelay oc yul a k'ab. Ay eb comonc'al chi yal tzetak yetal nabac'al. Caw c'am jabok yelapnok tzet chi yal eb chi yaloc ba jelanil tu'. Besil a ba xol eb.

English: which some have professed and in so doing have wandered from the faith. Grace be with you.
Kanjobal: Yujtol ay eb chi yaoc c'ul yin juntzan lek'tial chi yal eb tu'. Yuj tu', xan chi bekcan eb cuybej max yaoc yin c'ul yin babelal. Yak'okabc'al Dios is watx'c'ulal ayach bay tu'.

English: Paul, an apostle of Christ Jesus by the will of God, and Timothy our brother, To the church of God in Corinth, together with all the saints throughout Achaia:
Kanjobal: Ayin Pablo in ti', chekbej in Jesucristo, yujtol axca tu' max el yin c'ul Dios. Ajun Timoteo wetok cax chin tz'ibentok jun in carta ti' ayex ex yiglesiaxa Dios bay Corinto. Chin tz'ibej c'apaxtok ayex e masanil ex yet-xa Dios bay yul yet Acaya.

English: Grace and peace to you from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
Kanjobal: Yak'okabc'al co Mam Dios, c'al Cham Jajawil Jesucristo is watx'c'ulal, c'al is junc'ulal ayex.

English: Praise be to the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, the Father of compassion and the God of all comfort,
Kanjobal: Jalek watx' k'anej bay Dios, is Mam Cham Jajawil Jesucristo, a ton Cham Mamej tol caw chi ok' c'ul jin.

English: who comforts us in all our troubles, so that we can comfort those in any trouble with the comfort we ourselves have received from God.
Kanjobal: A yet chi jay yailal jiban, a' chi ak'on mimanil co c'ul, yet watx' chi je' jak'on mimanil c'ul eb chi jayoc yailal yiban. Axca chi yut yak'on Cham mimanil co c'ul, cayokab tu' chi jut c'apax jak'on mimanil c'ul eb.

English: For just as the sufferings of Christ flow over into our lives, so also through Christ our comfort overflows.
Kanjobal: A tinani', caw chi jab yail yetok Cristo, palta ac'al oc chi ak'on pax mimanil co c'ul. Axca chi jut jaben yail tu', caytu' chi yun yak'lay c'apax mimanil co c'ul.

English: If we are distressed, it is for your comfort and salvation; if we are comforted, it is for your comfort, which produces in you patient endurance of the same sufferings we suffer.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu' chi jab yail yet watx' chi je' ex co mimanc'ulneni, c'al yuj e colchaji. Yetok c'apaxok, chi yak' Dios mimanil co c'ul, yet watx' jojtak tzet ok ex jut co mimanc'ulneni, yet watx' che tec'baj e ba e yak'on techaj tzet ok jay e yiban, axca tzet chi jay jiban.

English: And our hope for you is firm, because we know that just as you share in our sufferings, so also you share in our comfort.
Kanjobal: Chic'al jaoc Dios yipok co c'ul, yet chi jiloni tol ayex jun che yab yail jetok. Jojtak, tol axca chi yun e yaben yail ti', caytu' ok yun e mimanc'ulnelay yuj Dios.

English: We do not want you to be uninformed, brothers, about the hardships we suffered in the province of Asia. We were under great pressure, far beyond our ability to endure, so that we despaired even of life.
Kanjobal: Ex wuẍtak, ex wanab, chi jochej che yojtaknej elok, jantak yailal ec' jilnak bay yul yet Asia, yujtol xiwil yailal ec' jilnak bay tu', xan ijan wal maj techaj juj. A co naoni tol maj onxa colchaj el yul k'ab camich.

English: Indeed, in our hearts we felt the sentence of death. But this happened that we might not rely on ourselves but on God, who raises the dead.
Kanjobal: A co naoni, tol ok on camxac'al bay tu'. Max eq'uel juntzan tu' jiban, yet watx' asan Dios chi jaoc yipok co c'ul, yujtol a' chi ak'on ictzoj aj eb camnak. Axa on xin, c'am chi jaoc yipok co c'ul tol chi je' co colon co ba yul jet.

English: He has delivered us from such a deadly peril, and he will deliver us. On him we have set our hope that he will continue to deliver us,
Kanjobal: Jabxanej man camnakok on yuj mimek yailal tu'; palta axa Dios max on colon elok. Lananc'al co col-lay el yuj tinani'. Ayoc Cham yipok co c'ul sic'libil, tol ok on is colc'al bay juntzan yailal tu'.

English: as you help us by your prayers. Then many will give thanks on our behalf for the gracious favor granted us in answer to the prayers of many.
Kanjobal: Ta chex colwaj yin txaj jetok, cax xiwil ex ok ex txajlok juj, ac'ala' xiwil ex ok e yal yuj diosalil bay Dios yuj is watx'c'ulal ok yak' ayon, chi yal tu'.

English: Now this is our boast: Our conscience testifies that we have conducted ourselves in the world, and especially in our relations with you, in the holiness and sincerity that are from God. We have done so not according to worldly wisdom but according to God's grace.
Kanjobal: Caw chon tzaloji, yujtol yojtak wal co c'ul, tol tojolc'al chi jut co beybal on bay masanil anima, c'al ayex. C'am tzet yob yin co beybal, yujtol max yak' Dios is yipalil ayon yuj is watx'c'ulal. Man yujok co jelanil xan watx' co beybal tu', c'amak.

English: For we do not write you anything you cannot read or understand. And I hope that,
Kanjobal: A yet chi co tz'ibentok co carta ayex, asan juntzan tzet chi je' e yilon ajok, cax chi je' nachaj el e yuj, asan chi co tz'ibejtok ayex. Yelc'ulalokab chi nachaj el e yuj sic'libil xin.

English: as you have understood us in part, you will come to understand fully that you can boast of us just as we will boast of you in the day of the Lord Jesus.
Kanjobal: Chi waoc yipok in c'ul, tol ok nachaj el e yuj sic'libil, tol a yet ok jay Cham Jajawil Jesús, ok ex tzaloj aj juj, cax chon tzaloj c'apax aj e yuj.

English: Because I was confident of this, I planned to visit you first so that you might benefit twice.
Kanjobal: Ayoc jun ti' yipok in c'ul, yuj tu' max in nabalnej el ex ec' wilon yin babelal, yet watx' cayel chin ec' ayman ayex, cax chi cam wal e chaoncan is watx'c'ulalil Dios.

English: I planned to visit you on my way to Macedonia and to come back to you from Macedonia, and then to have you send me on my way to Judea.
Kanjobal: Max in nabalnej el ex ec' wiloni, catatu bian, chin jayoc bay Macedonia ti'. Axa yet chin meltzoj paxtok cayti', cax chex ec' wilon pax junelxa in naoni. Ta axca tu', ok je' e colwaj ayin yin in viaje yet ok in tok bay Judea.

English: When I planned this, did I do it lightly? Or do I make my plans in a worldly manner so that in the same breath I say, “Yes, yes” and “No, no”?
Kanjobal: A yet max in nabalnen el axca ti', ¿comonc'al mi max in na', e naoni? ¿Chi mi e na' tol toc'al chin na' juntzan ti' axca chi yun nabalnen el eb comon anima junok is tzet yetal? ¿Chi mi e na' tol Ja' quin chi junok bek, C'amak quin chixanaj pax yet junokxa bek?

English: But as surely as God is faithful, our message to you is not “Yes” and “No.”
Kanjobal: Yojtak Dios, tol c'am junelok chi jal ayex axca ti': Ja' con chinaji, palta tekan chi yal elapnok, C'amak.

English: For the Son of God, Jesus Christ, who was preached among you by me and Silas and Timothy, was not “Yes” and “No,” but in him it has always been “Yes.”
Kanjobal: A Cristo Jesús C'ajol Dios, a' ec' jalnak on yabixal e nan e xol. Ec' yalnak c'apax Silvano yetok Timoteo. A Cristo, c'am junelok max yal axca ti': Ja' ẍi junok bek, axa junokxa bek xin, chi q'uexon is ti' cax chi yaloni: C'amakxa, ẍi paxok. Yujtol asan tzet yetal yel max el yaloni.

English: For no matter how many promises God has made, they are “Yes” in Christ. And so through him the “Amen” is spoken by us to the glory of God.
Kanjobal: A' chi ak'on yun masanil yalben Dios. Yuj tu' xan a yet chi jalon co watx' k'anej bay Dios, Yunokabi con chi, yujtol jojtak, tol ok yun yuj Cristo Jesús.

English: Now it is God who makes both us and you stand firm in Christ. He anointed us,
Kanjobal: A Dios chi ak'on tec'anil e nabal jetok, yujtol ayon oc yul k'ab Cristo. A Dios max con ion oc yetok.

English: set his seal of ownership on us, and put his Spirit in our hearts as a deposit, guaranteeing what is to come.
Kanjobal: A Cham max aon oc co selloal, a ton Cham is Yespíritu max cajbaj oc jin junjun on. A Cham Yespíritu chi tx'oxon el ayon, tol yel ok co cha' masanil juntzan tzet max yak' ti' yak'on ayon.

English: I call God as my witness that it was in order to spare you that I did not return to Corinth.
Kanjobal: Chi wochej tol c'am chex wak' cusok; yuj tu', c'amto chin toj bay Corinto tu'. Wal yel chi wala', in testigo Dios, yujtol yojtak Cham sic'libil tzet ay yin in nabal.

English: Not that we lord it over your faith, but we work with you for your joy, because it is by faith you stand firm.
Kanjobal: C'am chi jochej tol ayonxac'al chi jal tzet che yut e yaon oc e c'ul yin Dios, yujtol tec'an exxa yin e creyenteal. Palta chi jochej tol chex co colo' yin co jekon e na', yet watx' chi texac'al aj can e tzalojc'ulal.

English: By the meekness and gentleness of Christ, I appeal to you–I, Paul, who am “timid” when face to face with you, but “bold” when away!
Kanjobal: A Cristo, yaynakil yutnak ba, xiwil is watx'c'ulal. Axca yutnak ba tu', caytu' chi wut tewoktok in ba ayex ayin Pablo in ti'. Chi al-layi, tol ayilal ab chi wut in ba yet ayin ec' e yetok, palta axa ab yet ayin ec' najat xin, tolab caw ow in.

English: I beg you that when I come I may not have to be as bold as I expect to be toward some people who think that we live by the standards of this world.
Kanjobal: Palta chin tewitok ayex, yet watx' a yet ok in apnok ayex tu', manokab owok ok wut in ba, yujtol ay ex lanan e yalon jin, tol lajan chi jut co ba axca junok comon anima. Palta ayin ti', man ok in xiw in teyelen in ba yetok eb chi alon axca tu'.

English: For though we live in the world, we do not wage war as the world does.
Kanjobal: Yel toni, naba anima onc'al, palta man lajanok chi jut jak'on jip axca chi yut yak'on eb comon anima yip yul yet.

English: The weapons we fight with are not the weapons of the world. On the contrary, they have divine power to demolish strongholds.
Kanjobal: Manak tzet yetal yet yulyibank'inal ti' chi co mitx'k'abnej, cax chi jak'on jip. Palta asan tzet bay ayoc yipalil Dios chi co k'anbalnej, yet watx' a juntzan tzet chi ali tol ay yip tu', chi can eb yalan juj.

English: We demolish arguments and every pretension that sets itself up against the knowledge of God, and we take captive every thought to make it obedient to Christ.
Kanjobal: A comon jelanil chi can yalan juj. Ay c'apax eb tol yuj is maynejbail chi tenon yin yojtaknelay Dios. Palta chi can c'apax jun maynejbailal tu' yalan juj. Axa masanil comon nabalej, chi jacan oc masanil yul k'ab Cristo, yet watx' yikemokabxac'al chi yut ba bay.

English: And we will be ready to punish every act of disobedience, once your obedience is complete.
Kanjobal: A yet chixa e yikej masanil ayex ti', watx'xatac'a jayji on yin jak'on cuenta eb c'am chi iken e xol tu'.

English: You are looking only on the surface of things. If anyone is confident that he belongs to Christ, he should consider again that we belong to Christ just as much as he.
Kanjobal: Ayex ti', asan tzet che yil ocok ayoc e nabal yin. Ta ayex che na' tol yet ex Cristo, ojtaknejek elok tol yet on c'apax Cristo on ayon ti'.

English: For even if I boast somewhat freely about the authority the Lord gave us for building you up rather than pulling you down, I will not be ashamed of it.
Kanjobal: Caxc'al xiwil chi walubtanen jopiso ayex, palta maj in q'uixwok aj yuj, yujtol a Cham Jajawil ak'nej jopiso on ti', yuj ex jiptzeni; man yujok ex jak'on etax elok, xan max yak' jopiso ti'.

English: I do not want to seem to be trying to frighten you with my letters.
Kanjobal: Caytu' chi wut walontok ayex, yet watx' c'am che na' tol toc'al chex in xibtej aj yuj juntzan in carta chi watok ayex.

English: For some say, “His letters are weighty and forceful, but in person he is unimpressive and his speaking amounts to nothing.”
Kanjobal: Yujtol ayex ab che yal win axca ti': A juntzan is carta tu', caw ow yaloni, caw ay yip, palta c'am jabok yopiso cham chi jila'. A is k'anjabi, c'amxac'al yelapnok jabok chi jabej, quex chi abi.

English: Such people should realize that what we are in our letters when we are absent, we will be in our actions when we are present.
Kanjobal: Palta a mac ex che yal axca tu', nachajokab el jun ti' e yuj. Axca chi wut walontok ayex ti' yet najat ayin, caytu' ok wut in ba yet ok in apnok e xol tu'.

English: We do not dare to classify or compare ourselves with some who commend themselves. When they measure themselves by themselves and compare themselves with themselves, they are not wise.
Kanjobal: Ayon ti', maj co tec'baj co ba co naoni, tol lajan on axca juntzanxa eb chi yaloc ba watx'il yul yet. C'am chi co lajbaj co ba yetok eb. A eb tu' c'am jabok nabal eb, yujtol junjunc'al eb, asanc'al is nabal chi k'anbalnej yin beyc'ulnen ba. Yetok c'apaxok, chi tz'ak lajbaj eb nabal yetok juntzanxa eb tu'.

English: We, however, will not boast beyond proper limits, but will confine our boasting to the field God has assigned to us, a field that reaches even to you.
Kanjobal: Ayon ti', c'am chi jak' tzalojbok co c'ul yuj juntzan tzet c'am jalon jet yin. Tx'oxbil ayon yuj Dios, baytakc'al lugaril chon ec' mulnajil. A' chanej on tok ayex bay Corinto tu'.

English: We are not going too far in our boasting, as would be the case if we had not come to you, for we did get as far as you with the gospel of Christ.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu', man lananok jaon oc co ba yin is mulnajil junokxa mactxel. K'inalok ta maj on betic' junelok ayex, c'am mi jalon jet co mulnaj e nan e xol tinani', palta ayon babel max on apni oc ayex yetok yabixal Cristo.

English: Neither do we go beyond our limits by boasting of work done by others. Our hope is that, as your faith continues to grow, our area of activity among you will greatly expand,
Kanjobal: C'am bay chi jak' tzalojbok co c'ul yin is mulnajil junokxa mactxel, c'am bay chi jaloc jetok. Palta chi jaoc jun ti' yipok co c'ul, tol a yet ok aj can e yaonc'al oc e c'ul yin Dios, catatu' ok je' co mulnaj e xol, palta a yin axca tu' manak is mulnajil junokxa mactxel ok jaloc jetok.

English: so that we can preach the gospel in the regions beyond you. For we do not want to boast about work already done in another man's territory.
Kanjobal: Ok lajwok tu', cax ok on tok jalon el k'anejal yet colbanilej yinlak el e conob tu'; palta man ok jak' tzalojbok co c'ul yin mulnajil juntzanokxa mac ec'nakxa bay tu'.

English: But, “Let him who boasts boast in the Lord.”
Kanjobal: Man yujok tzet chi junej xan chi jak' tzalojbok co c'ul; palta jak'ek tzalojbok co c'ul yuj tzet chi yun Cham Jajawil.

English: For it is not the one who commends himself who is approved, but the one whom the Lord commends.
Kanjobal: Ay eb munilc'al chi yal ba watx'il yul yet, palta manak eb tu' yel watx'. Asan mac chi al-lay watx'il yuj Cham Jajawil, asan eb tu' watx'.

English: I hope you will put up with a little of my foolishness; but you are already doing that.
Kanjobal: Matawal che yak' techaj juntzan ok waltok ayex ti'. Axca tol c'am in nabal xan chi waltok axca ti', palta ak'ek techajok.

English: I am jealous for you with a godly jealousy. I promised you to one husband, to Christ, so that I might present you as a pure virgin to him.
Kanjobal: Caw wal chex in ya'ilnej axca chex yut ya'ilnen Dios, yujtol toxa max wak' in trato yetok Cristo, tol ok ex waoc yul k'ab. Axca wal junok ix k'opoj ix c'amto tzet chi el yuneni, cax chi alay oc yul k'ab yichamil, matawal cayex tu' yet ok ex waon oc yul k'ab Cristo.

English: But I am afraid that just as Eve was deceived by the serpent's cunning, your minds may somehow be led astray from your sincere and pure devotion to Christ.
Kanjobal: Palta chin xiwi, talaj c'uxan che yak' e ba yilay aytek e sat axca max yut yak'on ba Eva yilay aytek sat yuj jelanil jun mac yutnak ba labajil, talaj c'uxan caytu' che yut e yak'on e ba etnelay c'apaxok, cax yujc'al tu' xan ayman che yiel e c'ul yin Cristo, cax manxa tojolok che yut e ba axca chi yochej Cham.

English: For if someone comes to you and preaches a Jesus other than the Jesus we preached, or if you receive a different spirit from the one you received, or a different gospel from the one you accepted, you put up with it easily enough.
Kanjobal: Yujtol ay eb chi ec' alon juntzanokxa tx'ok cuybanilej ayex. Axca tol tx'ok junokxa Jesús chi ec' yal eb, cax manak jun chi ec' jalilok, palta lanan e chaon e yab bay eb. Lanan e chaon junokxa espíritu bay eb, palta man axcaok Cham chabilxa e yuj. Lanan e yaon oc e c'ul yin jun yabixal colbanilej, palta manak jun e yabnakcan ayon.

English: But I do not think I am in the least inferior to those “super-apostles.”
Kanjobal: A eb tu', caw wal chekbej Cristo eb chi tz'ak yalon eb, palta chin na', tol c'am jabok ec'ban yelapnok eb wintak.

English: I may not be a trained speaker, but I do have knowledge. We have made this perfectly clear to you in every way.
Kanjobal: Caxc'al man jelanok in k'anjabi, palta a tzet wojtak, caw miman yelapnok. Masanilc'al tzet ec' wunnak e xol, a chi tx'oxk'abnen elok tol ay tzet wojtak.

English: Was it a sin for me to lower myself in order to elevate you by preaching the gospel of God to you free of charge?
Kanjobal: A yet max ec' walon el is watx' abix Dios e nan e xol tu', c'am jabok tzet max el in k'anon ayex, yuj wion aytek in ba, yet watx' ayexxa mimanokab e yelapnok. ¿Xin ta c'am watx'il wutnak in ba axca tu'?

English: I robbed other churches by receiving support from them so as to serve you.
Kanjobal: Axca wal tol ocnak in elk'an bay juntzanokxa iglesia e yuj, yujtol a tu' max in cha' in gasto yet max quin ec' e xol ex wak'on serbil.

English: And when I was with you and needed something, I was not a burden to anyone, for the brothers who came from Macedonia supplied what I needed. I have kept myself from being a burden to you in any way, and will continue to do so.
Kanjobal: A yet max quin ec' e xol, ay tiempo ay junok tzet caw chi oc yopiso wuj, palta c'am junok ex max wak' in ba e cargonej. A eb juẍtak aj Macedonia ti' max bet ak'on jab tzet chi oc yopiso wuj bay tu'. C'am junok ex max wak' in ba e cargonej yuj jabok in gasto. Ac'ala' caytu' ok wut in ba tinani'.

English: As surely as the truth of Christ is in me, nobody in the regions of Achaia will stop this boasting of mine.
Kanjobal: Caxc'al chi wi' can in ba walon juntzan ti', palta c'am junok ex aj Acaya ex chi je' in e tenon oc wanajok. Caw yel chi wala', yujtol ajun Cristo wetok.

English: Why? Because I do not love you? God knows I do!
Kanjobal: ¿Tzet xan chi waltok juntzan ti' ayex che na'? ¿Xin tatol c'am in camc'ulal e yin che na'? Yojtak Dios jantak in camc'ulal e yin.

English: And I will keep on doing what I am doing in order to cut the ground from under those who want an opportunity to be considered equal with us in the things they boast about.
Kanjobal: Palta ac'ala' ok wut in ba, axcac'alta' wutnak in ba e xol. Ok wut in ba axca tu', yet watx' a eb chi say tzetbil chi yun yion can ba, ok can eb yalan yuj. Yujtol chi tz'ak yal eb, tol lajan yopiso eb wetok.

English: For such men are false apostles, deceitful workmen, masquerading as apostles of Christ.
Kanjobal: A eb tu', toc'al chi tz'ak yaloc ba eb chekbejok Cristo. Caw etnem anima eb yetok is k'anej tu'.

English: And no wonder, for Satan himself masquerades as an angel of light.
Kanjobal: Palta a tzet chi yun eb tu', c'am chi c'ayaj co c'ul yuj. Yujtol cay c'apax tu' Satanás, chi tz'ak yaloc ba nak is watx' yángelok Dios.

English: It is not surprising, then, if his servants masquerade as servants of righteousness. Their end will be what their actions deserve.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu', c'am chi c'ayaj co c'ul, ta chi yal eb chi ak'on serbil nak tu' tol caw wal tojol beybal eb. A eb tu', ok cha eb paktzil, atac'ala' tzet max el yunen junjun eb.

English: I repeat: Let no one take me for a fool. But if you do, then receive me just as you would a fool, so that I may do a little boasting.
Kanjobal: Ti chi waltok ayex junelxa, c'amokab ex che na' tol c'am in nabal. Ta che na' axca tu xin, chaek in k'anjab axca junok mac c'am is nabal tu', yet watx' chi je' wion can in ba jabok axca juntzan eb chi yi' can ba.

English: In this self-confident boasting I am not talking as the Lord would, but as a fool.
Kanjobal: A juntzan ok waltok ayex ti', manak Cham Jajawil chi ak'on waltok. Axcaokxac'al tol c'am in nabal yet chi walontok ti', yujtol toc'al chi wi' can in ba waloni.

English: Since many are boasting in the way the world does, I too will boast.
Kanjobal: Xiwil eb chi yi' can ba yuj tzet ay yul is k'ab bay yulyibank'inal ti'. Yuj tu', ok wi' can in ba jabok yetok eb.

English: You gladly put up with fools since you are so wise!
Kanjobal: Yujtol ayex ti', caw jelan ex, yuj tu' xan chi techaj e yiklen oc eb c'am nabal chi yut ba ayex, toltax chex tzaloj yetok eb.

English: In fact, you even put up with anyone who enslaves you or exploits you or takes advantage of you or pushes himself forward or slaps you in the face.
Kanjobal: Ay eb chex ak'on pural yuj e yak'on serbil eb, cax chi tok'on ec' eb masanil tzet ayex. Yajawxac'al chi yut ba eb e yiban, cax chi yion aj can ba eb. Toltax chi pak'tok eb e sat, palta ayex ti' che yak' techaj bay eb.

English: To my shame I admit that we were too weak for that! What anyone else dares to boast about–I am speaking as a fool–I also dare to boast about.
Kanjobal: Chin q'uixwi walontok ayex, tol maj je' co tec'ban co ba junen axca chi yut ba eb tu' ayex. Palta axca chi yun tec'ban ba eb tu' yaloni, axca tu' chi wut c'apax in tec'ban in ba waloni, palta lanan waloni tol axca junok mac c'am is nabal.

English: Are they Hebrews? So am I. Are they Israelites? So am I. Are they Abraham's descendants? So am I.
Kanjobal: Hebreo ton eb, hebreo in c'apaxok, israel ton eb, israel in c'apaxok. Yinatil Abraham eb, yinatil Abraham in c'apax yetok eb.

English: Are they servants of Christ? (I am out of my mind to talk like this.) I am more. I have worked much harder, been in prison more frequently, been flogged more severely, and been exposed to death again and again.
Kanjobal: Ta yak'omal serbil Cristo eb, ayin ti' ec'ban chi yun wak'on serbil Cristo yintak eb. (A yet chi walontok juntzan ti' ayex, axca k'anjabtok junok mac c'am is nabal in k'anjabtok.) Palta ec'ban in mulnajil yintak eb tu'. Xiwil el max in mak'lay yintak eb. Xiwil el max quin oc preso. Toltax xiwil el ijan wal max in cami.

English: Five times I received from the Jews the forty lashes minus one.
Kanjobal: Oyel max in mak'lay yuj eb wet israelal, 39 jipan tz'um max wik yuj eb junjun el.

English: Three times I was beaten with rods, once I was stoned, three times I was shipwrecked, I spent a night and a day in the open sea,
Kanjobal: Oxel mak'bil in yetok c'ax. Junel max in k'okch'ennelayi. Oxel paxnakay lanaj te barco walan yet ayin oc yiban a' mar, max in cancan nan a'. A junel, jun c'u yetok jun ak'bal laan in can yiban a.

English: I have been constantly on the move. I have been in danger from rivers, in danger from bandits, in danger from my own countrymen, in danger from Gentiles; in danger in the city, in danger in the country, in danger at sea; and in danger from false brothers.
Kanjobal: Xiwil bay ec'nak in. Ay wal bay caw ay is may yuj a' mimek aej, c'al yuj eb elk'om. Ay bay ay is may yuj eb wet conob, c'al yuj eb man wet conobok. Ay bay caw ay is may bay juntzanok conoblak, yetok bay najatlak elok, c'al yiban a' mar. Ay bay ay is may xol eb chi yaloc ba juẍtakok.

English: I have labored and toiled and have often gone without sleep; I have known hunger and thirst and have often gone without food; I have been cold and naked.
Kanjobal: Ay bay caw chin c'unbi yuj mulnajil. Caw wilnak yailal. Tx'ial el c'am wayan chi wunej. Ay bay max tit in wajil c'al in takintial. Tx'ial el max waytok wajil. Ay bay max wetnej in c'ul yuj sic. Ay bay c'amxa chi makchaj in pichil.

English: Besides everything else, I face daily the pressure of my concern for all the churches.
Kanjobal: Man asannejok juntzan yailal ti' max wila', yujtol junjunc'al c'u, cac'al ti' waben yail yuj in naon eb creyente bay junjun iglesia.

English: Who is weak, and I do not feel weak? Who is led into sin, and I do not inwardly burn?
Kanjobal: Ta ay mac c'amto chi yi' yip yin is creyenteal, caw chin oc il yuj eb, axca tol c'amto chi wi' c'apax wip yetok eb. Ta ay eb chi ak'lay etax el is nabal, caw chi oc pitz'an yail yin in c'ul sic'libil.

English: If I must boast, I will boast of the things that show my weakness.
Kanjobal: Ta yowalil chi wi' can in ba, ok wi' can in ba yin juntzan tzet chi tx'oxk'abnen elok, tol c'am jabok welapnok.

English: The God and Father of the Lord Jesus, who is to be praised forever, knows that I am not lying.
Kanjobal: Yojtak Dios, a ton is Mam Cham Jajawil Jesucristo tol caw yel chi wala'. ¡Al-layokab watx' k'anej bay Cham yin tojbalk'inal!

English: In Damascus the governor under King Aretas had the city of the Damascenes guarded in order to arrest me.
Kanjobal: A yet max in ec' bay conob Damasco, a cham gobernador mulnajnak yetok cham rey Aretas, max yal cham tol chi oc makomal junjun puertail jun conob tu', yet watx' chin mitx'lay yaloni.

English: But I was lowered in a basket from a window in the wall and slipped through his hands.
Kanjobal: Palta a yul jun xuc max in aytok, cax weltok yul wentenail murallail conob tu', cax max in ayapnok t'ununok sat tx'otx'. Cac'al tu' max yun in colchaj yul k'ab cham tu'.

English: I must go on boasting. Although there is nothing to be gained, I will go on to visions and revelations from the Lord.
Kanjobal: Nabac'al chi wetnej in ba walon in ba watx'il. Yel watx' tol a juntzan axca wayichej wilnak chi waltok ayex, c'al juntzanxa tx'oxbil ayin yuj Cham Jajawil.

English: I know a man in Christ who fourteen years ago was caught up to the third heaven. Whether it was in the body or out of the body I do not know–God knows.
Kanjobal: Ay jun winak wojtak tol caw ayoc yin Cristo. 14 abilxa tinani' max ilay ajtok satcan bay ayic' Dios. Man wojtakok ta tojnak yetok is mimanil, ma c'amak. Asan Dios yojtak.

English: And I know that this man–whether in the body or apart from the body I do not know, but God knows–
Kanjobal: Caxc'al tojnak yetok is mimanil, ma c'amak, man wojtakok. Asan Dios yojtak. Asan jun wojtak,

English: was caught up to paradise. He heard inexpressible things, things that man is not permitted to tell.
Kanjobal: tol max ilaytok bay jun lugar chi yik paraíso. A bay tu' max yab yoc juntzan k'anej tol c'am axca, cax c'am chi chalay yal-lay elok.

English: I will boast about a man like that, but I will not boast about myself, except about my weaknesses.
Kanjobal: A jun winak tu', asan ok wi' can. Axa ayin xin, maj wi' can in ba. Ay juntzan tzet ayoc win chi tx'oxk'abnen elok, tol c'am jabok welapnok. Asan juntzan tu' ok waltok yet ok in maynen in ba jabok.

English: Even if I should choose to boast, I would not be a fool, because I would be speaking the truth. But I refrain, so no one will think more of me than is warranted by what I do or say.
Kanjobal: K'inalok yelc'ulal chi wochej chi wi' can in ba tinani', maj in k'anjab axca junok mac c'am is nabal, yujtol asan mi tzet yetal yel chi wala', palta maj in maynej in ba axca tu', yujtol chi wochej tol c'am junok mac chi naoni, tol yel miman welapnok yintak tzet chi yil eb win c'al tzet chi yab eb waloni.

English: To keep me from becoming conceited because of these surpassingly great revelations, there was given me a thorn in my flesh, a messenger of Satan, to torment me.
Kanjobal: A juntzan tzet yetal max tx'oxlay ayin bay satcan tu', caw miman ton yelapnok. Yuj tu', ay is may wion can in ba yuj. Yuj tu', ay jun in yailal max yaoc Satanás, yuj in yetneni. Axca wal junok miman q'uix jekantok yul in chibejal jun yailal tu'. Max oc jun yailal tu' win, yet watx' c'am chi wi' can in ba.

English: Three times I pleaded with the Lord to take it away from me.
Kanjobal: Oxel max in k'anil jun in yailal tu' win bay Cham Jajawil.

English: But he said to me, “My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in weakness.” Therefore I will boast all the more gladly about my weaknesses, so that Christ's power may rest on me.
Kanjobal: Palta tix max yut yalon Cham ayin ti': K'okbilc'al in watx'c'ulal ayach yet chi techajc'al oj. Yujtol a yin eb c'am jabok yip yul yet, a tu' chi txecloj wal el wipalil ayin ti', ẍi ayin. Yuj tu', caw chin tzaloj yuj c'am wipalil, yet watx' chi aj can yipal Cristo win.

English: That is why, for Christ's sake, I delight in weaknesses, in insults, in hardships, in persecutions, in difficulties. For when I am weak, then I am strong.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu', chin tzaloj tinani', yujtol c'am wipalil. Caxc'al chin buchlayi, caxc'al ay tzet caw chi oc wuj, caxc'al chi wil yailal, caxc'al chi wab yail yuj Cristo, palta caw chin tzalojc'al. Yujtol a yet c'am jabok welapnok, a ton yet tu' chi aj can yipal Cristo win.

English: I have made a fool of myself, but you drove me to it. I ought to have been commended by you, for I am not in the least inferior to the “super-apostles,” even though I am nothing.
Kanjobal: Axca tol c'am ton in nabal yet max walon oc in ba watx'il ayex, palta ayex max quin e yak' pural waloni, yujtol ayex e moj quin e yalon watx'il. Ay mactxel chi tz'ak yaloc ba chekbejok Cristo, caw miman yelapnok eb e yaloni. Caxc'al c'am jabok welapnok, palta c'am jabok ec'ban yelapnok eb tu' wintak.

English: The things that mark an apostle–signs, wonders and miracles–were done among you with great perseverance.
Kanjobal: A yet max in ec' e xol, max in tec'baj in ba in mulnaji. Max in tx'oxil juntzan milagro, c'al juntzan tzet yetal chi tx'oxon el yikbej Dios. Max c'ayaj e c'ul yuj juntzan max el wunen tu'. A juntzan tu' chi txeclonen elok tol chekbej in Cristo.

English: How were you inferior to the other churches, except that I was never a burden to you? Forgive me this wrong!
Kanjobal: Axca watx'il max ec' wut in ba bay eb creyente bay junjun iglesia, axca tu' max ec' wut in ba ayex. Asan tol maj wak' in ba e cuentanej yuj in gasto. Palta caw che yak' mimanc'ulal win yuj jun in paltail max oc ayex tu'.

English: Now I am ready to visit you for the third time, and I will not be a burden to you, because what I want is not your possessions but you. After all, children should not have to save up for their parents, but parents for their children.
Kanjobal: A tinani', toxa wal chin toj yet yoxelal ayex tu'; palta man ok wak' in ba e cargonej, yujtol c'am chi wochej oc tzetak yetal ayex, palta a ex caw chex wochej. A eb mamej, moj chi wajbaj eb is tumin, cax chi yak'on eb bay yuninal. Manak eb uninalej chi wajbaj is tumin, cax chi yak'on bay is mam c'al bay is txutx.

English: So I will very gladly spend for you everything I have and expend myself as well. If I love you more, will you love me less?
Kanjobal: Ayin ti', chin bek in c'ulok lajwi el masanil tzet ayin, asan ta chi watx'jican oc e nabal. Caxc'al ok lajwok in mimanil ti' yin ex wak'on serbil, palta ok in tzalojc'alta'a, caxc'al a yet chi aj can in camc'ulal e yin, chi aytek e camc'ulal win.

English: Be that as it may, I have not been a burden to you. Yet, crafty fellow that I am, I caught you by trickery!
Kanjobal: Ay juntzan eb, caxc'al tol yojtak tol c'am bay max wak' in ba e cargonej, palta chi yal eb tol yetok in jelanil max wiaytek e sat yin wion tzet yetal e yin.

English: Did I exploit you through any of the men I sent you?
Kanjobal: ¿Mac junok eb max in chektok ayex tu' max ion aytek e sat?

English: I urged Titus to go to you and I sent our brother with him. Titus did not exploit you, did he? Did we not act in the same spirit and follow the same course?
Kanjobal: Max in k'an bay Tito yet chex toj il-lay yuj, cax max in chekontok junxa juẍtak yetok. ¿Tom max bet yiaytek Tito tu' e sat xin? Mantok tol lajanc'al max ec' jut co beybal on e nan e xol. Lajanc'al max ec' jut co nabal on.

English: Have you been thinking all along that we have been defending ourselves to you? We have been speaking in the sight of God as those in Christ; and everything we do, dear friends, is for your strengthening.
Kanjobal: Tekan che na' tol toc'al chi jiil jin e satak, palta c'amak paxok. Satak wal Dios lanan walontok juntzan ti' ayex, axca chi yochej Cristo, yet watx' che yi' e yip, ex wuẍtak, ex wanab camc'ulnebil.

English: For I am afraid that when I come I may not find you as I want you to be, and you may not find me as you want me to be. I fear that there may be quarreling, jealousy, outbursts of anger, factions, slander, gossip, arrogance and disorder.
Kanjobal: C'am chi wochej chex toj wil tinani', a wal ta c'am che yut e ba axca wal chi wochej, a wal ta c'am c'apax chi wut in ba axca wal che yochej. C'amto chi wochej chin toj ayex tu', a wal ta aytoc'al owal e xol, c'al chichonc'ulal, c'al k'ak'alc'ulal. Talaj ay ex che yi' can e ba. Talaj ay ex che yal-lej e k'umal. Talaj ay ex che luesnej e ba, talaj ay ex che buchlej e ba, cax talaj ay ex lanan e somchaj elok.

English: I am afraid that when I come again my God will humble me before you, and I will be grieved over many who have sinned earlier and have not repented of the impurity, sexual sin and debauchery in which they have indulged.
Kanjobal: Majto yal in c'ul chin toj ayex junelxa, a wal ta chin yak' q'uixwok aj co Diosal e satak. A wal ta chin ok' e yuj, yujtol yettaxc'al yalantok, xiwil ex max e beybalnej tzet man watx'ok. C'amc'al wal che bekcan e beybalnen yobtakil tu' yetok e mimanil, axca ajmulal, yetokc'al juntzan tzet tol caw wal q'uixwiltak chi el e yuneni.

English: This will be my third visit to you. “Every matter must be established by the testimony of two or three witnesses.”
Kanjobal: Yinxa yoxelal ok ex tok wila'. Junjunc'al tzet ok watx'jok yayji, palta yowalil ay cawanok ma oxwanok testigo ok alon is mul junok mactxel.

English: I already gave you a warning when I was with you the second time. I now repeat it while absent: On my return I will not spare those who sinned earlier or any of the others,
Kanjobal: A yet max quex ec' wilon yin is cayelal, ay jun tzet albilcan ayex wuj. Ti chi waltok ayex junelxa tinani'. Caxc'al c'am in ec' e yetok bay tu', palta chi waltok ayex, mac ex ocnak e yobtakil yet yalan, e yet c'apax e masanil yayji jun k'anej ti'. A yet ok in tok ayex tu' yet junelxa ti' xin, c'amxac'al in mimanc'ulal e yin bian. A ton jun ti' ec' walnakcan ayex.

English: since you are demanding proof that Christ is speaking through me. He is not weak in dealing with you, but is powerful among you.
Kanjobal: Lanan e yochen che yila' ta yel a Cristo chin k'anbalnen yet chin k'anjab ayex. A ton yet ok in apnok ocok, cax ok e yiloni, catatu' ok nachaj el e yuj, yujtol a Cristo, mantok tol c'am tzet chi je' yuj tx'oxk'abnen el ayex, palta tol masanilc'al chi je' yuj Cham tx'oxon el e nan e xol.

English: For to be sure, he was crucified in weakness, yet he lives by God's power. Likewise, we are weak in him, yet by God's power we will live with him to serve you.
Kanjobal: Yel toni, a yet max curusnelay Cham, axca wal tol c'am yip Cham, palta yuj yipal Dios, xan iquis Cham tinani'. Ilab on c'apaxok, axca wal tol c'am jabok jelapnok on c'apax yetok, palta yuj yipal Dios, xan iquis on yetok Cristo, yet watx' ac'ala' ex jak'on serbil.

English: Examine yourselves to see whether you are in the faith; test yourselves. Do you not realize that Christ Jesus is in you–unless, of course, you fail the test?
Kanjobal: Caw chi cam e beyc'ulnen e ba yul e yet junjun ex, yet watx' chi txecloj elok, ta yel wali ayex oc yin Cristo. Caw che beyc'ulnej e ba yul e yet junjun ex. ¿Tom man e yojtakok tol ayoc Jesucristo e yin junjun ex? Asan bian, ta mayex acaw creyenteok sic'libil, c'am oc e yin chi yal tu'.

English: And I trust that you will discover that we have not failed the test.
Kanjobal: Palta chi wochej tol caw che yojtaknej elok, tol ayon ti', acaw creyente on sic'libil.

English: Now we pray to God that you will not do anything wrong. Not that people will see that we have stood the test but that you will do what is right even though we may seem to have failed.
Kanjobal: Chon txajli on bay Dios e yuj, yet watx' c'am junok tzet man watx'ok chi el e yuneni. Man toc'alok chon txajli on e yuj, yet watx' chi txecloj elok tol watx' co mulnajil; caxc'al chi txecloj elok tol man watx'ok co mulnajil, palta ac'ala' yochen co c'ul tol watx' che yut e beybal.

English: For we cannot do anything against the truth, but only for the truth.
Kanjobal: Yujtol c'am chi je' jajc'ulnen co ba yetok cuybanilej caw yel. A ti' jet, tol chi jak' jip co mulnaj oc yin.

English: We are glad whenever we are weak but you are strong; and our prayer is for your perfection.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu', caxc'al c'am wal jelapnok, palta chon tzalojc'alta'a, ta ay e yelapnok. Yetok c'apaxok, ok on txajlok e yuj, yet watx' chi aj can watx'ji oc e nabal.

English: This is why I write these things when I am absent, that when I come I may not have to be harsh in my use of authority–the authority the Lord gave me for building you up, not for tearing you down.
Kanjobal: Yak'ban c'amto chin apni ayex tu', ti chi wak' babjok jun in carta ti' in satak, yujtol chi wochej tol man yowalilok ow chi toj wut in ba ayex tu' yuj wopiso ti'. A Cham Jajawil ak'nej jun wopiso ti', yuj waon oc e tec'anil, man yujok ex wetnen elok, xan max ak'layi.

English: Finally, brothers, good-by. Aim for perfection, listen to my appeal, be of one mind, live in peace. And the God of love and peace will be with you.
Kanjobal: Axa tinani xin, ex wuẍtak, ex wanab, ayexokab oc yin tzalojc'ulal bay tu'. Caw che watx'nej oc e nabal. Ayxaokab e mimanc'ulal. Junxanejokab che yut e nabal, junc'ulalokab ayex bay tu'. A Dios ak'om junc'ulal, c'al ak'om camc'ulal, a' ok oc e yetok.

English: Greet one another with a holy kiss.
Kanjobal: Ak'lejek cawil e c'ul yin e tx'oxoni tol ay e camc'ulal.

English: All the saints send their greetings.
Kanjobal: Chi yatok masanil eb creyente cayti' cawil e c'ul.

English: May the grace of the Lord Jesus Christ, and the love of God, and the fellowship of the Holy Spirit be with you all.
Kanjobal: Yak'okab Cham Jajawil Jesucristo watx'c'ulal ayex, cax yak'okab Dios is camc'ulal ayex. Ayokab oc Cham Espíritu Santo e yetok e masanil.

English: So I made up my mind that I would not make another painful visit to you.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu' xan max in na', tol maj inxa tok ayex tu' yin calan cusc'ulalil.

English: For if I grieve you, who is left to make me glad but you whom I have grieved?
Kanjobal: Yujtol ta chex toj in tx'em cusok, ¿mac pax ok je' yak'on mimanil in c'ul? Yuj tu' xan maj yal in c'ul chex toj in tx'em cusok, yujtol asan ex ok je' e yak'on mimanil in c'ul.

English: I wrote as I did so that when I came I should not be distressed by those who ought to make me rejoice. I had confidence in all of you, that you would all share my joy.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu' xan axca tu' max wut in tz'ibentok ayex yin jun tx'an in carta, yet watx' a yet chin apni oc ex wiloni, c'amokab chin cusaj e yuj, tol e moj e yak'on tzalojbok in c'ul. Chi waoc yipok in c'ul, tol ta chin tzaloj aj ayin ti', ayex jun chex tzaloj aj wetok.

English: For I wrote you out of great distress and anguish of heart and with many tears, not to grieve you but to let you know the depth of my love for you.
Kanjobal: A yet max in tz'ibentok jun in carta tu' ayex, caw wal chin oc il e yuj. Caw chi yab yail in c'ul e yuj, toltax chin ok' e yuj bian. Palta man yujok ex in tx'emon cusok xan max in tz'ibejtok ayex. Max in tz'ibejtok ayex, yet watx' che yojtaknej elok, tol chi camil in c'ul e yin sic'libil.

English: If anyone has caused grief, he has not so much grieved me as he has grieved all of you, to some extent–not to put it too severely.
Kanjobal: Ay ton jun mac max tx'emon cus co c'ul. Man asannejok in max cus in c'ul yuj, palta ayex jun max tx'emlay cus e c'ul janic' yuj. Janic' quin chi, yujtol c'am chi wochej tol chi ajc'al can yiban nak.

English: The punishment inflicted on him by the majority is sufficient for him.
Kanjobal: A is yailal nak max e yaoc yiban yet max e wajban oc e ba, k'okbilokabi.

English: Now instead, you ought to forgive and comfort him, so that he will not be overwhelmed by excessive sorrow.
Kanjobal: Axa tinani xin, yel mi watx' che yak' mimanc'ulal yiban nak, cax che mimanc'ulneni, yet watx' c'am chi somchaj el c'ul yuj cusc'ulal.

English: I urge you, therefore, to reaffirm your love for him.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu' chin tewitok ayex tol che tx'ox e camc'ulal bay nak junelxa.

English: The reason I wrote you was to see if you would stand the test and be obedient in everything.
Kanjobal: Yuj jun tu' xan max in tz'ibejtok jun in carta ayex yet yalantok, yuj ex wak'on porobal, yujtol chi wochej chi wojtaknej elok, ta che yikej masanil tzet chi wala'.

English: If you forgive anyone, I also forgive him. And what I have forgiven–if there was anything to forgive–I have forgiven in the sight of Christ for your sake,
Kanjobal: Axa tinani', a mac che yak' mimanc'ulal yin yuj junok tzet yetal yob max el yuneni, ok wak' c'apax mimanc'ulal yin. Caxc'al manak ayin chi oc mul, palta e yujc'al, xan ok wak' mimanc'ulal yin, yul sat Cristo.

English: in order that Satan might not outwit us. For we are not unaware of his schemes.
Kanjobal: Caytu' chi wutej, yet watx' c'am chon yak' ayc'ay Satanás, yujtol jojtakxa tzet is nabal nak jin.

English: Now when I went to Troas to preach the gospel of Christ and found that the Lord had opened a door for me,
Kanjobal: A yet max quin apni oc bay conob Troas yuj walon el yabixal Cristo, caw bekanc'al in mulnaj yin yet Cham Jajawil bay tu'.

English: I still had no peace of mind, because I did not find my brother Titus there. So I said good-by to them and went on to Macedonia.
Kanjobal: Palta max oc jabok in somc'ulal, yujtol maj ilchaj juẍtak Tito wuj bay tu'. Yuj tu', max in tak'elejcan in ba yetok eb creyente, max in el bay tu', axa in jay bay Macedonia ti'.

English: But thanks be to God, who always leads us in triumphal procession in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of him.
Kanjobal: Palta jalek yuj diosalil bay Dios, yujtol masanil tiempo chic'al je' co tx'oxk'abnen elok, tol caw miman yelapnok Cristo Jesús, yujtol max ujc'al yuj. Chon is k'anbalnej, yet watx' chi pukax el yabixal bay junjun lugar, axca chi yun yel jab junok tzet yetal suk'uk'ixac'al yoc jab.

English: For we are to God the aroma of Christ among those who are being saved and those who are perishing.
Kanjobal: Axca yoc jab junok incienso chi yak' Cristo bay Dios, caw suk'uk'i jab, cayon tu' yet lanan ec' jalon el yabixal bay eb lanan colchaji, c'al bay eb lananto c'ayic'ok.

English: To the one we are the smell of death; to the other, the fragrance of life. And who is equal to such a task?
Kanjobal: A yet chi jalon bay eb chi c'ayic'ok, lajan yoc jabil axca junok tzet yetal chon cam yuj, chi yab eb. Axa yet chi jalon bay eb chi colchaji, lajan yabixal tu' axca junok tzet caw suk'uk'i yoc jab chi yab eb, yujtol lanan chaon eb is k'inal yuj. Yuj tu', ¿mac wal junok ok je' yalon el jun abix ti'?

English: Unlike so many, we do not peddle the word of God for profit. On the contrary, in Christ we speak before God with sincerity, like men sent from God.
Kanjobal: Ayon ti' chi je' juj, yujtol man yujok jion tumin yin k'anej Dios, xan chi ec' jalilok, axca chi yut ba nanxa eb. Mimanokc'al chi ec' yal eb, palta soman chi yut yalon eb. Palta ayon ti', yin masanil co c'ul chi ec' jalilok, yujtol ak'bil jopiso yuj Dios jalon elok. Satak Dios chi ec' jalilok, yujtol yet onxa Cristo e yetok.

English: Are we beginning to commend ourselves again? Or do we need, like some people, letters of recommendation to you or from you?
Kanjobal: A yet chi jalontok juntzan ti' ayex, ¿chi mi e na' tol lanan jalon oc co ba watx'il ayex? Man yowalilok chi co tx'ox co carta chon abenen oc ayex tamwal yowalil chi co k'an e carta chex abenen oc ayon axca chi yut ba juntzanxa eb.

English: You yourselves are our letter, written on our hearts, known and read by everybody.
Kanjobal: Yujtol ayex caw lanan e tx'oxk'abnen elok, tol ay ton jopiso. Lajan ex axca junok carta tz'ibbil oc yin janimail, yujtol chi je' yilon masanil anima tzet e yayji.

English: You show that you are a letter from Christ, the result of our ministry, written not with ink but with the Spirit of the living God, not on tablets of stone but on tablets of human hearts.
Kanjobal: Axca junok carta tz'ibbilcan yuj Cristo, ayonxa inen ocok, cayex tu'. A jun axca carta ti', man tintaok tz'ibnejcanok, palta tol a Cham Yespíritu Dios iquisc'al tojbalk'inal, a' tz'ibnejcanok. Man yinok ch'en tz'ibbilcanok, palta tol a yin janimail tz'ibbilcan ocok.

English: Such confidence as this is ours through Christ before God.
Kanjobal: Yuj Cristo xan ay yip co c'ul junjun on satak Dios, tol axca tu' jayji.

English: Not that we are competent in ourselves to claim anything for ourselves, but our competence comes from God.
Kanjobal: C'am chi co na on tol chi je' juj yul jet co tx'oklil, palta asan yuj ayoc Dios jetok, xan chi je' juj junok tzet yetal.

English: He has made us competent as ministers of a new covenant–not of the letter but of the Spirit; for the letter kills, but the Spirit gives life.
Kanjobal: A ak'nej jopiso jak'on serbil yin watx'il, c'al jaloncan el yabixal jun is cab trato. A jun is trato ti', man yujok jiken junok tzet yetal tz'ibbilcanok, xan chi yuncan elok, palta asan yuj Cham Yespíritu Dios xan chi je' yunencan elok. A jun ley tz'ibbilcanok, asannej yopiso yaon oc camich jiban, palta a Cham Yespíritu Dios xin, yopiso Cham yak'on co k'inal tol ayc'al yin tojbalk'inal.

English: Now if the ministry that brought death, which was engraved in letters on stone, came with glory, so that the Israelites could not look steadily at the face of Moses because of its glory, fading though it was,
Kanjobal: A ley Moisés tz'ibbilcan yin ch'enej patxan yayji. A yet max ak'laycan jun ley tu', max jayoc jopnaj tzekekial Dios yet max ak'laycan tu', xan majxa je' yoc t'anan eb wet israelal yin sat Moisés, yujtol chi tzekeki c'apaxok. Palta c'ojanc'ulal max ay tananok tzekekial jun chi tzekeki tu'. Caxc'al ay yopiso jun ley tu' con yak'on camok, palta miman yelapnok yet max jayi.

English: will not the ministry of the Spirit be even more glorious?
Kanjobal: Ta miman yelapnok jun ley tu' yet max jayi, yelxac'al miman yelapnok jun abix max yi jay Cham Yespíritu Dios ayon.

English: If the ministry that condemns men is glorious, how much more glorious is the ministry that brings righteousness!
Kanjobal: A jun ley tu', caxc'al chi yaoc camich yiban anima palta mimanc'alta' yelapnok. Akxam wal jun abix chi aloni tol watx' on satak Dios.

English: For what was glorious has no glory now in comparison with the surpassing glory.
Kanjobal: Caxc'al ay yelapnok jun ley tu', palta c'amxa yelapnok yul sat junxa ti', yujtol yelxac'al miman yelapnok jun ti'.

English: And if what was fading away came with glory, how much greater is the glory of that which lasts!
Kanjobal: Ta miman yelapnok jun tol txennej tiempoal max k'anabax tu', akxam wal jun tol ayc'al ec' yin tojbalk'inal ti'.

English: Therefore, since we have such a hope, we are very bold.
Kanjobal: Yuj wal tol max jaoc jun ti' yipok co c'ul, yuj tu' xan c'am chon xiw jalon elok.

English: We are not like Moses, who would put a veil over his face to keep the Israelites from gazing at it while the radiance was fading away.
Kanjobal: Manchak jut co ba axca yutnak ba Moisés. Makchejnak el sat yetok jun k'ap, yet watx' c'amxa chi yil eb wet israelal yet chi lajwi ay k'ak'al jopopial sat, yujtol c'ojanc'ulal max ay tananok jopopial tu'.

English: But their minds were made dull, for to this day the same veil remains when the old covenant is read. It has not been removed, because only in Christ is it taken away.
Kanjobal: Majc'al nachaj el yuj eb tzet max al-lay bay eb yujtol k'ekk'inal ay nabal eb. Ac'ala' tinani', a yet chi awtelay tx'an Un bay tz'ib yayjican jun is babel trato Dios yab eb wet israelal, c'am chi nachaj el yuj eb, yujtol axca wal junok k'ap tu' ayto oc maksatok eb. A jun tzet axca k'ap tu', c'am chi eli, yujtol asan Cristo chi je' yion elok.

English: Even to this day when Moses is read, a veil covers their hearts.
Kanjobal: Toltax tinani', a yet chi yaben eb yawtelay tx'an libro Moisés, axca tol ayc'al oc makil nabal eb tu'.

English: But whenever anyone turns to the Lord, the veil is taken away.
Kanjobal: Palta a yet chon meltzoj bay Cham Jajawil, chi ilay el jun axca maksatej tu' yin co nabal.

English: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.
Kanjobal: A Cham Jajawil max binaj tu', a ton Cham Espíritu. A mac bay ayoc Cham Yespíritu Cham Jajawil Jesucristo yin, jakanxa sat eb, cax bekanxa yilon eb.

English: And we, who with unveiled faces all reflect the Lord's glory, are being transformed into his likeness with ever-increasing glory, which comes from the Lord, who is the Spirit.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu' xan c'amxa oc jun axca maksatej tu' yin co sat co masanil. A tinani', lajan onxa axca jun ch'en espejo, yujtol a jin chi txecloj el watx'il Cham Jajawil. Yuj tu', lananxa tz'aknaj el co watx'il axca is watx'il Cristo yuj Cham Jajawil, a ton Cham Espíritu.

English: Therefore, since through God's mercy we have this ministry, we do not lose heart.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu', c'am chi cabax aj co c'ul on, yujtol max ok' c'ul Dios jin, cax max yak'on jun jopiso ti' on.

English: Rather, we have renounced secret and shameful ways; we do not use deception, nor do we distort the word of God. On the contrary, by setting forth the truth plainly we commend ourselves to every man's conscience in the sight of God.
