Kanjobal: Ay juntzan tzet chi el yunen eb jet animail yin ewantakil, yujtol q'uixwiltak. A pax ayon ti xin, c'am jalon jet yin juntzan tu' yin junelnej. C'am junok mac chi ec' ji aytek sat on. C'am junok comon k'anej chi jatok on xol k'anej Dios, yujtol asan wal tzet yetal yel, asan chi jal on. Axca ton ti' chi jut co tx'oxk'abnencan el jopiso on bay junjun mactxel satak Dios, yet watx' chi nachaj el yuj eb tzet jelapnok on.

English: And even if our gospel is veiled, it is veiled to those who are perishing.
Kanjobal: A yet chi ec' jalon el on k'anejal yet colbanilej, ay ton mac c'am chi nachaj el yuj, a ton eb lanan c'ayic'ok.

English: The god of this age has blinded the minds of unbelievers, so that they cannot see the light of the gospel of the glory of Christ, who is the image of God.
Kanjobal: A eb tu', c'am chi yaoc eb yin c'ul yujtol chi ak'layxac'al etax el nabal eb yuj nak diosal yulyibank'inal ti'. Axca tol a nak chi ak'on c'ayil sat eb, yet watx' c'am chi yil eb jun sakk'inal chi tit yin yabixal Cristo. A Cristo caw miman yelapnok, caw lajan yetok Dios.

English: For we do not preach ourselves, but Jesus Christ as Lord, and ourselves as your servants for Jesus' sake.
Kanjobal: A yet chi ec' jalon elok, manak jabixal on chi ec' jalilok, palta asan chi ec' jalilok, tol a Jesucristo Jajawil. Chi jalontek tol e yak'omal serbil jayji on, yujtol ay co camc'ulal yin Jesús.

English: For God, who said, “Let light shine out of darkness,” made his light shine in our hearts to give us the light of the knowledge of the glory of God in the face of Christ.
Kanjobal: Yalnak Dios axca ti': A xol k'ekk'inal ti', ayokab sakk'inal, ẍi. Acaw Dios anejtek sakk'inal yin janimail yet watx' a jun sakk'inal tu' chi ak'on jojtaknej elok, tol caw miman is watx'il Dios. A yin Jesucristo, a tu' chi txecloj el watx'il Cham tu'.

English: But we have this treasure in jars of clay to show that this all-surpassing power is from God and not from us.
Kanjobal: Ay ton jun tzet caw watx' tu' ayon, palta ayon ti', lajan on axca junok tx'otx' c'uanbalej, yujtol c'am jabok jelapnok. Yuj tu', chi txecloj elok tol a jun miman ikbej tu', man jetok, asan Dios ay yet.

English: We are hard pressed on every side, but not crushed; perplexed, but not in despair;
Kanjobal: Axca tol oyanxanej oc yailal jin on, palta c'am chon can yalan yuj. Ayon oc yin somc'ulal, palta c'am chi jak'c'al somchaj el co c'ul on.

English: persecuted, but not abandoned; struck down, but not destroyed.
Kanjobal: Caw chon etnelay bay chon eq'ui, palta c'am chon beklaycan co tx'oklil. Chon mak'lay ec' telnaj on, palta c'am chon lajwi el yin junelnej.

English: We always carry around in our body the death of Jesus, so that the life of Jesus may also be revealed in our body.
Kanjobal: Tzanc'al bay chon eq'ui, chi jab yail yetok co mimanil on, axca max yun yaben Cristo yailal camich. Chi eq'uel juntzan ti' jiban on, yuj txecloj elok, tol ayoc is k'inal Jesús jin on.

English: For we who are alive are always being given over to death for Jesus' sake, so that his life may be revealed in our mortal body.
Kanjobal: Yak'ban iquis on, chac'antek camich jiban on masanil tiempo, yujtol junxanej jayji yetok Jesús. Yuj tu', caxc'al ok cam co mimanil ti' on, palta lanan txecloj el is k'inal Jesús yin co mimanil cambejal yayji ti'.

English: So then, death is at work in us, but life is at work in you.
Kanjobal: Yak'ban lanan jayoc camich jin on, axa ayex xin, lanan e chaon e k'inal.

English: It is written: “I believed; therefore I have spoken.” With that same spirit of faith we also believe and therefore speak,
Kanjobal: A yul tx'an Un Tz'ibbilcanok, ay jun mac alnejcan axca ti': Max waoc Dios yin in c'ul, xan max wala' ẍi. Ayon ti', lajan chi jut jaon oc co c'ul on yin Cham yetok mac max alon tu'. Chi jalon c'apax elok, yujtol chi ja c'apax oc Cham yin co c'ul on.

English: because we know that the one who raised the Lord Jesus from the dead will also raise us with Jesus and present us with you in his presence.
Kanjobal: Jojtak, tol a Cham mac ak'nej ictzoj aj Jajawil Jesús xol eb camnak, a ok on ak'on c'apax ictzoj ajok yujtol yet on Jesús. Ok ex ictzoj c'apax aj jetok, cax ok on yiontok bay ayic' tu'.

English: All this is for your benefit, so that the grace that is reaching more and more people may cause thanksgiving to overflow to the glory of God.
Kanjobal: Masanil juntzan max wal ti', e yuj xan chi jay jiban on. Axca ton ti' chi elol jiban, yet watx' xiwil mac chi chaon watx'c'ulal Dios. Yetok c'apaxok, xiwil mac chi yal yuj diosalil bay Dios yuj. Axca ton ti' ok yun txecloj elok, tol caw wal watx' ton Cham.

English: Therefore we do not lose heart. Though outwardly we are wasting away, yet inwardly we are being renewed day by day.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu', caw c'am bay chi cabax aj co c'ul on. Caxc'al lanan yichambi co mimanil ti' on, palta a janimail on, chi yic'al yip junjun c'u.

English: For our light and momentary troubles are achieving for us an eternal glory that far outweighs them all.
Kanjobal: A tzet chi jay jiban, jabnej yelapnok yul co sat on, aymanc'al chi eq'uelok, palta yuj tu' xan ok co cha' jun tzet caw miman yelapnok. A jun tzet tu', xiwil watx'il, cax ayc'al ec' yin tojbalk'inal.

English: So we fix our eyes not on what is seen, but on what is unseen. For what is seen is temporary, but what is unseen is eternal.
Kanjobal: C'am chi jaoc co nabal on yin tzet chi jila', yujtol a tzet chi jil tu', aymanc'al chi lajwi. A tzet c'am chi jila', aokab yin chi jaoc co nabal on, yujtol a juntzan tu', ayc'al yin tojbalk'inal.

English: Now we know that if the earthly tent we live in is destroyed, we have a building from God, an eternal house in heaven, not built by human hands.
Kanjobal: A co mimanil ti', lajan axca junok lanchu mantiado ayman chi etaxtok. Palta jojtak a yet ok lajwok jun co mimanil ti', ay junxa ok yak' Dios ayon bay satcan. A junxa tu', c'am bak'in ok lajwok, man animaok watx'nenej. Lajan axca junok na caw wal watx' cawxi.

English: Meanwhile we groan, longing to be clothed with our heavenly dwelling,
Kanjobal: Yel toni, a yet ayon ec' yin co mimanil ti', chon alxi yetok, yujtol chi jochej chon ec'tok bay junxa co mimanil, a ton jun ok co k'an bay satcan, jun axca na tu'.

English: because when we are clothed, we will not be found naked.
Kanjobal: Ok alay oc jun tu' jin axca junok pichilej, yet watx' mayon t'iranok elok.

English: For while we are in this tent, we groan and are burdened, because we do not wish to be unclothed but to be clothed with our heavenly dwelling, so that what is mortal may be swallowed up by life.
Kanjobal: A yet ayon ec' yin mimanilejal ti', chon alxi yet chi jilon yailal. Man tolok chi jochej chi ilay ec' jun co mimanil ti', palta chi jochej chi ak'lay junokxa co mimanil, yet watx' chi c'ayil jun cambejal yayji ti', yet ok co chaon co k'inal tol ayc'al yin tojbalk'inal.

English: Now it is God who has made us for this very purpose and has given us the Spirit as a deposit, guaranteeing what is to come.
Kanjobal: A yuj jun ti', xan max on is watx'nej Dios. Max yak'on c'apax Yespíritu ayon, yet watx' chi jojtaknej elok, tol caw yel ok co cha' juntzan ti' bay.

English: Therefore we are always confident and know that as long as we are at home in the body we are away from the Lord.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu', masanil tiempo, chi jaoc Dios yipok co c'ul. Jojtak on, tol yak'ban ayon ec' yin mimanilejal ti', c'am onto ec' bay ayic' Cham Jajawil.

English: We live by faith, not by sight.
Kanjobal: A yet chon ec' yulyibank'inal ti', asan Dios chi jaoc on yipok co c'ul. Manak tzet chi jiloc yin bay chi jaoc co c'ul on.

English: We are confident, I say, and would prefer to be away from the body and at home with the Lord.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu' caw wal ayoc Dios yipok co c'ul. Tol chi jochej chi co bekcan co mimanil ti' on, yet watx' chi je' co toj bay ayic' Cham Jajawil.

English: So we make it our goal to please him, whether we are at home in the body or away from it.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu', masanil tiempo chi co say tzet watx' chi jut co ba on, yet watx' chi tzalojbi Cham Jajawil jetok, caxc'al ayon ec' yin mimanilejal ti', caxc'al c'amak.

English: For we must all appear before the judgment seat of Christ, that each one may receive what is due him for the things done while in the body, whether good or bad.
Kanjobal: Yujtol yowalil ok on ec'tok satak is despacho Cristo, yet watx' junjun on, ok co cha' paktzil tzet max el junen yet ayon ec' yetok co mimanil ti', atac'ala' ta ay yopiso tzet max el juneni, ma c'amak.

English: Since, then, we know what it is to fear the Lord, we try to persuade men. What we are is plain to God, and I hope it is also plain to your conscience.
Kanjobal: Ayon ti', a bay Cham Jajawil ay co xiwc'ulalil on. Yuj tu' xan chi jak'c'al jip on co jekon na eb anima. Yojtakxa Dios co nabal on. Chi wochej che yojtaknej c'apax el co nabal tu'.

English: We are not trying to commend ourselves to you again, but are giving you an opportunity to take pride in us, so that you can answer those who take pride in what is seen rather than in what is in the heart.
Kanjobal: Man lananok jalon oc co ba watx'il ayex, palta chi jochej tol chex tzaloj jetok, yet watx' chi je' e pakon e ba bay eb chi maynej ba yuj juntzan tzet chi jil oc yin. Axa tzet ay yin nabalej, c'am jabok chi na eb, ta watx' ma c'amak.

English: If we are out of our mind, it is for the sake of God; if we are in our right mind, it is for you.
Kanjobal: Ayon ti', ta loco jili oc on, palta yuj jak'on serbil Dios, xan caytu' jili oc on. Ta watx' co jolom, palta yuj ex jak'on serbil xan caytu' jayji.

English: For Christ's love compels us, because we are convinced that one died for all, and therefore all died.
Kanjobal: A camc'ulal Cristo chi ak'on junej, yujtol jojtakxa on, tol ay jun max cam co q'uexelok co masanil. Yuj tu' xan axca tol camnak on yetok, co masanil.

English: And he died for all, that those who live should no longer live for themselves but for him who died for them and was raised again.
Kanjobal: A Cristo max cam co q'uexelok co masanil, yet watx' a ayon ayxa co k'inal yuj ti', c'amxa chi co beybalnej axca chi jochej junjun on, palta chi co beybalnej axca chi yochej Cham max cam co q'uexelok, cax max ictzonelay c'apax aj yuj Dios yuj co watx'ilok.

English: So from now on we regard no one from a worldly point of view. Though we once regarded Christ in this way, we do so no longer.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu', ayon ti', c'amxa chi co beyc'ulnej on junok mactxel yuj tzetbil yili. A yet yalan, caxc'al beyc'ulnebil Cristo juj, yuj tzetbil yili, palta man axcaok tu' chi yun co na on tinani'.

English: Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, he is a new creation; the old has gone, the new has come!
Kanjobal: A junok mactxel ayoc yin Cristo, mayal q'uexchaj is nabal, axca tol max ac'bi. A is beybal yet yalantok max ec'can elok. Pilan max watx'jican oc beybal masanil.

English: All this is from God, who reconciled us to himself through Christ and gave us the ministry of reconciliation:
Kanjobal: Masanil juntzan chi wal ti', a Dios chi watx'nen ayon. Asan yuj Cristo xan ayon oc yin junc'ulalil yetok Dios. A ak'nej jopiso jalon el tzetbil chi yun yoc eb anima yin junc'ulal yetok.

English: that God was reconciling the world to himself in Christ, not counting men's sins against them. And he has committed to us the message of reconciliation.
Kanjobal: Chi yal elapnok jun ti' tol ayoc Dios yin Cristo yet max ulic'ok, yet watx' chi oc eb anima masanil yin junc'ulal yetok. Majxa yatok is yobtakil eb yiban. A' anejcan oc jun abix ti' yul co k'ab yuj ec' jalon elok, tzetbil chi yun yoc anima yin junc'ulal yetok.

English: We are therefore Christ's ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ's behalf: Be reconciled to God.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu', chekbej Cristo jayji on. Axca tol acaw Dios lanan tewi oc e yin yet lanan jalon ayex tu'. Yuj tu', q'uexel Cristo chi jak'on yet chon tewitok ayex, yet watx' chex oc yin junc'ulalil yetok Dios.

English: God made him who had no sin to be sin for us, so that in him we might become the righteousness of God.
Kanjobal: A Cristo c'am jabok yobtakil max el yuneni. Palta ilaynakcan ec'tok masanil co yobtakil yiban Cristo yuj Dios, yet watx' watx' onxa yul sat Cham, yujtol junxanej chi juncan yetok Cristo.

English: As God's fellow workers we urge you not to receive God's grace in vain.
Kanjobal: Ayon ti', jet mulnajwomal co ba on yetok Dios. Yuj tu' xan chon tewitok ayex, tol manchak e yintaknejcan el watx'c'ulal Dios yak'nakxa ayex.

English: For he says, “In the time of my favor I heard you, and in the day of salvation I helped you.” I tell you, now is the time of God's favor, now is the day of salvation.
Kanjobal: Yujtol a wal caw chi alon yul tx'an Un Tz'ibbilcan axca ti': A yet max ajapnok tiempoal in tx'oxon in watx'c'ulal max waben e tewilal. A yet max ajapnok c'ual colbanilej, max in oc e yetok, ẍi Dios. A tinani', mayal jay jun tiempoal watx' yalnakcan tu'. Mayal jay tiempoal yak'lay colbanilej tu' tinani'.

English: We put no stumbling block in anyone's path, so that our ministry will not be discredited.
Kanjobal: Chi jochej c'am mac chi buchwaj yin co mulnajil on. Yuj tu' xan c'am junelok yob chi jut co ba on satak junokxa mactxel.

English: Rather, as servants of God we commend ourselves in every way: in great endurance; in troubles, hardships and distresses;
Kanjobal: Masanil tiempo watx' beybalejc'al chi co tx'oxil on, yujtol yak'omal serbil Dios jayji on. Tec'anc'al chi jut co ba on yin jak'on techaj yailal. Ay bay ay tzet chi majax ayon. Ay bay xiwil yailal oyanxanejtek jin on.

English: in beatings, imprisonments and riots; in hard work, sleepless nights and hunger;
Kanjobal: Ay bay max on mak'layi c'al joc preso on. Ay bay chi oc bulnaj anima jin on. Ay bay chi pax jip on co mulnaji, c'amxa chon way yuj. Ay bay chi jaytok wajil on.

English: in purity, understanding, patience and kindness; in the Holy Spirit and in sincere love;
Kanjobal: Palta tojolc'al chi jut co nabal on. Jojtakxa on, baytet ay yel. Mimanc'al chi jut co c'ul on. Watx'c'al chi jut co nabal on. Ayoc Cham Espíritu Santo jin on. Wal yel caw ay co camc'ulal on.

English: in truthful speech and in the power of God; with weapons of righteousness in the right hand and in the left;
Kanjobal: Asan jun cuybanilej caw yel chi jal on. Caw wal ayoc Dios jetok on. Axca junok soldado chi col ba yetok is mitx'k'ab yet owal, cax chi c'oli yak'on owal yetok, axca tu' chi jut co ba on, yuj jichan chi jut co nabal.

English: through glory and dishonor, bad report and good report; genuine, yet regarded as impostors;
Kanjobal: Ay bay miman jelapnok on, ay bay c'am jabok jelapnok. Ay bay chon al-lay watx'il on, ay bay toc'al chon buchlayi. Ay bay toc'al chi co naaj on yalon anima, palta asan tzet yel chi jal pax on.

English: known, yet regarded as unknown; dying, and yet we live on; beaten, and yet not killed;
Kanjobal: Ay bay chi yal eb anima tol may on yojtakok eb, palta caw ojtakbil on yuj eb sic'libil. Ay bay chi yak'lej eb on yaon oc eb yul k'ab camich, palta ac'ala' iquis onc'al. Caw wal chi alay oc yailal jiban on, palta c'am chon cami.

English: sorrowful, yet always rejoicing; poor, yet making many rich; having nothing, and yet possessing everything.
Kanjobal: Caxc'al chon tx'emlay cusok, palta chon tzalojc'al on masanil tiempo. Caxc'al caw meba' on, palta xiwil mac chi beyomax yul sat Dios juj on. Caxc'al c'am jabok tzet ayon, palta a yul sat Dios, tz'akan ayon.

English: We have spoken freely to you, Corinthians, and opened wide our hearts to you.
Kanjobal: Ex aj Corinto, ti wal chi co le' co c'ul ayex. Masanil tzet ay yin co c'ul, chi jaltok ayex.

English: We are not withholding our affection from you, but you are withholding yours from us.
Kanjobal: Caw c'am junokxa tzet chi co c'ubaj el ayex, palta ayex ti', ay juntzan tzet che c'ubaj el ayon.

English: As a fair exchange–I speak as to my children–open wide your hearts also.
Kanjobal: Chin oc tean e yin axca junok mamej chi oc tean yin yuninal, caw che yaltek tzet ay yin e c'ul ayin, axca chi wut in leon in c'ul ayex.

English: Do not be yoked together with unbelievers. For what do righteousness and wickedness have in common? Or what fellowship can light have with darkness?
Kanjobal: C'am chi je' chi co junanej co ba yetok eb man creyenteok, yujtol caw wal man mojok axca tu', yujtol c'am chi chalej ba tojolal yetok yobtakil. Axa jun sakk'inal, c'am chi je' tol junej chi ayji ec' yetok k'ekk'inal.

English: What harmony is there between Christ and Belial? What does a believer have in common with an unbeliever?
Kanjobal: A Cristo caw c'am chi chalej ba nabal yetok Satanás. Ayon creyente on ti', man lajanok jet yetok eb man creyenteok.

English: What agreement is there between the temple of God and idols? For we are the temple of the living God. As God has said: “I will live with them and walk among them, and I will be their God, and they will be my people.”
Kanjobal: A tzet chi al-lay oc diosal, caw c'am yalon yet yetok yatut Dios. Yujtol ayon ti', yatut on Cham Dios iquis, axca yaloncan yul tx'an Un. Ayin ti', ok in cajay ec' yin eb, cax ok in ec'jabc'al yetok eb. Tol is Diosal in eb, axa eb in conob ok yuncan eb, ẍi.

English: “Therefore come out from them and be separate, says the Lord. Touch no unclean thing, and I will receive you.”
Kanjobal: Yuj tu', yalnak c'apax Cham Jajawil axca ti': Elanek xol eb, pojek el e ba. Manchak e mitx' tzetak yetal tol man watx'ok, cax ok ex in chaon oc wetok.

English: “I will be a Father to you, and you will be my sons and daughters, says the Lord Almighty.”
Kanjobal: Ok in oc e Mamok, cax ok ex oc in c'ajolok c'al in cutz'inok, ẍi Cham Jajawil, Cham tol chi je' yuj masanil, ẍi tx'an Un.

English: Since we have these promises, dear friends, let us purify ourselves from everything that contaminates body and spirit, perfecting holiness out of reverence for God.
Kanjobal: Ex in camc'ulnebil, a ton juntzan ti' yalnak Dios, yet max yak'on is ti' ayon. Yuj tu', co bekekcan tzet chi iontok co mimanil yetok co nabal yin tzet man watx'ok. Yowalil tz'akan chi jaoc co ba yul k'ab Dios yuj chon xiw bay Cham.

English: Make room for us in your hearts. We have wronged no one, we have corrupted no one, we have exploited no one.
Kanjobal: Aek oc yin e c'ul tzet chi jala'. Ilab c'am junok ex bay ocnak co mul. C'am junok ex max etax el e nabal juj. C'am c'apax junok ex max ex jetnej.

English: I do not say this to condemn you; I have said before that you have such a place in our hearts that we would live or die with you.
Kanjobal: Man yujok waon oc junok tzet yetal e yiban, xan chi waltok juntzan ti' ayex, yujtol toxa mayal waltok ayex, tol caxc'al tzet chi jayoc jiban, ayexc'al oc yin co c'ul masantac'al camich.

English: I have great confidence in you; I take great pride in you. I am greatly encouraged; in all our troubles my joy knows no bounds.
Kanjobal: Caw wal yip in c'ul e yayji, cax chex wal watx'il. Caxc'al xiwil tzet chi alay oc jiban, palta caw chi wi' in mimanc'ulal e yuj chi wabej. Caw chin tzaloj sic'libil e yuj.

English: For when we came into Macedonia, this body of ours had no rest, but we were harassed at every turn–conflicts on the outside, fears within.
Kanjobal: A yet max on jayoc bay Macedonia ti', c'am chi xew co mimanil ti', yujtol xiwilxa yailal max jay jiban. Owalc'al max alay oc jiban. Ay bay chi jayoc xiwilal jin.

English: But God, who comforts the downcast, comforted us by the coming of Titus,
Kanjobal: Palta chi mimanc'ulnej Dios masanil mac ayoc yin cusc'ulal, xan a Cham max ak'on mimanil co c'ul, yuj max jayoc Tito cayti'.

English: and not only by his coming but also by the comfort you had given him. He told us about your longing for me, your deep sorrow, your ardent concern for me, so that my joy was greater than ever.
Kanjobal: Man asannejok yuj max jayoc Tito xan max jion mimanil co c'ul, palta caw chon tzaloj c'apaxok, yujtol max e mimanc'ulnej Tito ti' yet max ec' ayex. A' max alon ayin, tol xiwil che yochej che yiloc win. Max yalon c'apaxok, tol xiwil chi cus e c'ul yuj jun tzet max uj e xol tu'. Max yaloni, tol caw xiwil chin e na'. Yuj tu', caw max aj can in tzalojc'ulal e yuj.

English: Even if I caused you sorrow by my letter, I do not regret it. Though I did regret it–I see that my letter hurt you, but only for a little while–
Kanjobal: Caxc'al max cus e c'ul yuj tzet chi yal tx'an carta wanaktok ayex, palta c'amxa chin cus yuj tinani'. Max in cus ton yuj yet babelal, yet max wabeni tol max ex ak'lay cus yuj, janic' tiempoal.

English: yet now I am happy, not because you were made sorry, but because your sorrow led you to repentance. For you became sorrowful as God intended and so were not harmed in any way by us.
Kanjobal: Axa tinani xin, caxc'al max ex cus yuj, palta chin tzaloji, yujtol a e cusc'ulal tu' max on e naon e ba. Max ex cus axca chi yochej Dios. Yuj tu', c'am jabok max jak' etax el e nabal.

English: Godly sorrow brings repentance that leads to salvation and leaves no regret, but worldly sorrow brings death.
Kanjobal: Ta chon cus axca chi yochej Dios, a jun co cusc'ulal tu' chi ak'on na ba co c'ul, cax chon colchajcanok. Ta caytu' yelapnok, maj on texac'al cusaj yuj, palta a is cusc'ulal yulyibank'inal ti', asanc'al camich chi yitek.

English: See what this godly sorrow has produced in you: what earnestness, what eagerness to clear yourselves, what indignation, what alarm, what longing, what concern, what readiness to see justice done. At every point you have proved yourselves to be innocent in this matter.
Kanjobal: Palta ayex ti', max ex cus axca chi yochej Dios. Yuj tu' naektek, tzet max yun e yeloc yuj. Caw yelc'ulal wal tol max ex oc il, cax max e yalontek tzet max el e yunen yuj e colon e ba. Max tit e yowal yuj jun tzet max uj e xol tu', max ex xiw c'apax aj yuj. Xiwil max e yochej max ex k'anjab wetok. Max el yin e c'ul e yak'on cuenta nak max oc is yobtakil tu' yuj e tx'oxk'abnen elok tol c'am e locanil yin jun is mul nak tu'.

English: So even though I wrote to you, it was not on account of the one who did the wrong or of the injured party, but rather that before God you could see for yourselves how devoted to us you are.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu xin, a yet max in tz'ibentok jun in carta tu', man yujok nak max oc is mul tu' xan max in tz'ibejtok, tamwal c'apax yuj jun mac bay max oc mul nak tu'. Palta yuj ok nachaj el e yuj, tol a yul sat Dios, caw ay ton e camc'ulal jin.

English: By all this we are encouraged. In addition to our own encouragement, we were especially delighted to see how happy Titus was, because his spirit has been refreshed by all of you.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu', caw max ji' can co mimanc'ulal. Palta man asannejok co mimanc'ulal max ji'. Caw wal max texac'al aj can co tzalojc'ulal yet max yalon Tito, tol caw wal max yak' tzalojbok c'ul e yetok, yujtol c'am tzet max na' e yuj e masanil.

English: I had boasted to him about you, and you have not embarrassed me. But just as everything we said to you was true, so our boasting about you to Titus has proved to be true as well.
Kanjobal: Walnak bay Tito ti' tol watx' ex. A tinani xin, man yobok chin can chi wabej, yujtol walnak axca tu'. Masanilc'al tzet walnak ayex yelc'al elok. Ac'ala' c'apax yet max wal bay Tito tol watx' ex, tutun yel, xan max wala'.

English: And his affection for you is all the greater when he remembers that you were all obedient, receiving him with fear and trembling.
Kanjobal: A Tito ti', caw wal ay is camc'ulal e yin tinani', yujtol chi natek tol che yikej tzet yalnakcan ayex, cax chi naon c'apaxtek tol yin ayilal max e yut e chaon apnok ayex tu', cax miman yelapnok yul e sat.

English: I am glad I can have complete confidence in you.
Kanjobal: Caw chin tzaloj tinani', yujtol chi je' ex waon oc yipok in c'ul.

English: And now, brothers, we want you to know about the grace that God has given the Macedonian churches.
Kanjobal: A tinani' ex wuẍtak, ex wanab, chi jochej chi jaltok ayex, tzet max yun txecloj el watx'c'ulal Dios nan xol eb creyente bay juntzan iglesia bay yul yet Macedonia ti'.

English: Out of the most severe trial, their overflowing joy and their extreme poverty welled up in rich generosity.
Kanjobal: Caxc'al caw max ak'lay porobal eb yuj juntzan yailal max jayoc yiban eb, palta caw chi tzaloj eb. Caxc'al caw meba' eb sic'libil, palta bekan yel yuj eb, axca tol beyom eb chi jila'.

English: For I testify that they gave as much as they were able, and even beyond their ability. Entirely on their own,
Kanjobal: Chi wak' testigoal in ba yin eb, tol yelc'ulal wal max yak' eb masanil jantak bay max tzakay eb yak'oni. Axa max yunej, tol max ec' yiban yak'on eb.

English: they urgently pleaded with us for the privilege of sharing in this service to the saints.
Kanjobal: Max ocxac'al tean eb jin, tol chi co cha' yak' eb is colwal, yujtol caw chi yochej eb chi colwajtok bay eb jet creyenteal.

English: And they did not do as we expected, but they gave themselves first to the Lord and then to us in keeping with God's will.
Kanjobal: A co naoni, tol jantaknejc'al minaj jabok ok yak' eb, palta titol caw miman max yut yak'on eb. Yujtol babel max bek oc ba eb bay Cham Jajawil. Max lajwi tu', max bekon c'apax oc ba eb ayon axca chi yochej Dios.

English: So we urged Titus, since he had earlier made a beginning, to bring also to completion this act of grace on your part.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu', max jal bay Tito, tol chex toj yila', cax chi toj chaon e yofrenda ok e yak' yuj e watx'c'ulalil tu', yujtol a' max chaon el yich chaoni.

English: But just as you excel in everything–in faith, in speech, in knowledge, in complete earnestness and in your love for us –see that you also excel in this grace of giving.
Kanjobal: Xiwil watx'il tzet chi el e yunen tu'. Caw che yaoc yin e c'ul. Caw cuywajwom ex, jelan exxa. Caw watx' chi yun e mulnaji. Chon e camc'ulnen c'apaxok. Yuj tu', matawal che tx'oxk'abnej c'apax el e watx'il yin e yak'on e yofrenda.

English: I am not commanding you, but I want to test the sincerity of your love by comparing it with the earnestness of others.
Kanjobal: A jun chi waltok ayex ti', man chekbanilok yayji. Toc'al chi wochej che yabej, tzet chi yut yak'on eb yofrenda cayti', yet watx' chi txecloj elok, ta yel ay e camc'ulal bay tu'.

English: For you know the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ, that though he was rich, yet for your sakes he became poor, so that you through his poverty might become rich.
Kanjobal: Yujtol jojtak, a Cham Jajawil Jesucristo, caw miman is watx'c'ulal Cham. Xiwil beyomal Cham bay satcan; palta ul yutnak ba Cham mebail yuj camc'ulal Cham jin. Max yut ba Cham axca tu', yet watx', a is mebail Cham tu' chi on joccan beyomal yul sat Dios.

English: And here is my advice about what is best for you in this matter: Last year you were the first not only to give but also to have the desire to do so.
Kanjobal: Chi waltok ayex tzet chin na' yin e yofrenda tu', yet watx' ok e yojtaknej elok. Jun abitax max e chacan el yich e yak'on e yofrenda, yujtol max el yin e c'ul e yak'oni.

English: Now finish the work, so that your eager willingness to do it may be matched by your completion of it, according to your means.
Kanjobal: A tinani', chi wochej tol che yak' e yip e lajoncan e yak'oni. Axca max e yut e chaon el yich e yak'on yin masanil e c'ul, axcaokab tu' che yut e lajoncan tinani', atac'ala' tzet ayex.

English: For if the willingness is there, the gift is acceptable according to what one has, not according to what he does not have.
Kanjobal: Ta yel chi el wal yin co c'ul chi jak'on jofrenda atac'ala' tzet ay yul co k'ab, caw chi tzaloj Dios jetok. C'am chi k'an Cham, ta c'am tzet ay yul co k'ab.

English: Our desire is not that others might be relieved while you are hard pressed, but that there might be equality.
Kanjobal: C'am chi wochej chi oc mebail e yin, c'al chi lajwi el tzet ay ayex, yujc'al e colwaj bay juntzanokxa mactxel.

English: At the present time your plenty will supply what they need, so that in turn their plenty will supply what you need. Then there will be equality,
Kanjobal: Palta chi wochej tol jun lajanokabc'al jet co masanil. A tinani', a tzet chi yak' sobra ayex, chi je' e yak'on tz'akok tzet ayto palta yul k'ab eb tu'. Axa junelokxa, axaokab eb chi ak'on tz'ak tzet ayto palta ayex. Ta caytu' chi jut axca tu', lajanc'al yec' co xol co masanil.

English: as it is written: “He who gathered much did not have too much, and he who gathered little did not have too little.”
Kanjobal: Yujtol chi yal tx'an Un Tz'ibbilcan axca ti': Maj yak' sobra bay mac miman max wajajok, c'uxanc'al max yab bay eb txennej max wajajok, ẍi tx'an.

English: I thank God, who put into the heart of Titus the same concern I have for you.
Kanjobal: Chi wal yuj diosalil bay Dios, yujtol a' max ak'on jay yin c'ul Tito, cax chex ya'ilneni, axca chi wut in c'ul e yin ayin ti'.

English: For Titus not only welcomed our appeal, but he is coming to you with much enthusiasm and on his own initiative.
Kanjobal: A yet max in k'anon bay, yuj ex toj yiloni, ayman max tak'wej toji. Chi yochej chex toj yil yin masanil is c'ul, yuj tu' xan, ok tok.

English: And we are sending along with him the brother who is praised by all the churches for his service to the gospel.
Kanjobal: Ay junxa juẍtak ok co chektok yetok. A junxa ti', chi al-lay watx'il yuj eb creyente bay junjun iglesia, yujtol caw wal watx' mulnaj yin yalon el k'anejal yet colbanilej.

English: What is more, he was chosen by the churches to accompany us as we carry the offering, which we administer in order to honor the Lord himself and to show our eagerness to help.
Kanjobal: Yetok c'apaxok, a ton jun juẍtak ti' sic'bil el yuj eb creyente bay junjun iglesia, yuj ec' chaon ch'en ofrenda tu' jetok. Lanan jion aj jun ofrenda ti', yet watx' chi txecloj el watx'il Cham Jajawil cax chi txecloj c'apax el e watx'c'ulal.

English: We want to avoid any criticism of the way we administer this liberal gift.
Kanjobal: Chi jochej tol c'am junok mactxel chi alon junok tzet jin, yuj tzet chi jut ec' jion aj jun ofrenda ti'.

English: For we are taking pains to do what is right, not only in the eyes of the Lord but also in the eyes of men.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu' watx'c'al chi jutej, yet watx' c'amc'al cabc'ulal jin. Man asannejok satak Cham Jajawil watx'c'al chi jut co ba, palta watx'c'al chi jut co ba satak c'apax eb jet animail.

English: In addition, we are sending with them our brother who has often proved to us in many ways that he is zealous, and now even more so because of his great confidence in you.
Kanjobal: Ay junxa juẍtak ok co chektok yetok eb ti'. A jun juẍtak ti', tx'ial elxa chi jila' tol watx'c'al mulnaj yin yet Cham Jajawil. A tinani', caw wal yochwan chi mulnaji, yujtol caw wal chex yaoc yipok c'ul.

English: As for Titus, he is my partner and fellow worker among you; as for our brothers, they are representatives of the churches and an honor to Christ.
Kanjobal: Ta ay mac ok k'anlen el ayex, tzet yayji Tito ti', quex chi bay eb axca ti': Yetbi ba yetok Pablo, cax tol ayic' mulnaj co xol ti', quex chi. Ta ay mac ok k'anlen yuj eb ok apnok yetok Tito tu', quex chi bay eb axca ti': A eb ti', a eb creyente bay iglesialak cheknejtek eb, a watx'il Cristo caw chi txecloj el yin is beybal eb, quex chi.

English: Therefore show these men the proof of your love and the reason for our pride in you, so that the churches can see it.
Kanjobal: A yet ok apnok oc eb ayex tu', caw che tx'ox e camc'ulal bay eb. Ta ok e tx'ox e camc'ulal axca jalon ti', axca tol lanan e tx'oxon el bay eb creyente bay junjun iglesia, tol yel max jala', yet max jalon on tol watx' ex.

English: There is no need for me to write to you about this service to the saints.
Kanjobal: A yuj e yofrenda ok e yak' bay eb jet creyenteal, man yowalilok chin tz'ibejtok ayex yuj.

English: For I know your eagerness to help, and I have been boasting about it to the Macedonians, telling them that since last year you in Achaia were ready to give; and your enthusiasm has stirred most of them to action.
Kanjobal: Yujtol wojtakxa, tol caw wal che yochej chex colwaj bay eb. Lanan ex walon watx'il bay eb aj Macedonia ti'. Tix chi wut k'anjab in ba e yin bay eb axca ti': A eb creyente yul yet Acaya, junxa abilc'al c'oli eb yak'on yofrenda, quin chi. Axa yet max yaben eb aj Macedonia ti', tol yelc'ulal wal lanan e yak'oni, cax xiwil eb max bulchaj yak'on yet.

English: But I am sending the brothers in order that our boasting about you in this matter should not prove hollow, but that you may be ready, as I said you would be.
Kanjobal: Palta ok in chektok eb juẍtak ti' ayex, yet watx' manokabc'al nabaok tzet watx' max el walon e yin tu'. Ok in chektok eb, yet watx' wajanxaokab yayji e yofrenda tu', axca max wut walon e yin tu'.

English: For if any Macedonians come with me and find you unprepared, we–not to say anything about you–would be ashamed of having been so confident.
Kanjobal: Ta ay eb aj Macedonia ti' chi toj wetok, cax axa chi yilon eb tol c'amto e yofrenda tu', ti wal q'uixwil ok on can yul sat eb, yujtol toxa mayal ex jaoc yipok co c'ul. Man lananok waloni ta e q'uixwil ok el ayex ti'.

English: So I thought it necessary to urge the brothers to visit you in advance and finish the arrangements for the generous gift you had promised. Then it will be ready as a generous gift, not as one grudgingly given.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu', max in na', tol yowalil chin k'an bay eb juẍtak ti', yet watx' a ayex tu' chi babji toj eb. Ok tok eb colwaj e yetok yin chaon e yofrenda tu', axca max e yut e yak'on e ti'. Ta caytu', watx'xaokab yayji e yofrenda tu', cax ok e yak'on yuj e watx'c'ulal, yet watx' mayonnak ok ex tok jak' pural e yak'oni.

English: Remember this: Whoever sows sparingly will also reap sparingly, and whoever sows generously will also reap generously.
Kanjobal: Naektek junxa ok wal ti'. A eb txennej tzet chi yawa', txennej tzet chi waj eb. Axa mac miman tzet chi yawa', miman tzet chi waj eb.

English: Each man should give what he has decided in his heart to give, not reluctantly or under compulsion, for God loves a cheerful giver.
Kanjobal: Junjunokab on chi co na yul jet jantak chi el yin co c'ul chi jak'a'. Manokab yinok cusc'ulalil chi jak'a'. Mantok tol chon ak'lay pural chi jabej, xan chi jak'a', yujtol a Dios chi cam c'ul yin eb chi tzaloj yak'oni.

English: And God is able to make all grace abound to you, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.
Kanjobal: A Dios chi je' yuj yak'on masanil tzet yetal ayex yuj is watx'c'ulal. Chi yak' masanil tzet caw chi oc yopiso e yuj yin masanil tiempo. Toltax chi yak'xac'al sobra ayex. Yuj tu', xiwil bay chi je' e colwaj ocok.

English: As it is written: “He has scattered abroad his gifts to the poor; his righteousness endures forever.”
Kanjobal: Ilab tol chi yal tx'an Un axca ti': Yin c'am basil max colwaj xol eb meba'. A is watx'c'ulal tu' ayc'al yin tojbalk'inal, ẍi.

English: Now he who supplies seed to the sower and bread for food will also supply and increase your store of seed and will enlarge the harvest of your righteousness.
Kanjobal: A Dios chi ak'on masanil inat chi awlayi, cax chi yak'on c'apax masanil tzet chi loji. A' ok ak'on masanil tzetak yetal ay ayex ok e yak' e yofrendaok. Axca tol ok e yawcanok. A is q'uexel ok e cha' yuj e nabal watx' tu', ok ch'ib yuj Dios, cax ok e jatx'oni.

English: You will be made rich in every way so that you can be generous on every occasion, and through us your generosity will result in thanksgiving to God.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu' xiwil watx'il ok e cha', yet watx' ok je' e yak'on janic'okxa. Xiwil eb jet creyenteal ok alon yuj diosalil bay Dios yet ok chaon eb jun e yofrenda ok jitok bay eb tu'.

English: This service that you perform is not only supplying the needs of God's people but is also overflowing in many expressions of thanks to God.
Kanjobal: Yujtol a jun colwal ok ak'lay bay eb tu', a yopiso man asannejok yuj col-lay eltek eb yalan cawxinakil yuj, palta ok yal eb yuj diosalil bay Dios e yuj.

English: Because of the service by which you have proved yourselves, men will praise God for the obedience that accompanies your confession of the gospel of Christ, and for your generosity in sharing with them and with everyone else.
Kanjobal: Ok yal eb watx' k'anej bay Dios, yujtol a jun e yofrenda tu' ok tx'oxk'abnen elok, tol lanan e yiken watx' abix yet Cristo. Yetok c'apaxok, ok yal eb watx' k'anej bay Dios yuj jun e miman colwal che yak' bay eb tu', yujtol ok colwaj oc bay masanil eb jet creyenteal.

English: And in their prayers for you their hearts will go out to you, because of the surpassing grace God has given you.
Kanjobal: Axa eb ok chaon tu', ok txajlok eb e yuj. Caw wal ok ex camc'ulnej eb, yujtol ayex chex yak'balnej Dios yin e tx'oxon el xiwil is watx'c'ulalil bay eb.

English: Thanks be to God for his indescribable gift!
Kanjobal: Jalek yuj diosalil bay Dios, yujtol a jun Colwajwom max yak' ayon, c'amxa chi alchaj elok, jantak watx'il.

English: The elder, To the chosen lady and her children, whom I love in the truth–and not I only, but also all who know the truth–
Kanjobal: Ayin ton anciano in chin tz'ibejtok jun in carta ti' ayach, ach wanab sic'bilxa el yuj Dios, c'al yetok bay eb one'. Wal yel ay in camc'ulal e yin. Man asannejok in ay in camc'ulal e yin, palta masanil c'apax eb ojtaknen jun cuybej caw wal yel, ay c'apax is camc'ulal eb e yin.

English: because of the truth, which lives in us and will be with us forever:
Kanjobal: Ay co camc'ulal e yin yuj jun abix caw wal yel, tol ayxa oc jin yin junelnej.

English: Grace, mercy and peace from God the Father and from Jesus Christ, the Father's Son, will be with us in truth and love.
Kanjobal: Yak'okabc'al co Mam Dios, yetok Cham Jajawil Jesucristo is watx'c'ulal ayex. Ok'okab c'ul eb e yin, yak'okab c'apax eb is junc'ulal ayex bay tu', yujtol ayoc co nabal yin tzet yetal tol yel, cax ay pax co camc'ulal.

English: It has given me great joy to find some of your children walking in the truth, just as the Father commanded us.
Kanjobal: Caw wal max tzaloj aj in c'ul yet max wabeni, tol ay eb one' lanan beybalnen jun cuybej caw wal yel, axca wal yaloncan co Mam Dios ayon.

English: And now, dear lady, I am not writing you a new command but one we have had from the beginning. I ask that we love one another.
Kanjobal: A tinani xin, chin tewi ayach, tol wal chi co camc'ulnelejek co ba co masanil. A jun chekbanil chi waltok ayach ti', man aokto jaben ti', yujtol atax yet max jaon oc Dios yin co c'ul max jaben jun ti'.

English: And this is love: that we walk in obedience to his commands. As you have heard from the beginning, his command is that you walk in love.
Kanjobal: Ta lanan co beybalnen tzet chi yal chekbanil Dios, ay co camc'ulal chi yal tu'. A jun chekbanil max jab yettax max on oc yetok Dios, a' chi aloni tol chi co camc'ulnelejek co ba.

English: Many deceivers, who do not acknowledge Jesus Christ as coming in the flesh, have gone out into the world. Any such person is the deceiver and the antichrist.
Kanjobal: A tinani', xiwil eb lek'ti' chi ec' bay yulyibank'inal ti'. Chi ec' yal eb axca ti': Man ocnakok Jesucristo animail yet max ulic'ok, ẍi eb, chi tz'akon yal eb. A eb chi alon axca tu', toc'al chi yal eb; chita yal eb axca tu' yujtol ajc'ul oc eb yin Cristo.

English: Watch out that you do not lose what you have worked for, but that you may be rewarded fully.
Kanjobal: Ilekc'al e ba bay eb ayex ti', yet watx' man nabaok e mulnajil bay tu'. Ta axca wal walon ti' che yut e ba, tz'akanc'al ok e cha' e paktzil bay Dios.

English: Anyone who runs ahead and does not continue in the teaching of Christ does not have God; whoever continues in the teaching has both the Father and the Son.
Kanjobal: Tzanc'al mac chi pitnej ba bay cuybej yalnakcan Cristo, cax chi bekoncanok, c'am oc Dios yin chi yal tu'. Palta ta ayc'al oc co nabal yin is cuybej tu xin, ayoc co Mam Dios jin chi yal tu', cax ay c'apax oc is C'ajol jin.

English: If anyone comes to you and does not bring this teaching, do not take him into your house or welcome him.
Kanjobal: Ta ay mac chi jayoc ayex, tol tx'ok cuybanilej chi ec' yala', manchak e cha eb bay e yatut, tamwal che k'an is watx'c'ulal Dios yiban.

English: Anyone who welcomes him shares in his wicked work.
Kanjobal: Ta che k'an is watx'c'ulal Dios yiban, axca wal tol che yaltok e yet yin is cuybej man watx'ok tu' yetok.

English: I have much to write to you, but I do not want to use paper and ink. Instead, I hope to visit you and talk with you face to face, so that our joy may be complete.
Kanjobal: Xiwiltoc'al juntzanxa tzet chi yochej in c'ul chi waltok ayex, palta man ok in tz'ibejtok yul jun in carta ti'. Yujtol chin na', tol chok wal je' ex toj wiloni. Catatu' chin watx' alnencan juntzanxa tzet yetal ayex, cax chi texac'al tz'aknajcan el co tzalojc'ulal bay tu'.

English: The children of your chosen sister send their greetings.
Kanjobal: A eb yune' xal a nuej ayic' cayti', a ton xal sic'bilxa el yuj Dios, chi yatok eb cawil a c'ul bay tu'.

English: Simon Peter, a servant and apostle of Jesus Christ, To those who through the righteousness of our God and Savior Jesus Christ have received a faith as precious as ours:
Kanjobal: Ayin ton Simón Pedro in, yak'omal in serbil Jesucristo. Is chekbej in c'apaxok. Ti chin tz'ibejtok jun in carta ti' ayex, ex che yaoc e c'ul yin Dios jetok on, xan lajan wal watx'il e yet axca jet ti'. Tix yuj ti' xan watx' jet, yujtol a co Diosal, a ton Cham co Colomal Jesucristo, caw watx' ton Cham.

English: Grace and peace be yours in abundance through the knowledge of God and of Jesus our Lord.
Kanjobal: Yak'okab Dios miman watx'c'ulal, c'al junc'ulal ayex, yujtol e yojtakxa Cham, yetok Cham Jajawil Jesús.

English: His divine power has given us everything we need for life and godliness through our knowledge of him who called us by his own glory and goodness.
Kanjobal: Ay juntzan tzet yetal caw yowalil chi oc juj, yet watx' chi ja wal oc co nabal yin Dios, yak'ban ayon ec' cayti'. Mayal yak' Cham masanil juntzan tzet yetal tu' ayon yuj yipalil, yujtol mayal yak' jojtaknej el Jesucristo. A awtenej on oc yetok, yujtol miman yelapnok Cham, cax xiwil is watx'ilal.

English: Through these he has given us his very great and precious promises, so that through them you may participate in the divine nature and escape the corruption in the world caused by evil desires.
Kanjobal: Yuj is watx'il tu', xan tol max yak'can Cham is ti' ayon. A juntzan tzet albilcan tu', caw wal miman yelapnok, cax xiwil watx'il. Yuj juntzan tu', xan chi je' co colchaj el yul k'ab juntzan yob ochwanilej bay sat tx'otx' ti', yujtol a is nabal Dios ayoc jin yuj juntzan tzet albilcan tu'.

English: For this very reason, make every effort to add to your faith goodness; and to goodness, knowledge;
Kanjobal: Yuj tu xin, man k'okbilok tol chi jaoc co c'ul yin. Yowalil chi jak' c'apax jip co watx'nen oc co beybal. Chi cam wal co cuyon jelanil Dios.

English: and to knowledge, self-control; and to self-control, perseverance; and to perseverance, godliness;
Kanjobal: Co mitx'ek waay co ba yin tzet man watx'ok. Caw tec'an chi jut co ba. Asanokab yin Dios chi jaoc co nabal.

English: and to godliness, brotherly kindness; and to brotherly kindness, love.
Kanjobal: Watx'okabc'al chi jut co nabal yin eb juẍtak, c'al yin eb janab, chi co camc'ulnelej c'apax co ba yetok eb.

English: For if you possess these qualities in increasing measure, they will keep you from being ineffective and unproductive in your knowledge of our Lord Jesus Christ.
Kanjobal: Ta a juntzan ti' yelc'ulal wal tol chi ji' can junjun c'u, caw ay jopiso yuj Dios chi yal tu'. Man nabaokc'al max jojtaknej el Cham Jajawil Jesucristo chi yal tu'.

English: But if anyone does not have them, he is nearsighted and blind, and has forgotten that he has been cleansed from his past sins.
Kanjobal: Palta a mac manchak beybalnen juntzan ti', axca tol makantoc'al sat eb, ma xin, axca tol c'am chi je' yilontok eb junok tzet yetal najat, yujtol c'amxa chi natek eb tatol ibilxa el is yobtakil eb yet yalantok.

English: Therefore, my brothers, be all the more eager to make your calling and election sure. For if you do these things, you will never fall,
Kanjobal: Yuj tu' ex wuẍtak, ex wanab, caw jak'okab jip jojtaknencan el sic'libil tol yel awtebil onxa, c'al sic'bil onxa el yuj Cham. Tatol axca tu' chi jut co ba, c'am bak'in ok etax el co nabal.

English: and you will receive a rich welcome into the eternal kingdom of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ.
Kanjobal: Ta axca tu', c'am tzet ok on tenon oc wanaj yin joc yul k'ab Cham Jajawil Jesucristo Cham co Colomal. A yikbej Cham, ayc'al yin tojbalk'inal.

English: So I will always remind you of these things, even though you know them and are firmly established in the truth you now have.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu', caxc'al e yojtakxa juntzan ti', caxc'al tec'anxa e waay yin juntzan cuybanilej caw yel bay ayoc e nabal, ok in jek e na'.

English: I think it is right to refresh your memory as long as I live in the tent of this body,
Kanjobal: Chin na' tol watx' chex wiptzej, cax chin jekon e na' juntzan ti', yak'ban tol iquis into ec'ok.

English: because I know that I will soon put it aside, as our Lord Jesus Christ has made clear to me.
Kanjobal: Yujtol a Cham Jajawil Jesucristo max ak'on nachaj el wuj, tol manxa mimanok tiempo ayin ec'ok.

English: And I will make every effort to see that after my departure you will always be able to remember these things.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu xin, xan chi wak' wip, yet watx' ok je' e naonc'altek juntzan cuybanilej ti' masanil tiempo, yet maxax in cam tu'.

English: We did not follow cleverly invented stories when we told you about the power and coming of our Lord Jesus Christ, but we were eyewitnesses of his majesty.
Kanjobal: Albilxacan juj ayex, tol ay yip Cham Jajawil Jesucristo, cax tol yowalil ok jay Cham yet is cayelal, palta a juntzan tu', man comon k'anejok. Man yulok jet max co naon ajok, yujtol ayon wal caw max jil Cham Jajawil tu' tol xiwil watx'il.

English: For he received honor and glory from God the Father when the voice came to him from the Majestic Glory, saying, “This is my Son, whom I love; with him I am well pleased.”
Kanjobal: Acaw ilbil juj, yet max ilay can yuj co Mam Dios. Max jab yalon Dios tol miman yelapnok Cham Jajawil tu'. Max yal aytek Dios xol tzekekial axca ti': A ton jun in C'ajol ti', camc'ulnebil wuj. Caw chin tzaloj yetok, ẍi aytek.

English: We ourselves heard this voice that came from heaven when we were with him on the sacred mountain.
Kanjobal: A jay belan k'anej albil satcan tu', caw max cam jaben on, yujtol ayon ec' yetok Cham Jajawil bay jun tzalan bay max ulaytek Dios.

English: And we have the word of the prophets made more certain, and you will do well to pay attention to it, as to a light shining in a dark place, until the day dawns and the morning star rises in your hearts.
Kanjobal: Yetok c'apaxok, ayokto jay Cham Jajawil tu' cax max tz'ibelaycan yabixal yuj eb chekbej Dios. Ayic' tx'an Un bay Tz'ibbilcan tu' tinani'. A tzet chi yal tx'an Un tu', a caw yel. Caw watx' chi jut co ba, ta ac'ala' jaon oc co nabal yin tzet tz'ibbilcan yuj eb tu', yujtol a tx'an Un tu', lajan tx'an axca junok co tzektebal chi co tzek xol k'ekk'inal. Chon is tzektanej masantac'al chi sakbi, yet chi ajol c'u. Axca c'u tu', caytu' yet ok jay Cristo, axa yak'on mimanbok sakk'inal yin janimail tu'.

English: Above all, you must understand that no prophecy of Scripture came about by the prophet's own interpretation.
Kanjobal: A eb chekbej Dios yet payxa tu', ayoktoc'al max tz'ibenc'alcan eb yul tx'an Un juntzan tzet t'inan jayi, palta yowalil chi jojtaknej elok, tol c'am junok mac chi je' comonc'al chi yal tx'oklil tzet chi yal elapnok juntzan tzet tz'ibbilcan tu'.

English: For prophecy never had its origin in the will of man, but men spoke from God as they were carried along by the Holy Spirit.
Kanjobal: Yujtol a eb tu', c'am junok tzet yulc'al yet eb max naaj eb yin is nabal, max tz'ibencan ay eb, palta a Dios sic'nej el eb. Axa Cham Yespíritu Dios chi ak'on nachaj el yuj eb, tzetbil chi yut yaloncan el eb is k'anej tu', cax max tz'ibencan ay eb.

English: But there were also false prophets among the people, just as there will be false teachers among you. They will secretly introduce destructive heresies, even denying the sovereign Lord who bought them–bringing swift destruction on themselves.
Kanjobal: A eb wet israelal yet payxa, ay eb max tz'ak yaloc ba chekbejok Dios. Ac'ala' c'apax co xol, ay eb ok yaloc ba meẍtolal, cax yin ewantakil ok yak'on eb cuylay lek'ti cuybanilej co xol, yet watx' ayon ok on etax el yuj eb. Caw wal c'am yelapnok Cham Jajawil yul sat eb tu', palta ti pax wal a Cham max cam yuj tojolok is yobtakil eb. Yuj tu xin, munilc'al chi yitek eb yiban. Ayman ok c'aycan el eb yin junelnej.

English: Many will follow their shameful ways and will bring the way of truth into disrepute.
Kanjobal: Xiwil mactxel ok beybalnen jun is yob beybal eb tu'. Yujc'al ton eb, xan ok al-layok tol c'am yelapnok jun beybalej yel bay ayon oc ti'.

English: In their greed these teachers will exploit you with stories they have made up. Their condemnation has long been hanging over them, and their destruction has not been sleeping.
Kanjobal: Yuj pek' tuminal eb, xan watx'xac'al ok yut yalon eb lek'tial k'anej ayex, a ton juntzan k'anej tol yulc'al yet eb max naon aj eb. Palta payxatax beyc'ulnebil eb yuj Dios. Yuj tu', yowalil ok c'aycan el eb yin junelnej. Maj je' colon ba eb bay jun c'aybanilal tu'.

English: For if God did not spare angels when they sinned, but sent them to hell, putting them into gloomy dungeons to be held for judgment;
Kanjobal: Co naektek tzet max yun yeloc eb ángel ocnak is yobtakil bay Dios. Tutun wal maj yak' mimanc'ulal yin eb. A ti yet eb, tol max k'oklaytok eb bay jun lugar chi yik Tártaro yuj Cham. C'anani max yun eb yetok cadena. Preso yayji eb xol k'ekk'inal tinani', masantac'al ok beyc'ulnelay eb.

English: if he did not spare the ancient world when he brought the flood on its ungodly people, but protected Noah, a preacher of righteousness, and seven others;
Kanjobal: Yetok c'apaxok, maj yak' Dios mimanc'ulal yin eb anima yet payxa. Yanaktek jun owal aej mukwajwom yiban eb yobtakwom tu'. Asan Noé colchajnakcan el yetok ukwan is familia. A Noé tu', yalnak el xol anima tu', tol watx'okabc'al chi yut eb is nabal.

English: if he condemned the cities of Sodom and Gomorrah by burning them to ashes, and made them an example of what is going to happen to the ungodly;
Kanjobal: Yetok c'apaxok, yanaktek Dios is c'aybanilal el eb aj Sodoma yetok eb aj Gomorra. Pilan lajwinak el cab conob tu', max tz'atok yuj k'ak'ej. Tanxac'al max yuncantok masanil. A eb lajwinak el tu', is tx'oxbanilok eb c'am Dios yul sat.

English: and if he rescued Lot, a righteous man, who was distressed by the filthy lives of lawless men
Kanjobal: Asannej Lot colchajnak el xol eb, yujtol watx' yayji is nabal. A yet c'amto chi lajwi el eb tu', max oc pitz'an cusc'ulal yin yuj eb.

English: (for that righteous man, living among them day after day, was tormented in his righteous soul by the lawless deeds he saw and heard)–
Kanjobal: Watx'c'al is beybal Lot tu', palta junjunc'al c'u, cac'al ti' yiloni, c'al yaben juntzan tzet man watx'ok chi el yunen eb anima tu'. Yuj tu' xan cusc'ulalc'al ay yuj eb.

English: if this is so, then the Lord knows how to rescue godly men from trials and to hold the unrighteous for the day of judgment, while continuing their punishment.
Kanjobal: Cac'apax tu' tinani'. Yojtak Cham Jajawil tzetbil chi yut colon el eb ayoc nabal yin, yet chi ak'lay porobal eb. Yojtak c'apax tzet chi yut yaoncantok eb man watx'ok is nabal bay yailal, bay chi tojcan eb, masantac'al ok jay jun c'ual yet ok beyc'ulnelay eb.

English: This is especially true of those who follow the corrupt desire of the sinful nature and despise authority. Bold and arrogant, these men are not afraid to slander celestial beings;
Kanjobal: Ay eb caw chi yaoc yin c'ul yunen juntzan tzet man watx'ok chi yochej oc yetok is mimanil. C'am wal jabok yelapnok Cham Jajawil yul sat eb. A ton eb ti' ok alaycantok bay yailal tu'. C'amxa chi xiw eb yunen tzet man watx'ok. Comonc'al chi yun eb tzet chi yochej. Toltax c'am chi xiw eb buchwaj yin juntzan mac caw miman yelapnok.

English: yet even angels, although they are stronger and more powerful, do not bring slanderous accusations against such beings in the presence of the Lord.
Kanjobal: Toltax eb ángel, ti pax wal xiwil yipal eb, cax miman c'apax yelapnok eb, palta c'am chi tec'baj ba eb yalon aj is mul juntzan tu' yin buchwal k'anej satak Cham Jajawil.

English: But these men blaspheme in matters they do not understand. They are like brute beasts, creatures of instinct, born only to be caught and destroyed, and like beasts they too will perish.
Kanjobal: Axca wal junok no no' c'am is nabal, caytu' eb anima tu', yujtol asanc'al tzet chi yochej oc is mimanil eb chi el yuneni. Comon chi buchwaj eb yin juntzan tzet man yojtakok eb. Yuj tu' xan ok c'aylay el eb, axca chi yun c'aylay el no no' tol chi alji no' yuj mitx'layi, c'al c'aylay elok.

English: They will be paid back with harm for the harm they have done. Their idea of pleasure is to carouse in broad daylight. They are blots and blemishes, reveling in their pleasures while they feast with you.
Kanjobal: Axca chi yut yaon oc eb yailal yiban juntzanokxa, caytu' ok yun yalay c'apax oc yailal eb. Caxc'al c'ualil, chi yaoc eb nabal yunen tzet chi yochej ocok, yuj yak'on eb tzalojbok c'ul yin. Caw wal q'uixwiltak yayji eb e xol, yob e yili yul sat Dios yujc'al eb. Yujtol comonc'al chi low eb e yetok yet che yak'on waj loj. A yet chi oc eb e yetok, toc'al chi yak' eb tzalojbok c'ul yin tzet chi yochej oc eb tu'.

English: With eyes full of adultery, they never stop sinning; they seduce the unstable; they are experts in greed–an accursed brood!
Kanjobal: Asanxanej mulej chi na eb yet chi yilon eb junok ix. Caw wal c'am chi je' mitx'on oc waan ba eb yunen ajmulal. Chi ak'lay c'ul eb c'amto tec'anil yuj eb. K'aynak eb yochen oc tzet man watx'ok. Yuj tu' xan caw wal aytek yowal c'ul Dios yiban eb.

English: They have left the straight way and wandered off to follow the way of Balaam son of Beor, who loved the wages of wickedness.
Kanjobal: Max bekcan eb watx' beybalej, cax max c'aycantok eb. Yuj tu' xan a is beybal cham Balaam, cham c'ajol Beor, a' chi beybalnej eb. A cham Balaam tu' max yaloc ba chekbejok Dios, palta asan yion tumin yin tzet man watx'ok max yochej cham.

English: But he was rebuked for his wrongdoing by a donkey–a beast without speech–who spoke with a man's voice and restrained the prophet's madness.
Kanjobal: Axa laj no burro tol jojtak tol c'amc'alta' chi je' k'anjabi, a no' max tzuon yuj is yobtakil tu', max k'anjab aj no' axca anima. A no' tennej oc waan yin is c'am nabalil chi yun tu'.

English: These men are springs without water and mists driven by a storm. Blackest darkness is reserved for them.
Kanjobal: A eb ak'om lek'tial co xol ti', axca wal junok nuk' aej tannakxa, cay wal tu' eb. Yetok c'apaxok, axca wal junok asun toc'al chi lanani ec' yuj cak'ek', cay wal tu' eb. C'am chi ec' tojcan eb bay k'ekk'inal yin junelnej.

English: For they mouth empty, boastful words and, by appealing to the lustful desires of sinful human nature, they entice people who are just escaping from those who live in error.
Kanjobal: Toc'al chi yiaj can ba eb yalon tzet c'amxac'al yelapnok. Ilab chi yal eb axca ti': Chi je' junen tzet man watx'ok, chic'al je' junen tzet chi jochej oc yetok co mimanil ti', ẍi eb, chi tz'ak yalon eb. Caytu' chi yut yak'on eb c'ul eb lanan colchaj el xol tzet man watx'ok.

English: They promise them freedom, while they themselves are slaves of depravity–for a man is a slave to whatever has mastered him.
Kanjobal: Chi yal eb axca ti': Bekanc'al junen tzet chi jochej, ẍi eb, chi tz'ak yalon eb; palta a eb tu', man bekanok yayji eb, yujtol ayoc eb yak'omalok serbil tzet man watx'ok tu', yujtol a mac chi can yalan yuj junok tzet yetal, chi yal elapnok tol chi oc yak'omalok serbil jun tzet tu'.

English: If they have escaped the corruption of the world by knowing our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ and are again entangled in it and overcome, they are worse off at the end than they were at the beginning.
Kanjobal: A yet max jojtaknej el Jajawil Jesucristo co Colomal, atax yet tu' max con colchaj el yul k'ab juntzan tzet man watx'ok sat tx'otx' ti'; palta ta chi jaoc co ba yul k'ab juntzan tu' junelxa, ta chon can yalan yuj, yelxac'al yob jet yintak pax yet yalan.

English: It would have been better for them not to have known the way of righteousness, than to have known it and then to turn their backs on the sacred command that was passed on to them.
Kanjobal: A eb axca tu' chi yut ba, matawal maj yaoc eb nabal yin jun watx' beybalej ti'. Watx'to wal yet eb jabok yet yalan. Akxa xin, max yaoc eb nabal yin. Chi lajwi tu' cax chi bekoncan eb chekbanil Dios ak'bil bay eb. Yuj tu' xan yelxac'al yob yet eb tinani'.

English: Of them the proverbs are true: “A dog returns to its vomit,” and, “A sow that is washed goes back to her wallowing in the mud.”
Kanjobal: Ay wal jun k'anej caw wal yel, chi yal axca ti': A no tx'i', chi meltzoj no', chi lek'on aj is xaw. Yetok c'apax no txitam, chi lajwi tx'ajlay no', ayman chi toj no' xol tz'otz'ew, ẍi. Axca ton wal no' tx'i tu' ma no txitam tu', cay wal tu' eb ti', yujtol chi toj pax eb xol tzet man watx'ok junelxa.

English: Dear friends, this is now my second letter to you. I have written both of them as reminders to stimulate you to wholesome thinking.
Kanjobal: Ex in camc'ulnebil, yet-xa is cab jun in carta chi watok ayex ti', tol ac'ala' chin jek e na' juntzan cuybanilej e yojtakxa, yet watx' chi watx'ji oc e nabal sic'libil.

English: I want you to recall the words spoken in the past by the holy prophets and the command given by our Lord and Savior through your apostles.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu', yowalil che natek juntzan tzet tz'ibbilcan yuj eb chekbej Dios yet payxa, eb is chekbej sic'bil el yuj. Naek c'apaxtek chekbanil Cham Jajawil co Colomal. A is chekbanil tu', albilxacan ayex juj ayon is chekbej on ti'.

English: First of all, you must understand that in the last days scoffers will come, scoffing and following their own evil desires.
Kanjobal: A junxa ok waltok ti', caw wal chi wochej che yojtaknej elok. A yet jun lajub tiempoal, ok aj wan mac comonc'al ok buchwaj yin yet Dios. Asan tzet man watx'ok chi yochej oc eb bay ok yaoc is nabal.

English: They will say, “Where is this ‘coming’ he promised? Ever since our fathers died, everything goes on as it has since the beginning of creation.”
Kanjobal: Ok yal eb axca ti'; Yak'nakcan Cristo tu' is ti', tol ok jayok. Palta, ¿baytal ay tinani'? Ilab tol yanak oc eb jichmam yin c'ul, palta camnakxa pax eb. Ilek tonabi, tzetbil yayji masanil tzet yetal, yecheltaxc'al max watx'ji yulyibank'inal ti', ac'ala'c'al yayji masanil tinani', ac'ala' tol c'amc'al mac chi jay c'apaxok, ẍi eb, ok yalon eb.

English: But they deliberately forget that long ago by God's word the heavens existed and the earth was formed out of water and by water.
Kanjobal: Palta a eb chi alon axca tu', c'am chi yochej eb chi natek tzet maxax uj bay yulyibank'inal ti' yet payxa tu'. Asan k'anej Dios max on watx'ji satcan, c'al sat tx'otx' ti', cax max txecloj aj tx'otx' tx'otx' nan a', cax watx' yayji nan a' tu'. tinani'.

English: By these waters also the world of that time was deluged and destroyed.
Kanjobal: Palta lajwi tu', pilan lajwinak el masanil tzet ay bay yulyibank'inal ti' yuj a', yujtol pilan paxnak ay yich a'. A ton juntzan ti' c'am chi yal c'ul eb chi natek.

English: By the same word the present heavens and earth are reserved for fire, being kept for the day of judgment and destruction of ungodly men.
Kanjobal: A satcan yetok sat tx'otx' ti', ayc'al ton ec' tinani'. Palta yalnakcan Dios tol watx'okab yayji bel, masantac'al ok beklaytek k'ak' yiban. Yet ok jay jun c'ual beyc'ulal, cax ok c'aycan el eb c'am jabok yelapnok Dios yul sat yin junelnej.

English: But do not forget this one thing, dear friends: With the Lord a day is like a thousand years, and a thousand years are like a day.
Kanjobal: Ex in camc'ulnebil, chi wochej chi nachaj el e yuj, tol a yul sat Cham Jajawil, a jun c'u, lajan axca yec' junok mil abil. Junok mil abil tu', lajan yec' axca junok c'ual.

English: The Lord is not slow in keeping his promise, as some understand slowness. He is patient with you, not wanting anyone to perish, but everyone to come to repentance.
Kanjobal: Ay eb chi naoni, tol lanan mayji Cham Jajawil tu', c'am chi yun axca max yut yak'oncan is ti' tu' naon eb, palta man yelok axca chi yut naon eb tu'. C'amto chi jay Cham, yujtol lanantoc'al yak'on mimanc'ulal jin bay yulyibank'inal ti'. Chi yochej tol c'am junok on ok on c'aycan elok, palta tol chi yochej chi co na co ba co masanil.

English: But the day of the Lord will come like a thief. The heavens will disappear with a roar; the elements will be destroyed by fire, and the earth and everything in it will be laid bare.
Kanjobal: Palta axca wal jay junok elk'om yet ak'balil, caytu' ok yun jay c'ual jay Cham Jajawil tu'. Ok lajwok ay satcan yet jun c'ual tu', ayxa may nilili yet ok eq'uelok. Axa tzet ay sat tx'otx' ti', pilan ok uljoktok yuj jun miman k'ak'ej. Pilan ok tz'atok sat tx'otx' ti', yetok masanil tzetak yetal ayay sat.

English: Since everything will be destroyed in this way, what kind of people ought you to be? You ought to live holy and godly lives
Kanjobal: Caytu' ok yun lajwok masanil tzet yetal. Yuj tu' xan yowalil tojol chi jut co beybal. Asanokab yin Dios chi jaoc co nabal.

English: as you look forward to the day of God and speed its coming. That day will bring about the destruction of the heavens by fire, and the elements will melt in the heat.
Kanjobal: Jechbanejek jay jun c'ual yet Dios tu'. Jak'ek jip co mulnaj yin yet Cham, yet watx' chi jay yin ayman. A yet jun c'ual tu', ok lajwok satcan yuj k'ak'ej, cax pilan ok uljok masanil tzet ayay sat tx'otx' ti' yuj k'ak' tu'.

English: But in keeping with his promise we are looking forward to a new heaven and a new earth, the home of righteousness.
Kanjobal: Palta ayon ti', lanan jechbanen junxa ac' satcan, c'al jun ac' yulyibank'inal, yujtol axca tu' yaloncan Dios. Asan eb watx'xac'al is nabal ok cajonok.

English: So then, dear friends, since you are looking forward to this, make every effort to be found spotless, blameless and at peace with him.
Kanjobal: Ex in camc'ulnebil, lanan jechbanen jay juntzan mayal waltek ti'. Yuj tu' xan jak'ek jip, yet watx' c'amokab jabok co yobtakil c'al jabok co paltail yul sat Cham yet jun c'ual tu'. Tatol axca tu', junc'ulalxac'al ay on yetok Cham.

English: Bear in mind that our Lord's patience means salvation, just as our dear brother Paul also wrote you with the wisdom that God gave him.
Kanjobal: Nachajokab el e yuj, tol ay is mimanc'ulal Cham Jajawil, xan c'amto chi jay Cham, yet watx' ayto mac ok colchajok. Ilab c'apax juẍtak Pablo camc'ulnebil juj, cay c'apax tu' chi yut tz'ibentok ayex, yujtol caytu' yak'laycan jelanil yuj Dios.

English: He writes the same way in all his letters, speaking in them of these matters. His letters contain some things that are hard to understand, which ignorant and unstable people distort, as they do the other Scriptures, to their own destruction.
Kanjobal: Tz'ibbilc'alcan juntzan ti' yul junjun is carta, palta ay bay caw wal ya' nachaj elok. A mac c'amto wal nabal, mac manto wal tec'anok waay yin is creyenteal, chi q'uexcantok eb is k'anejal. Ac'ala' chi yun eb yin juntzanokxa k'anej Dios tz'ibbilcanok. Yuj tu' xan ok c'aycan el eb.

English: Therefore, dear friends, since you already know this, be on your guard so that you may not be carried away by the error of lawless men and fall from your secure position.
Kanjobal: A pax ayex ti', ex in camc'ulnebil, ayokto max e yabeni tzetak yetal ok jayok. Yuj tu', ilekc'al e ba bay eb yob is nabal max waltek ti', yet watx' c'am chex somchaj el yuj juntzan yob cuybanil eb tu'. Ta c'amak, caw wal ok etax el e nabal, cax ok ex ayc'ay yin tec'anil e waayi.

English: But grow in the grace and knowledge of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ. To him be glory both now and forever! Amen.
Kanjobal: Jak'ek jip jojtaknen el Cham Jajawil, co Colomal Jesucristo wal sic'libil. Yetok c'apaxok, yelokabc'al tol tz'akan chi co cha is watx'c'ulal junjun c'u. Mimanokab yelapnok Cham Jajawil tu' tinani', c'al yin tojbalk'inal. Yunokabi.

English: Paul, Silas and Timothy, To the church of the Thessalonians in God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ:
Kanjobal: Ajun Silvano yetok Timoteo wetok ayin Pablo in ti', cax chi waontok jun carta ti' ayex, ex creyente aj Tesalónica. Yet exxa co Mam Dios, yet exxa c'apax Cham Jajawil Jesucristo.

English: Grace and peace to you from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
Kanjobal: Yak'okabc'al co Mam Dios, yetok Cham Jajawil Jesucristo is watx'c'ulal ayex bay tu'. Yak'okab c'apax is junc'ulal ayex.

English: We ought always to thank God for you, brothers, and rightly so, because your faith is growing more and more, and the love every one of you has for each other is increasing.
Kanjobal: Ex wuẍtak, ex wanab, yowalilc'alta' chi jal yuj diosal bay Dios e yuj. Moj jalon yuj diosal tu' e yuj, yujtol junjun c'u che yac'al oc Dios yin e c'ul. Yetok c'apaxok, yelxac'al lanan e camc'ulnelen e ba.

English: Therefore, among God's churches we boast about your perseverance and faith in all the persecutions and trials you are enduring.
Kanjobal: Ayon jun chex ec' jal watx'il xol eb creyente bay junjun yiglesia Dios, yujtol xiwil tzet chi alay oc e yiban, xiwil yailal lanan e yiloni; palta caw wal tec'an che yut e yaon oc e c'ul yin Dios, cax lanan e yak'on techajok.

English: All this is evidence that God's judgment is right, and as a result you will be counted worthy of the kingdom of God, for which you are suffering.
Kanjobal: Cayton tu' chi yun txecloj elok, tol tojolc'al chon yut beyc'ulnen Dios. Chi yaltek e yuj tol e moj e yoc yul k'ab Dios, Cham lanan e yaben yail yuj tu'.

English: God is just: He will pay back trouble to those who trouble you
Kanjobal: A eb chex etnen tinani', a Dios ok aon oc yailal eb. Bayc'al ijan ton chi yut Dios axca tu'.

English: and give relief to you who are troubled, and to us as well. This will happen when the Lord Jesus is revealed from heaven in blazing fire with his powerful angels.
Kanjobal: Lanan ton e yaben yail jetok, palta ok on yiel Dios xol yailal tu' yet ok jay Cham Jajawil Jesús. Ok tit Cham bay satcan yetok eb yángel xiwil is yipalil. Ok ayol Cham xol jun k'ak' chi chaw xak.

English: He will punish those who do not know God and do not obey the gospel of our Lord Jesus.
Kanjobal: A yet tu' ok yaoc yailal eb maj ojtaknen el Dios, c'al eb maj iken k'anejal yet colbanilej aycan yuj Cham Jajawil Jesús.

English: They will be punished with everlasting destruction and shut out from the presence of the Lord and from the majesty of his power
Kanjobal: Ok tokcan eb bay c'aybanilal yin tojbalk'inal. Ok ilay el eb c'atan Cham Jajawil tu', yet watx' c'amxa oxlajon bak'in ok yil eb is watx'ilal Cham, c'al is yipalil.

English: on the day he comes to be glorified in his holy people and to be marveled at among all those who have believed. This includes you, because you believed our testimony to you.
Kanjobal: A yet jun c'ual yet ok jay Cham Jajawil tu', caw wal miman yelapnok Cham yul co sat ayon yet onxa Cham ti', ok ji can Cham mac on creyente onxa ti'. Ay e yalon e yet yin jun tu' yujtol max e yaoc yin e c'ul jun abix ec' albilcan ayex juj.

English: With this in mind, we constantly pray for you, that our God may count you worthy of his calling, and that by his power he may fulfill every good purpose of yours and every act prompted by your faith.
Kanjobal: Yuj ton jun tu' xan chon txajlic'al e yuj. Chi co k'anon bay co Diosal e yuj, yet watx', watx'okabc'al ex yul sat, yujtol a' awtenej ex oc yetok. Chi co k'anon c'apaxok yet watx' chi yak' yipalil ayex, yet watx' che beybalnej masanil tzet watx' axca che yochej, c'al yin e mulnajil che yun bay, yujtol che yaoc yin e c'ul.

English: We pray this so that the name of our Lord Jesus may be glorified in you, and you in him, according to the grace of our God and the Lord Jesus Christ.
Kanjobal: Ta caytu' che beybalnej, ok al-lay watx' k'anej yin Cham Jajawil Jesucristo e yuj, cax ok ex yalon c'apax Cristo watx'il. Caytu' ok ex eloc axca tu', yujtol a co Diosal, c'al Cham Jajawil Jesucristo ok tx'ox watx'c'ulal ayex.

English: Concerning the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ and our being gathered to him, we ask you, brothers,
Kanjobal: A tinani xin, ex wuẍtak, ex wanab, ok waltok e yabej yuj is jayubal Cham Jajawil Jesucristo, c'al yuj co wajbanilal oc yetok. Chin tewitok ayex tol

English: not to become easily unsettled or alarmed by some prophecy, report or letter supposed to have come from us, saying that the day of the Lord has already come.
Kanjobal: manchak somchaj el e nabal, ta ay eb chi alon ayex, tol jaynakxa is c'ual Cham Jajawil. Caxc'al chi yal eb tol a Yespíritu Dios max alon bay eb, caxc'al yul yet eb tx'oklil chi yalon eb, manchak ex oc il bay chi yal eb. Caxc'al chi yal eb tol max apni co carta bay eb yuj jalon jun ti', manchak e cha e yabej.

English: Don't let anyone deceive you in any way, for that day will not come until the rebellion occurs and the man of lawlessness is revealed, the man doomed to destruction.
Kanjobal: Manchak e yak' e ba yilay aytek e sat yuj junok mactxel, yujtol a yet manto jay jun c'ual tu', ay jun tiempoal xiwil mac ok meltzoj oc ajc'ulal yin Dios, cax ok tx'oxk'abnen aj ba nak yajaw caw wal yob tol t'inan ok alaycantok bay yailal.

English: He will oppose and will exalt himself over everything that is called God or is worshiped, so that he sets himself up in God's temple, proclaiming himself to be God.
Kanjobal: Ok yak'lej nak owal yetok Dios. Ok tit yowal yin masanil tzet chi al-lay oc diosal bay chi yal ba anima. Ok yiaj can ba yiban juntzan tu'. Toltax ok octok chotan nak yul templo Dios, cax ok yalon oc ba diosal.

English: Don't you remember that when I was with you I used to tell you these things?
Kanjobal: Naektek tol a yet ayin ec' e yetok, max walcan juntzan ti' e yabej.

English: And now you know what is holding him back, so that he may be revealed at the proper time.
Kanjobal: E yojtak tzet c'amto chi chaon jay nak yajaw yob tu', xan c'am chi txecloj aj yet manto tiempoalok.

English: For the secret power of lawlessness is already at work; but the one who now holds it back will continue to do so till he is taken out of the way.
Kanjobal: Palta lananxa mulnaj yobtakil yin ewantakil tinani', masantac'al ok ilay el mac chi tenon oc wanaj tx'oxk'abnen aj ba tu'.

English: And then the lawless one will be revealed, whom the Lord Jesus will overthrow with the breath of his mouth and destroy by the splendor of his coming.
Kanjobal: Catatu bian, ok tx'oxk'abnen aj ba nak yajaw yob tu'. Palta toc'al ok xulay cam yuj Cham Jajawil Jesús. A tzekekial yili Cham Jajawil yet ok jay tu', a' ok ak'on c'ayil jun nak tu'.

English: The coming of the lawless one will be in accordance with the work of Satan displayed in all kinds of counterfeit miracles, signs and wonders,
Kanjobal: A yet ok tx'oxk'abnen aj ba jun winak yajawil yobtakil tu', ok oc Satanás yetok. Ok yak' yipal nak tu'. Yuj tu' xan ay juntzan milagro c'al juntzanxa tzet ok el tx'oxon yuj yetnen anima.

English: and in every sort of evil that deceives those who are perishing. They perish because they refused to love the truth and so be saved.
Kanjobal: Xiwil tzet yobtak ok el yuneni, yuj yion aytek sat eb ok c'aycan elok. Ok c'aycan el eb, yujtol maj yochej eb max yaoc c'ul yin jun cuybanilej caw wal yel, yet watx' chi colchaj eb.

English: For this reason God sends them a powerful delusion so that they will believe the lie
Kanjobal: Yuj tu xin, ok yak' Dios yilay aytek sat eb yuj yajnabalil nak man yelok chi yala', cax ok yaon oc eb lek'tial yin is c'ul.

English: and so that all will be condemned who have not believed the truth but have delighted in wickedness.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu', masanil eb mac maj yal c'ul max yaoc c'ul yin jun cuybanilej caw wal yel, ok alaycantok eb bay yailal, yujtol max yak' tzalojbok eb c'ul yin yobtakil.

English: But we ought always to thank God for you, brothers loved by the Lord, because from the beginning God chose you to be saved through the sanctifying work of the Spirit and through belief in the truth.
Kanjobal: Ex wuẍtak, ex wanab, camc'ulnebil ex yuj Cham Jajawil. Yowalil chi jal yuj diosalil bay Dios e yuj, yujtol payxatax sic'bil ex el yuj Dios jetok, yet watx' chex colchaj el yuj Yespíritu. A Yespíritu tu' chex aon oc yetok Dios. Yuj tu' xan chex colchaj jetok, yuj c'apax che yaoc jun cuybanilej caw wal yel yin e c'ul.

English: He called you to this through our gospel, that you might share in the glory of our Lord Jesus Christ.
Kanjobal: A k'anejal yet colbanilej ec' albil ayex juj, a' max yak'balnej Dios ex yawten oc yetok, yet watx' ay e yalon e yet yin is tzekekial Jesucristo jetok.

English: So then, brothers, stand firm and hold to the teachings we passed on to you, whether by word of mouth or by letter.
Kanjobal: Yuj tu xin, ex wuẍtak, ex wanab, caw wal tec'an che yut e ba. Manchak e bek c'aytok juntzan cuybanilej ec' jalnak ayex, c'al juntzan albiltok yul carta juj.

English: May our Lord Jesus Christ himself and God our Father, who loved us and by his grace gave us eternal encouragement and good hope,
Kanjobal: A Cham Jajawil Jesucristo, yetok co Mam Dios, caw wal ay camc'ulal eb jin. A is watx'c'ulal chi ak'on mimanil co c'ul yin tojbalk'inal, cax chi yak'on c'apax jaon oc is watx'ilal yipok co c'ul.

English: encourage your hearts and strengthen you in every good deed and word.
Kanjobal: Yak'okab Cham e tzalojc'ulal, c'al e tec'anil, yet watx' a masanil tzet che yala', c'al tzet che yunej, watx'okabc'al yul sat Cham.

English: Finally, brothers, pray for us that the message of the Lord may spread rapidly and be honored, just as it was with you.
Kanjobal: A tinani' ex wuẍtak, ex wanab, caw wal chex txajli juj, yet watx' yinokab ayman chi toj is k'anej Cham Jajawil xol anima masanil, cax chi chaon eb yin masanil is c'ul, axca max e yut e chaon ayex ti'.

English: And pray that we may be delivered from wicked and evil men, for not everyone has faith.
Kanjobal: Chex txajli c'apaxok, yet watx' c'amokab tzet chon utlay yuj eb yob is nabal, yujtol man masanilok anima chi yaoc yin c'ul.

English: But the Lord is faithful, and he will strengthen and protect you from the evil one.
Kanjobal: Palta chic'al yun bay chi yal Cham Jajawil. A Cham chi ak'on e tec'anil. Chex colon c'apax el bay yobtakil.

English: We have confidence in the Lord that you are doing and will continue to do the things we command.
Kanjobal: Chi jaoc Cham Jajawil yipok co c'ul tol lanan e yiken e beybalnen juntzan chekbanil max jal ayex, cax ok e yikenc'al masanil tiempo.

English: May the Lord direct your hearts into God's love and Christ's perseverance.
Kanjobal: Yak'okab Cham Jajawil nachaj el camc'ulal Dios e yuj, yet watx' caw wal tec'an che yut e ba, axca Cristo.

English: In the name of the Lord Jesus Christ, we command you, brothers, to keep away from every brother who is idle and does not live according to the teaching you received from us.
Kanjobal: Ex wuẍtak, ex wanab, yuj chekbanil Cham Jajawil Jesucristo, xan chi jaltok juntzanxa chekbanil ti' ayex. Ta e xol tu' ay junok creyente c'am chi mulnaji, ta c'am chi beybalnej juntzan cuybanilej max ec' jalcan ayex, manchak e junanej e ba yetok.

English: For you yourselves know how you ought to follow our example. We were not idle when we were with you,
Kanjobal: E yojtakxa, tol moj che beybalnej co beybal, tol man isajok ec' jutnak co ba e xol.

English: nor did we eat anyone's food without paying for it. On the contrary, we worked night and day, laboring and toiling so that we would not be a burden to any of you.
Kanjobal: E yojtak, c'am bay toc'al max co k'an low co ba ayex. A ti jet, max on mulnaj c'ualil c'al ak'balil. Caw wal max jak' jip co mulnaji, yujtol maj yal co c'ul max jak' co ba e cargonej yuj co gasto.

English: We did this, not because we do not have the right to such help, but in order to make ourselves a model for you to follow.
Kanjobal: Caxc'al ay jalon jet co k'anon co gasto ayex, palta max on mulnaj yetok co k'ab. Cayton tu' max jut co tx'oxoncan el jun watx' beybalej tu' ayex, yet watx' che beybalnej c'apaxok.

English: For even when we were with you, we gave you this rule: “If a man will not work, he shall not eat.”
Kanjobal: Yujtol a yet ayon ec' e xol, max jal jun chekbanil ayex, jun chi alon axca ti': Ta ay mac c'am chi yal c'ul chi mulnaji, manchak low c'apaxok, ẍi.

English: We hear that some among you are idle. They are not busy; they are busybodies.
Kanjobal: Chi jaltok juntzan ti' ayex, yujtol chi jab k'umal, tol ay ex ab c'am chi yal e c'ul chex mulnaji. Toc'al ab comon chex toj xol tzet man e yetok.

English: Such people we command and urge in the Lord Jesus Christ to settle down and earn the bread they eat.
Kanjobal: A ayex mac ex txel caytu' che yut e ba, a tu' chi jaltok juntzan ti', yujtol max yal Cham Jajawil Jesucristo, xan chi cam jalontok ayex, caw chex mulnaj yin tzalojc'ulal, yet watx', watx'c'al chi ec' tiempo e yuj.

English: And as for you, brothers, never tire of doing what is right.
Kanjobal: Ex wuẍtak, ex wanab, manchak ispay aj e yunen watx'il.

English: If anyone does not obey our instruction in this letter, take special note of him. Do not associate with him, in order that he may feel ashamed.
Kanjobal: Ta ay mac c'am chi iken tzet chi jaltok yul jun co carta ti', chi cam e yiloni mactxel, yet watx' c'am chex ec' yetok, yuj yelbalok is q'uixwil.

English: Yet do not regard him as an enemy, but warn him as a brother.
Kanjobal: Palta c'am chi je' tol ok e yajc'ulnej e ba yetok eb, palta alek yab eb, yujtol e yuẍtak eb, e yanab eb.

English: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times and in every way. The Lord be with all of you.
Kanjobal: Yak'okabc'al Cham Jajawil, Cham ak'om junc'ulal, is junc'ulal ayex yin tzanc'al tzet chex oni. Ocokabc'al Cham e yetok e masanil bay tu'.

English: I, Paul, write this greeting in my own hand, which is the distinguishing mark in all my letters. This is how I write.
Kanjobal: Ayin caw Pablo in ti' chin tz'ibejtok in bi ti', yuj txecloj elok tol yel wet ton jun carta ti'. Cac'al ti' chi wut in tz'ibentok in bi yin junjun in carta.

English: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all.
Kanjobal: Yak'okabc'al Cham Jajawil Jesucristo is watx'c'ulal ayex e masanil bay tu'.

English: Paul, an apostle of Christ Jesus by the will of God, according to the promise of life that is in Christ Jesus,
Kanjobal: Ayin ton Pablo in, chekbej in Jesucristo, yujtol axca ti' max el yin c'ul Dios. Yak'nakcan Dios is ti', tol ok yak' co k'inal tol ayc'al yin tojbalk'inal, yujtol junxanej jayji yetok Cristo Jesús.

English: To Timothy, my dear son: Grace, mercy and peace from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord.
Kanjobal: Ach Timoteo, ti chi watok jun in carta ti' ayach. Caw ay in camc'ulal en, axca tol in c'ajol ach. Yak'okabc'al co Mam Dios yetok Cham Jajawil Jesucristo is watx'c'ulal ayach. Ok'okab c'ul en. Yak'okabc'al c'apax is junc'ulal ayach bay tu'.

English: I thank God, whom I serve, as my forefathers did, with a clear conscience, as night and day I constantly remember you in my prayers.
